GS41brhats_u:466: 5.68cd/ gomanta^pāriyātra^āśritāś[K's tr. gomantaḥ pāriyātrā] ca nāśaṃ vrajanty āśu//
GS41brhats_u:468: 5.69b kalmāṣān atha śūrasena^sahitān kāśīś ca santāpayet/
GS41brhats_u:471: 5.70ab/ kāśmīrakān kauśalakān sapuṇḍrān mṛgāṃś ca hanyād aparāntakāṃś ca/
GS41brhats_u:472: 5.70cd/ ye somapās tāṃś ca nihanty saumye suvṛṣṭi^kṛt
GS41brhats_u:476: 5.71cd/ dhvaṃsaṃ vrajanty atra ca manda^vṛṣṭiṃ bhayaṃ ca vindyād
GS41brhats_u:494: 5.76cd/ pradhvaṃsam āyānti narāś ca saumyāḥ sālvaiḥ sametāś ca niṣāda^saṅghāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:498: 5.78b gāndhārān api madhyadeśa^sahitān vṛṣṭo grahaḥ śrāvaṇe/
GS41brhats_u:499: 5.78c kāmboja^ekaśaphāṃś ca śāradam api tyaktvā yathoktān imān
GS41brhats_u:509: 5.81ab/ hanu^kukṣi^pāyu^bhedā dvir dviḥ sañchardanaṃ ca jaraṇaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:510: 5.81cd/ madhya^antayoś ca vidaraṇam iti daśa śaśi^sūryayor mokṣāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:512: 5.82cd/ sasya^vimardo mukha^rug nṛpa^pīḍā syāt suvṛṣṭiś ca//
GS41brhats_u:514: 5.83cd/ mukharogaṃ śastra^bhayaṃ tasmin vindyāt subhikṣaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:517: 5.85ab/ vāmas tu kukṣi^bhedo yady uttaramārga^saṃsthito rāhuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:518: 5.85cd/ strīṇāṃ garbha^vipattiḥ sasyāni ca tatra madhyāni//
GS41brhats_u:520: 5.86cd/ guhya^rug alpā vṛṣṭir dvayos tu rājñī^kṣayo vāme//
GS41brhats_u:521: 5.87ab/ pūrveṇa pragrahaṇaṃ kṛtvā prāg eva ca^apasarpeta /
GS41brhats_u:523: 5.88ab/ prāk pragrahaṇaṃ yasmin paścād apasarpaṇaṃ tu taj jaraṇam/
GS41brhats_u:524: 5.88cd/ kṣut^śastra^bhaya^*udvignā na[K.udvignāḥ kva] śaraṇam upayānti tatra janāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:525: 5.89ab/ madhye yadi prakāśaḥ prathamaṃ tan madhya^vidaraṇaṃ nāma/
GS41brhats_u:529: 5.91ab/ ete sarve mokṣā vaktavyā bhāskare +api kintv atra/
GS41brhats_u:530: 5.91cd/ pūrvā dik śaśini yathā tathā ravau paścimā kalpyā//
GS41brhats_u:533: 5.93ab/ ulkā mantri^vināśaṃ nānāvarṇā ghanāś ca bhayam atulam/
GS41brhats_u:535: 5.94ab/ pariveṣo ruk^pīḍāṃ digdāho nṛpa^bhayaṃ ca sa^agni^bhayaṃ/
GS41brhats_u:536: 5.94cd/ rūkṣo vāyuḥ prabalaś caurasamutthaṃ bhayaṃ dhatte//
GS41brhats_u:537: 5.95ab/ nirghātaḥ suracāpaṃ daṇḍaś ca kṣud^bhayaṃ sa^paracakram/
GS41brhats_u:541: 5.96cd/ yac ca^aśubhaṃ grahaṇajaṃ tat sarvaṃ nāśan upayāti//
GS41brhats_u:542: 5.97ab/ somagrahe nivṛtte pakṣānte yadi bhaved graho +arkasya/
GS41brhats_u:544: 5.98ab/ arkagrahāt tu śaśino grahaṇaṃ yadi dṛśyate tato viprāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:551: 6.02cd/ dūṣayati rasān udaye karoti rogān avṛṣṭiṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:554: 6.04ab/ rudhira^ānanam iti vaktraṃ pañcadaśāt ṣoḍaśāc ca vinivṛtte/
GS41brhats_u:555: 6.04cd/ tat^kālaṃ mukha^rogaṃ sa^bhayaṃ ca subhikṣam āvahati//
GS41brhats_u:556: 6.05ab/ asi^muśalaṃ saptadaśād aṣṭādaśato +api vā tad anuvakre/
GS41brhats_u:562: 6.08ab/ madhyena yadi maghānāṃ gata^agataṃ lohitaḥ karoti tataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:563: 6.08cd/ pāṇḍyo nṛpo vinaśyati śastra^udyogād bhayam avṛṣṭiṃ//
GS41brhats_u:566: 6.09cd/ marakaṃ karoti ghoraṃ yadi bhittvā rohiṇīṃ yāti//
GS41brhats_u:580: 7.01ab/ na^utpāta^parityaktaḥ kadā cid api candrajo vrajaty udayam/
GS41brhats_u:589: 7.05ab/ āryamṇaṃ hautabhujaṃ bhadrapadām uttrarāṃ yameśaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:602: 7.11ab/ yogāntikā^iti mūlaṃ dve ca^āṣāḍhe gatiḥ sutasya^indoḥ//
GS41brhats_u:617: 7.17cd/ vṛṣṭo bhayāya jagataḥ śubha^phala^kṛt proṣitas teṣu//
GS41brhats_u:621: 7.19ab/ ruddhāni saumye *+astagate[K.astamite] purāṇi yāny udgate tāny upayānti mokṣam/
GS41brhats_u:622: 7.19cd/ anye tu paścād udite vadanti lābhaḥ purāṇāṃ bhavati tajjñāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:623: 7.20ab/ hema^kāntir atha vā śuka^varṇaḥ sasyakena maṇinā sadṛśo vā/
GS41brhats_u:624: 7.20cd/ snigdha^mūrtir alaghuś ca hitāya vyatyaye na śubha^kṛt
GS41brhats_u:630: 8.02cd/ kramaśas tribhaṃ tu pañcamam upāntyam antyaṃ ca yad varṣam//
GS41brhats_u:635: 8.04cd/ vyādhi^bhayaṃ mitrair api bhūpānāṃ jāyate vairam//
GS41brhats_u:640: 8.07ab/ phālguna^varṣe vindyāt kva cit kva cit kṣema^vṛṣṭi^sasyāni/
GS41brhats_u:641: 8.07cd/ daurbhāgyaṃ pramadānāṃ prabalāś caurā nṛpāś ca^ugrāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:642: 8.08ab/ caitre mandā vṛṣṭiḥ priyam annaṃ kṣemam avanipā mṛdavaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:643: 8.08cd/ vṛddhiś ca kośa^dhānyasya bhavati pīḍā ca rūpavatām//
GS41brhats_u:647: 8.10cd/ pīḍyante dhānyāni ca hitvā kaṅguṃ śamījātim//
GS41brhats_u:648: 8.11ab/ āṣāḍhe jāyante sasyāni kva cid avṛṣṭir anyatra/
GS41brhats_u:649: 8.11cd/ yogakṣemaṃ madhyaṃ vyagrāś ca bhavanti bhūpālāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:650: 8.12ab/ śrāvaṇa^varṣe kṣemaṃ samyak sasyāni pākam upayānti/
GS41brhats_u:651: 8.12cd/ kṣudrā ye *pākhaṇḍāḥ[K.pāṣaṇḍāḥ] pīḍyante ye ca tad^bhaktāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:652: 8.13ab/ bhādrapade vallījaṃ niṣpattiṃ yāti pūrvasasyaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:653: 8.13cd/ na bhavaty aparaṃ sasyaṃ kva cit subhikṣaṃ kvacic ca bhayam//
GS41brhats_u:654: 8.14ab/ āśvayuje +abde +ajasraṃ patati jalaṃ pramuditāḥ prajāḥ kṣemam/
GS41brhats_u:658: 8.16ab/ vicaran bha^dvayam iṣṭas tat^sārdhaṃ vatsareṇa madhya^phalaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:659: 8.16cd/ sasyānāṃ vidhvaṃsī vicared adhikaṃ yadi kadā cit//
GS41brhats_u:660: 8.17ab/ anala^bhayam anala^varṇe vyādhiḥ pīte raṇa^āgamaḥ śyāme/
GS41brhats_u:661: 8.17cd/ harite ca taskarebhyaḥ pīḍā rakte tu śastra^bhayam//
GS41brhats_u:663: 8.18cd/ vipule +amale sutāre rātrau dṛṣṭe prajāḥ svasthāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:664: 8.19a rohiṇyo +analabhaṃ ca vatsara^tanur nābhis tv aṣāḍha^dvayaṃ
GS41brhats_u:665: 8.19b sārpaṃ hṛt^pitṛ^daivataṃ ca kusumaṃ śuddhaiḥ śubhaṃ taiḥ phalam/
GS41brhats_u:667: 8.19d puṣpe mūla^phala^kṣayo +atha hṛdaye sasyasya nāśo dhruvam//
GS41brhats_u:675: 8.22ab/ ekaikam abdeṣu nava^āhateṣu dattvā pṛthag dvādaśakaṃ krameṇa/
GS41brhats_u:676: 8.22cd/ hṛtvā caturbhir vasudevatā^ādyāny uḍūni śeṣāṃśaka^pūrvam abdam//
GS41brhats_u:681: 8.24cd/ prajāpatiś ca^apy anuvatsaraḥ syād idvatsaraḥ śailasutāpatiś ca//
GS41brhats_u:682: 8.25ab/ vṛṣṭiḥ samādye pramukhe dvitīye prabhūta^toyā kathitā tṛtīye/
GS41brhats_u:683: 8.25cd/ paścāj jalaṃ muñcati yac caturthaṃ svalpa^udakaṃ pañcamam abdam uktam//
GS41brhats_u:686: 8.26cd/ catvāri madhyāni ca madhyamāni catvāri ca^antyāny adhamāni
GS41brhats_u:688: 8.27ab/ ādyaṃ dhaniṣṭāṃśam abhiprapanno māghe yadā yāty udayaṃ surejyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:691: 8.28ab/ kva cit tv avṛṣṭiḥ pavana^agni^kopaḥ santi^ītayaḥ śleṣma^kṛtāś ca
GS41brhats_u:693: 8.28cd/ saṃvatsare +asmin prabhave pravṛtte na duḥkham āpnoti janas
GS41brhats_u:695: 8.29ab/ tasmād dvitīyo vibhavaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ śuklas tṛtīyaḥ parataḥ pramodaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:696: 8.29cd/ prajāpatiś ca^iti yathottarāṇi śastāni varṣāṇi phalāny
GS41brhats_u:699: 8.30cd/ saṃhṛṣṭa^lokāṃ kali^doṣa^muktāṃ kṣatraṃ tadā śāsti ca
GS41brhats_u:703: 8.31cd/ varṣāṇi pañca^eva yathākrameṇa trīṇy atra śastāni same pare dve//
GS41brhats_u:706: 8.32cd/ abda^dvaye +antye +api samā suvṛṣṭiḥ kintv atra rogāḥ samara^āgamaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:707: 8.33ab/ śākre yuge pūrvam atha^īśvara^ākhyaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ bahudhānyam
GS41brhats_u:709: 8.33cd/ pramāthinaṃ vikramam apy *atha^anyad[K.ato +anyad] vṛṣaṃ ca vindyād gurucāra^yogāt//
GS41brhats_u:710: 8.34ab/ ādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca śubhe tu varṣe kṛta^anukāraṃ kurutaḥ prajānām/
GS41brhats_u:711: 8.34cd/ pāpaḥ pramāthī vṛṣa^vikramau tu subhikṣadau roga^bhaya^pradau ca//
GS41brhats_u:712: 8.35ab/ śreṣṭhaṃ ca caturthasya yugasya pūrvaṃ yac citrabhānuṃ kathayanti varṣam/
GS41brhats_u:713: 8.35cd/ madhyaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu subhānu^sañjñaṃ roga^pradaṃ mṛtyu^karaṃ *na
GS41brhats_u:717: 8.36cd/ pañcamaṃ vyayam uśanti śobhanaṃ manmatha^prabalam utsava^ākulam//
GS41brhats_u:718: 8.37ab/ tvāṣṭre yuge sarvajid^ādya uktaḥ saṃvatsaro +anyaḥ khalu
GS41brhats_u:720: 8.37cd/ tasmād virodhī vikṛtaḥ kharaś ca śasto dvitīyo +atra bhayāya
GS41brhats_u:722: 8.38ab/ nandano +atha vijayo jayas tathā manmatho +asya parataś ca durmukhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:723: 8.38cd/ kāntam atra yuga āditas trayaṃ manmathaḥ sama^phalo +adhamo
GS41brhats_u:725: 8.39ab/ hemalamba iti saptame yuge syād vilambi parato vikāri ca/
GS41brhats_u:726: 8.39cd/ śarvarīti tad^anu plavaḥ smṛto vatsaro guru^vaśena pañcamaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:728: 8.40b mandaṃ sasyaṃ na bahu^salilaṃ vatsare +ato dvitīye/
GS41brhats_u:730: 8.40d durbhikṣāya plava iti tataḥ śobhano bhūri^toyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:733: 8.41cd/ krodhī tṛtīyaḥ parataḥ krameṇa viśvāvasuś ca^iti parābhavaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:734: 8.42ab/ pūrvā^parau prīti^karau prajānām eṣāṃ tṛtīyo bahu^doṣado +abdaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:737: 8.43ab/ ādyaḥ plavaṅgo navame yuge +abdaḥ syāt kīlako +anyaḥ parataś ca saumyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:740: 8.44ab/ kaṣṭaḥ plavaṅgo bahuśaḥ prajānāṃ sādhāraṇe +alpaṃ jalam ītayaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:741: 8.44cd/ yaḥ pañcamo rodhakṛd ity atha^abdaś citram jalam tatra ca
GS41brhats_u:747: 8.46ab/ paridhāvini madhyadeśa^nāśo nṛpa^hānir jalam alpam agni^kopaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:748: 8.46cd/ alasas tu janaḥ pramādi^saṃjñe ḍamaraṃ raktaka^puṣpa^bīja^nāśaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:754: 8.48cd/ ādye tu vṣṛṭir mahatī sacaurā śvāso hanū^kampa^yutaś ca kāsaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:755: 8.49ab/ yat kālayuktaṃ tad aneka^doṣaṃ siddhārtha^saṃjñe bahavo guṇāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:758: 8.50ab/ bhāgye yuge dundubhi^saṃjñam ādyaṃ sasyasya vṛddhiṃ mahatīṃ
GS41brhats_u:760: 8.50cd/ *aṅgāra^saṃjñaṃ[K.udgārisaṃjñaṃ] tad^anu kṣayāya nareśvarāṇāṃ viṣamā ca vṛṣṭiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:761: 8.51ab/ raktākṣam abdaṃ kathitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tasmin bhayaṃ daṃṣṭri^kṛtaṃ gadāś
GS41brhats_u:768: 8.52d kathitam akhilaṃ ṣaṣṭy^abde yat tad atra samāsataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:775: 9.01cd/ aśviny^ādyāḥ kaiś cit tribhāḥ kramād vīthayaḥ kathitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:776: 9.02ab/ nāgā tu pavana^yāmya^analāni paitāmahāt tribhās tisraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:777: 9.02cd/ govīthyām aśvinyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ dve ca^api bhadrapade//
GS41brhats_u:778: 9.03ab/ jāradgavyāṃ śravaṇāt tribhaṃ mṛga^ākhyā tribhaṃ tu maitra^ādyam/
GS41brhats_u:785: 9.06ab/ uttaramārgo yāmya^ādi nigadito madhyamas tu bhāgya^ādyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:786: 9.06cd/ dakṣiṇa^mārgo^āṣāḍhā^ādi kaiś cid evaṃ kṛtā mārgāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:789: 9.07cd/ svayam evā vikalpayituṃ kintu bahūnāṃ mataṃ vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:798: 9.11ab/ atra^uditam ārohed graho +aparo yadi sitaṃ tato hanyāt/
GS41brhats_u:809: 9.16ab/ svāty^ādyaṃ bha^tritayaṃ maṇḍalam etac caturtham abhaya^karam/
GS41brhats_u:818: 9.20ab/ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaṇnakṣatraṃ śubham etan maṇḍalaṃ dhaniṣṭhā^ādyam/
GS41brhats_u:822: 9.22ab/ aparasyāṃ svāty^ādyaṃ jyeṣṭhā^ādyaṃ ca^api maṇḍalaṃ śubhadam/
GS41brhats_u:830: 9.25ab/ prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvā^iva pātakaṃ vasudhā/
GS41brhats_u:840: 9.30ab/ kaurava^citrakarāṇāṃ haste pīḍā jalasya ca nirodhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:843: 9.31cd/ aindra^agne +api suvṛṣṭir vaṇijāṃ ca bhayaṃ vijānīyāt//
GS41brhats_u:845: 9.32cd/ maulika^bhiṣajām mūle triṣv api ca^eteṣv anāvṛṣṭiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:850: 9.34cd/ kuru^pāñcālānām api karoti ca^asmin sitaḥ salilam//
GS41brhats_u:855: 9.36cd/ yadā vrajed darśanam astam eti vā tadā mahī vārimayīva lakṣyate//
GS41brhats_u:858: 9.37cd/ tadā prajā rug^bhaya^śoka^pīḍitā na vāri paśyanti
GS41brhats_u:863: 9.39ab/ na mitrabhāve suhṛdo vyavasthitāḥ kriyāsu samyag na ratā dvijātayaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:864: 9.39cd/ na ca^alpam apy ambu dadāti vāsavo bhinatti vajreṇa śirāṃsi
GS41brhats_u:873: 9.42ab/ bṛhaspatau hanti puraḥsthite sitaḥ sitaṃ samastaṃ
GS41brhats_u:875: 9.42cd/ diśaṃ ca pūrvāṃ karakāsṛjo +ambudā gale gadā bhūri bhavec ca śāradam//
GS41brhats_u:877: 9.43b rogān pittaja^*kāmalāṃś[K.kāmalāṃ K's tr. kāmalāmś or kāmalāś] ca kurute puṣṇāti ca
GS41brhats_u:879: 9.43d vaiśyān gāḥ saha vāhanair narapatīn pītāni paścād diśam//
GS41brhats_u:909: 10.11cd/ sasyāny atha māñjiṣṭhaṃ kausumbhaṃ ca kṣayaṃ yāti//
GS41brhats_u:911: 10.12cd/ upatāpaṃ yānti ca ghāṇṭikā vibhedaś ca mitrāṇām//
GS41brhats_u:915: 10.14cd/ upatāpaṃ yānti janā vasanti ye tāmraliptyāṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:916: 10.15ab/ viśveśvare +arkaputraś caran daśārṇān nihanti yavanāṃś ca/
GS41brhats_u:919: 10.16cd/ vasubhe magadheśa^jayo vṛddhiś ca dhaneṣv adhikṛtānām//
GS41brhats_u:923: 10.18cd/ śabarāś ca nipīḍyante yavanāś ca śanaiścare carati//
GS41brhats_u:924: 10.19ab/ yadā viśākhāsu mahendra^mantrī sutaś ca bhānor dahana^ṛkṣa^yātaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:925: 10.19cd/ tadā prajānām anayo +atighoraḥ pura^prabhedo gatayor bham ekam//
GS41brhats_u:926: 10.20ab/ aṇḍajahā ravijo yadi citraḥ kṣudbhayakṛd yadi pīta^mayūkhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:927: 10.20cd/ śastra^bhayāya ca raktasavarṇo bhasmanibho bahu^vairakaraś ca//
GS41brhats_u:934: 11.01cd/ anyāṃś ca bahūn dṛṣṭvā kriyate +ayam anākulaś cāraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:935: 11.02ab/ darśanam astamayo vā na gaṇitavidhinā^asya śakyate jñātum/
GS41brhats_u:941: 11.04cd/ divyā nakṣatrasthā bhaumāḥ syur ato +anyathā śikhinaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:942: 11.05ab/ śatam eka^adhikam eke sahasram apare vadanti ketūnām/
GS41brhats_u:943: 11.05cd/ bahurūpam ekam eva prāha munir nāradaḥ ketum//
GS41brhats_u:944: 11.06ab/ yady eko yadi bahavaḥ kim anena phalaṃ tu sarvathā vācyam/
GS41brhats_u:946: 11.07ab/ yāvanty ahāni dṛśyo māsās tāvanta eva phalapākaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:947: 11.07cd/ māsair abdāṃś ca vadet prathamāt pakṣatrayāt parataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:948: 11.08ab/ hrasvas tanuḥ prasannaḥ snigdhas tv ṛjur acira^saṃsthitaḥ śuklaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:957: 11.12ab/ vakraśikhā mṛtyusutā rūkṣāḥ kṛṣṇāś ca te +api tāvantaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:963: 11.15ab/ brahmasuta eka eva triśikho varṇais tribhir yugāntakaraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:965: 11.16ab/ śatam abhihitam ekasametam etad ekena virahitāny asmāt/
GS41brhats_u:966: 11.16cd/ kathayiṣye ketūnāṃ śatāni nava lakṣaṇaiḥ spaṣṭaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:968: 11.17cd/ vipulasitatārakās te snigdhāś ca bhavanti tīvraphalāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:972: 11.19cd/ ṣaṣṭiḥ pañcabhir adhikā snigdhā yāmyāśritāḥ pāpāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:976: 11.21cd/ nāmnā ca kauṅkumās te saumyāśāsaṃsthitāḥ pāpāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:977: 11.22ab/ triṃśaty adhikā rāhos te tāmasakīlakā iti khyātāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:990: 11.28cd/ evaṃ ketu^sahasraṃ viśeṣam eṣām ato vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:992: 11.29cd/ sadyaḥ karoti marakaṃ subhikṣam apy uttamaṃ kurute//
GS41brhats_u:993: 11.30ab/ tallakṣaṇo +asthiketuḥ sa tu rūkṣaḥ kṣud^bhaya^āvahaḥ proktaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1001: 11.33cd/ gacched yathā yathodak tathā tathā dairghyam āyāti//
GS41brhats_u:1002: 11.34ab/ saptamunīn saṃspṛśya dhruvam abhijitam eva ca pratinivṛttaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1005: 11.35cd/ udag api ca devikām api bhūyiṣṭhaṃ madhyadeśākhyam//
GS41brhats_u:1006: 11.36ab/ anyān api sa deśān kva cit kva cid dhanti rogadurbhikṣaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1007: 11.36cd/ daśa māsān phalapāko +asya kaiś cid aṣṭādaśa proktaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1009: 11.37cd/ ka iti yugākṛtir apare yugapattau saptadinadṛśyau//
GS41brhats_u:1010: 11.38ab/ snigdhau subhikṣaśivadāv athādhikaṃ dṛśyate kanāmā yaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1012: 11.39ab/ śveta iti jaṭākāro rūkṣaḥ śyāvo viyattribhāgagataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1014: 11.40ab/ ādhūmrayā tu śikhayā darśanam āyāti kṛttikāsaṃsthaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1015: 11.40cd/ jñeyaḥ sa raśmiketuḥ śvetasamānaṃ phalaṃ dhatte//
GS41brhats_u:1019: 11.42cd/ gṛhiṇām upaskareṣu ca vināśināṃ darśanaṃ yāti//
GS41brhats_u:1020: 11.43ab/ kumuda iti kumudakāntir vāruṇyāṃ prākśikho niśām ekām/
GS41brhats_u:1021: 11.43cd/ dṛṣṭaḥ subhikṣam atulaṃ daśa kila varṣāṇi sa karoti//
GS41brhats_u:1024: 11.45ab/ udayann eva subhikṣaṃ caturo māsān karoty asau sārdhān/
GS41brhats_u:1026: 11.46ab/ jalaketur api ca paścāt snigdhaḥ śikhayāpareṇa ca^unnatayā/
GS41brhats_u:1027: 11.46cd/ nava māsān sa subhikṣaṃ karoti śāntiṃ ca lokasya//
GS41brhats_u:1028: 11.47ab/ bhavaketur ekarātraṃ dṛśyaḥ prāk sūkṣmatārakaḥ snigdhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1030: 11.48ab/ yāvata eva muhūrtān darśanam āyāti nirdiśet^māsān/
GS41brhats_u:1031: 11.48cd/ tāvad atulaṃ subhikṣaṃ rūkṣe prāṇāntikān rogān//
GS41brhats_u:1032: 11.49ab/ apareṇa padmaketur mṛṇālagauro bhaven niśām ekām/
GS41brhats_u:1035: 11.50cd/ yāvat kṣaṇān sa dṛśyas tāvan māsān subhikṣakaraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1038: 11.52ab/ yāvata eva muhūrtān dṛśyo varṣāṇi hanti tāvanti/
GS41brhats_u:1040: 11.53ab/ ye śastās tān hitvā ketubhir *ādhūpite[K.ādhūmite] +atha vā
GS41brhats_u:1042: 11.53cd/ nakṣatre bhavati vadho yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ pravakṣye tān//
GS41brhats_u:1047: 11.56ab/ asikeśaṃ bhaujaṅge pitrye +aṅgaṃ pāṇḍyanātham api bhāgye/
GS41brhats_u:1051: 11.58ab/ ikṣvākur alaka*nāthaś[K.nāthau, K's tr. nātho] ca hanyate yadi
GS41brhats_u:1058: 11.60cd/ naimiṣanṛpaṃ kirātaṃ śravaṇādiṣu ṣaṭsv imān kramaśaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1063: 11.62b ṛkṣaṃ ca yat spṛśati tat kathitāṃś ca deśān/
GS41brhats_u:1068: 12.01b kṛtas toya^ucchittyā sapadi sutarāṃ yena ruciraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1072: 12.02cd/ nirgatais tad^uragaiś ca rājitaḥ sāgaro +adhikataraṃ virājitaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1086: kṛtān bāṇapuṣpair iva^uttaṃsakān dhārayadbhir mṛgendraiḥ sanāthīkṛta^antar^darī^nirjharam/
GS41brhats_u:1092: vindhyam astambhayad yaś ca tasya^udayaḥ śrūyatām//
GS41brhats_u:1094: 12.07cd/ hṛdayāni satām iva svabhāvāt punar ambūni bhavanti nirmalāni//
GS41brhats_u:1106: 12.11cd/ ratnaiḥ prabhūtaiḥ kusumaiḥ phalaiś ca bhūryacchatīvārgham
GS41brhats_u:1112: 12.13ab/ smaraṇād api pāpam apākurute kim uta stutibhir varuṇāṅgaruhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1115: 12.14ab/ saṃkhyāvidhānāt pratideśam asya vijñāya sandarśanam ādiśej jñaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1127: 12.17c bhavati yadi ca dadyāt sapta varṣāṇi samyag
GS41brhats_u:1129: 12.18ab/ dvijo yathālābham upāhṛtārghaḥ prāpnoti vedān pramadāś ca putrān/
GS41brhats_u:1130: 12.18cd/ vaiśyaś ca gāṃ bhūri ghanaṃ ca śūdro rogakṣayaṃ dharmaphalaṃ ca
GS41brhats_u:1132: 12.19a rogān karoti paruṣaḥ kapilas tv avṛṣṭiṃ
GS41brhats_u:1139: 12.21ab/ ulkayā vinihataḥ śikhinā vā kṣudbhayaṃ marakam eva
GS41brhats_u:1141: 12.21cd/ dṛśyate sa kila hastagate +arke rohiṇīm upagate +astam upaiti//
GS41brhats_u:1144: 13.01cd/ nāthavatīva ca dig yaiḥ kauverī saptabhir munibhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1147: 13.02cd/ yaiś cāram ahaṃ teṣāṃ kathayiṣye vṛddhagarga^matāt//
GS41brhats_u:1148: 13.03ab/ āsan maghāsu munayaḥ śāsati pṛthvīṃ yudhiṣṭhire nṛpatau/
GS41brhats_u:1150: 13.04ab/ ekaikasminn ṛkṣe śataṃ śataṃ te caranti varṣāṇām/
GS41brhats_u:1152: saṃyuktāḥ[K.prāguttarataś ca ete sadā udayante sasādhvīkāḥ]//
GS41brhats_u:1153: 13.05ab/ pūrve bhāge bhagavān marīcir apare sthito vasiṣṭho +asmāt/
GS41brhats_u:1155: 13.06ab/ pulahaḥ kratur iti bhagān āsannā anukrameṇa
GS41brhats_u:1159: 13.07cd/ hanyuḥ svaṃ svaṃ vargaṃ vipulāḥ snigdhāś ca tadvṛddhyai//
GS41brhats_u:1164: 13.10ab/ aṅgiraso jñānayutā dhīmanto brāhmaṇāś ca nirdiṣṭāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1167: 13.11cd/ pulahasya tu mūlaphalaṃ kratos tu yajñāḥ sayajñabhṛtaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1211: 14.21cd/ nirmaryādā mlecchā ye paścima^dik^sthitās te ca//
GS41brhats_u:1216: 14.24ab/ uttarataḥ kailāso himavān vasumān girir dhanuṣmāṃś ca/
GS41brhats_u:1217: 14.24cd/ krauñco meruḥ kuravas tathā^uttarāḥ kṣudramīnāś ca//
GS41brhats_u:1236: 14.32cd/ pāñcālo māgadhikaḥ kāliṅgaś ca kṣayaṃ yānti//
GS41brhats_u:1238: 14.33cd/ rājā ca hārahauro madreśo +anyaś ca kauṇindaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1271: 15.15cd/ ye sādhavaś ca loke sarvaṃ ca śaratsamutpannam//
GS41brhats_u:1276: 15.17cd/ bījāny atidhanayuktāḥ phalamūlair ye ca vartante//
GS41brhats_u:1281: 15.20ab/ śravaṇe māyāpaṭavo nityodyuktāś ca karmasu samarthāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1289: 15.23cd/ dharma^vratair virahitā niyuddha^kuśalāś ca ye manujāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1300: 15.28ab/ pūrvātrayaṃ sānalam agrajānāṃ rājñāṃ tu puṣyeṇa sahottarāṇi/
GS41brhats_u:1301: 15.28cd/ sapauṣṇa^maitraṃ pitṛdaivataṃ ca prajāpater bhaṃ ca kṛṣīvalānām//
GS41brhats_u:1305: 15.30cd/ sārpaṃ viśākhā śravaṇo bharaṇyaś caṇḍālajāter *abhinirdiśanti[K.iti nirdaśanti]//
GS41brhats_u:1307: 15.31cd/ grahaṇagatam atha^ulkayā hataṃ niyatam uṣākara^pīḍitaṃ ca yat//
GS41brhats_u:1308: 15.32ab/ tad upahatam iti pracakṣate prakṛti^viparyaya^yātam eva vā/
GS41brhats_u:1335: K.16.12cd/ ye ca pibanti sutoyāṃ tāpīṃ ye ca api gomatīsalilam //]
GS41brhats_u:1342: 16.15ab/ lohityaḥ sindhunadaḥ sarayūr gāmbhīrikā rathākhyā ca/
GS41brhats_u:1366: 16.26ab/ ye ca pibanti vitastām irāvatīṃ candrabhāga^saritaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:1375: 16.30cd/ naṣṭā yasmin deśe sarasvatī paścimo deśaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1396: 16.39d sa bhavati śivas teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ prabhuḥ parikīrtitaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1398: 16.40cd/ ḍamara^bhaya^gada^āturā janā narapatayaś ca bhavanti duḥkhitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1399: 16.41ab/ yadi na ripukṛtaṃ bhayaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ svasuta^kṛtaṃ niyamād amātyajaṃ vā/
GS41brhats_u:1400: 16.41cd/ bhavati janapadasya ca^apy avṛṣṭyā gamanam apūrvapura^adri^nimnagāsu//
GS41brhats_u:1410: 17.04ab/ bhede vṛṣṭivināśo bhedaḥ suhṛdāṃ mahākulānāṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:1413: 17.05cd/ yuddhe ca^apy apasavye bhavanti yuddhāni bhūpānām//
GS41brhats_u:1414: 17.06ab/ ravir ākrando madhye pauraḥ pūrve +apare sthito yāyī/
GS41brhats_u:1418: 17.08ab/ paure paureṇa hate paurāḥ paurān nṛpān vinighnanti/
GS41brhats_u:1421: 17.09cd/ adhirūḍho vikṛto niṣprabho vivarṇaś ca yaḥ sa jitaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1424: 17.11ab/ dvāv api mayūkhayuktau vipulau snigdhau samāgame bhavataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1427: 17.12ab/ yuddhaṃ samāgamo vā yady avyaktau *svalakṣaṇair[K.tu lakṣaṇair]
GS41brhats_u:1429: 17.12cd/ bhuvi bhūbhṛtām api tathā phalam avyaktaṃ vinirdeśyam//
GS41brhats_u:1433: 17.14ab/ saureṇa^are vijite jayanti paurāḥ prajāś ca sīdanti/
GS41brhats_u:1444: 17.19ab/ bhaumena hate jīve madhyo deśo nareśvarā gāvaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1447: 17.20cd/ upayānti madhyadeśaś ca saṃkṣayaṃ yac ca bhaktiphalam//
GS41brhats_u:1448: 17.21ab/ śukre bṛhaspati^*jite[K.hate] yāyī śreṣṭho vināśam upayāti/
GS41brhats_u:1449: 17.21cd/ brahmakṣatravirodhaḥ salilaṃ ca na vāsavas tyajati//
GS41brhats_u:1451: 17.22cd/ mahatīṃ vrajanti pīḍāṃ napuṃsakāḥ śūrasenāś ca//
GS41brhats_u:1456: 17.24cd/ jalajāś ca nipīḍyante sāmānyaṃ bhaktiphalam anyat//
GS41brhats_u:1462: 17.27cd/ phalaṃ tu vācyaṃ graha^bhaktito +anyad yathā tathā ghnanti hatāḥ
GS41brhats_u:1465: 18.01ab/ bhānāṃ yathāsambhavam uttareṇa yāto grahāṇāṃ yadi vā śaśāṅkaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1466: 18.01cd/ pradakṣiṇaṃ tat^*śubhadaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ[K.śubhakṛnnarāṇāṃ] yāmyena yāto na śivaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1467: 18.02ab/ candramā yadi kujasya yāty udak pārvatīya^balaśālināṃ jayaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1469: 18.03ab/ uttarataḥ svasutasya śaśaṅkaḥ paura^jayāya subhikṣa^karaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:1470: 18.03cd/ sasya^cayaṃ kurute janahārdiṃ kośa^cayaṃ ca narādhipatīnām//
GS41brhats_u:1472: 18.04cd/ dharmasya deśasya ca madhyamasya vṛddhiḥ subhikṣaṃ muditāḥ prajāś ca//
GS41brhats_u:1473: 18.05ab/ bhārgavasya yadi yāty udak śaśī kośa^yukta^gaja^vāji^vṛddhidaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1474: 18.05cd/ yāyināṃ ca vijayo dhanuṣmatāṃ sasyasampad api ca^uttamā tadā//
GS41brhats_u:1475: 18.06ab/ ravijasya śaśī pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryāc cet purabhūbhṛtāṃ jayaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1478: 18.07ab/ yeṣām udag gaccchati bhagrahāṇāṃ prāleyaraśmir nirupadravaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:1482: 18.08b bhavati tad apasavye sarvam eva pratīpam/
GS41brhats_u:1484: 18.08d na khalu bhavati yuddhaṃ sākam indor graha^ṛkṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1496: 19.03c ghnanto nṛpā yudhi nṛpa^anucaraiś ca deśān
GS41brhats_u:1515: 19.08b muñcanti *kutra cid[K.na kva cid] apaḥ pracuraṃ payodāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1516: 19.08c sīmni prajātam api śoṣam upaiti sasyaṃ
GS41brhats_u:1527: 19.11b samyak caraty api manor iva daṇḍanītiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1541: 19.15ab/ vividhair viyad unnataiḥ payodair vṛtam urvīṃ
GS41brhats_u:1571: 19.22c yad aśubham aśubhe +abde māsajaṃ tasya vṛddhiḥ
GS41brhats_u:1574: 20.01ab/ yasyāṃ diśi dṛśyante viśanti tārāgrahā raviṃ sarve/
GS41brhats_u:1578: 20.03ab/ yasmin khāṃśe dṛśyā grahamālā dinakare dināntagate/
GS41brhats_u:1579: 20.03cd/ tatra +anyo bhavati nṛpaḥ paracakra^upadravaś ca mahān//
GS41brhats_u:1580: 20.04ab/ *tasminn[K.yasminn] ṛkṣe kuryuḥ samāgamaṃ tajjanān grahā hanyuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1584: 20.05cd/ kośaś cety eteṣām abhidhāsye lakṣaṇaṃ saphalaṃ//
GS41brhats_u:1585: 20.06ab/ eka^ṛkṣe catvāraḥ saha paurair yāyino +atha vā pañca/
GS41brhats_u:1587: 20.07ab/ pauraḥ paurasameto yāyī saha yāyinā samājākhyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1589: 20.08ab/ uditaḥ paścād ekaḥ prāk cānyo yadi sa sannipātākhyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1590: 20.08cd/ avikṛtatanavaḥ snigdhā vipulāś ca samāgame dhanyāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1591: 20.09ab/ samau tu saṃvartasamāgamākhyau sammoha^kośau bhayadau prajānām/
GS41brhats_u:1595: 21.01ab/ annaṃ jagataḥ prāṇāḥ prāvṛṭkālasya cānnam āyattam/
GS41brhats_u:1597: 21.02ab/ tallakṣaṇāni munibhir yāni nibaddhāni tāni dṛṣṭvā^idam/
GS41brhats_u:1601: 21.03cd/ tasya muner iva vāṇī na bhavati mithyāmbunirdeśe//
GS41brhats_u:1602: 21.04ab/ kiṃ vātaḥ param anyat^*śāstrajyāyo[K.śāstraṃ jyāyo] +asti yad
GS41brhats_u:1604: 21.04cd/ pradhvaṃsiny api kāle trikāladarśī kalau bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:1605: 21.05ab/ ke cid vadanti *kārtika[K.kārttika]śuklāntam atītya garbhadivasāḥ syuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1606: 21.05cd/ na *ca[K.tu] tanmataṃ bahūnāṃ garga^ādīnāṃ mataṃ vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:1609: 21.06cd/ pūrvāṃ vā samupagate garbhāṇāṃ lakṣaṇam jñeyam//
GS41brhats_u:1610: 21.07ab/ yannakṣatram upagate garbhaś candre bhavet sa candravaśāt/
GS41brhats_u:1612: 21.08ab/ sita^pakṣa^bhavāḥ kṛṣṇe śukle kṛṣṇā dyusambhavā rātrau/
GS41brhats_u:1623: 21.13ab/ pūrva^udbhūtāḥ paścād aparotthāḥ prāg bhavanti jīmūtāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1624: 21.13cd/ śeṣāsv api dikṣv evaṃ viparyayo bhavati vāyoś ca//
GS41brhats_u:1636: 21.18ab/ garbhāṇāṃ puṣṭikarāḥ sarveṣām eva yo +atra tu viśeṣaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1642: 21.20cd/ atiśītaṃ saghanasya ca bhānor astodayau dhanyau//
GS41brhats_u:1644: 21.21cd/ pariveṣāś cāsakalāḥ kapilas tāmro raviś ca śubhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1650: 21.24cd/ ruṣitā iva dhārābhir visṛjanty ambhaḥ prasavakāle//
GS41brhats_u:1654: 21.26cd/ ity utpātair etais trividhaiś cānyair hato garbhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1655: 21.27ab/ svartu^svabhāva^janitaiḥ sāmānyair yaiś ca lakṣaṇair vṛddhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1656: 21.27cd/ garbhāṇām viparītais tair eva viparyayo bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:1658: 21.28cd/ sarveṣv ṛtuṣu vivṛddho garbho bahutoyado bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:1660: 21.29cd/ puṣṇāti bahūn divasān hanty utpātair hatas trividhaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1661: 21.30ab/ mṛgamāsa^ādiṣv aṣṭau ṣaṭ ṣoḍaśa viṃśatiś caturyuktā/
GS41brhats_u:1667: 21.32ab[K.21.36ab]/ droṇaḥ pañcanimitte garbhe trīṇy āḍhakāni pavanena/
GS41brhats_u:1668: 21.32cd[K.21.36cd]/ ṣaḍ vidyutā navābhraiḥ stanitena dvādaśa prasave//
GS41brhats_u:1673: 21.35ab/ garbhaḥ puṣṭaḥ prasave graha^upaghāta^ādibhir yadi na vṛṣṭaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1675: 21.36ab/ kāṭhinyaṃ yāti yathā cira^kāla^dhṛtaṃ payaḥ payasvinyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1685: 22.02cd/ śrāvaṇapūrvā jñeyāḥ parisrutā dhāraṇās tāḥ syuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1686: 22.03ab/ yadi tā syur ekarūpāḥ śubhās tataḥ sāntarās tu na śivāya/
GS41brhats_u:1693: 22.06ab/ sapāṃśuvarṣāḥ sāpaś ca śubhā bālakriyā api/
GS41brhats_u:1702: 23.01cd/ śubham aśubhaṃ vā vācyaṃ parimāṇaṃ ca^ambhasas tajjñaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:1704: 23.02cd/ pañcāśat palam āḍhakam anena minuyāj jalaṃ patitam//
GS41brhats_u:1705: 23.03ab/ yena dharitrī mudrā janitā vā bindavas tṛṇā^āgreṣu/
GS41brhats_u:1706: 23.03cd/ vṛṣṭena tena vācyaṃ parimāṇaṃ vāriṇaḥ prathamam//
GS41brhats_u:1707: 23.04ab/ ke cid yathābhivṛṣṭaṃ daśa^yojana^maṇḍalaṃ vadanty anye/
GS41brhats_u:1709: 23.05ab/ yeṣu ca bheṣv abhivṛṣṭaṃ bhūyas teṣv eva varṣati prāyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:1710: 23.05cd/ yadi na^āpya^ādiṣu vṛṣṭaṃ sarveṣu tadā tv anāvṛṣṭiḥ//
