GS41brhats_u:2419: K.38.04cd/ sthagayann iva gagana^talaṃ bhayam atyugraṃ nivedayati//
GS41brhats_u:2421: K.38.05cd/ kṣemāya ca śeṣāṇāṃ vicakṣaṇānāṃ narendrāṇām//
GS41brhats_u:2422: K.38.06ab/ rajanīdvayaṃ visarpati yasmin rāṣṭre rajoghanaṃ bahulam/
GS41brhats_u:2423: K.38.06cd/ paracakrasya āgamanaṃ tasminn api sanniboddhavyam//
GS41brhats_u:2424: K.38.07ab/ nipatati rajanītritayaṃ catuṣkam apy annarasavināśāya/
GS41brhats_u:2425: K.38.07cd/ rājñāṃ sainyakṣobho rajasi bhavet pañcarātrabhave//
GS41brhats_u:2426: K.38.08ab/ ketvādyudayavimuktaṃ yadā rajo bhavati tīvrabhayadāyi/
GS41brhats_u:2427: K.38.08cd/ śiśirād anyatrartau phalam avikalam āhu ācāryāḥ//]
GS41brhats_u:2429: 38.01ab/ pavanaḥ pavana^abhihato gaganād avanau yadā samāpatati/
GS41brhats_u:2430: 38.01cd/ bhavati tadā nirghātaḥ sa ca pāpo dīpta^vihaga^rutaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2434: 38.03cd/ vaiśya^jaladāṃs tṛtīye caurān prahare caturthe tu//
GS41brhats_u:2435: 38.04ab/ astaṃ yāte nīcān prathame yāme nihanti sasyāni/
GS41brhats_u:2437: 38.05ab/ turaga^kariṇas tṛtīye vinihanyād yāyinaś caturthe ca/
GS41brhats_u:2438: 38.05cd/ bhairava^jarjaraśabdo yāti yatas tāṃ diśaṃ hanti//
GS41brhats_u:2448: 39.04ab/ arkāt site dvitīye budhe +atha vā yugapad eva vā sthitayoḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2449: 39.04cd/ vyayagatayor api tadvan niṣpattir atīva gurudṛṣṭyā//
GS41brhats_u:2450: 39.05ab/ śubhamadhye +alini sūryād guruśaśinoḥ saptame parā sampat/
GS41brhats_u:2453: 39.06cd/ sasyasya parā sampat karmaṇi jīve gavāṃ ca^agryā//
GS41brhats_u:2454: 39.07ab/ kumbhe gurur gavi śaśī sūryo +alimukhe kuja^arkajau makare/
GS41brhats_u:2456: 39.08ab/ madhye pāpagrahayoḥ sūryaḥ sasyaṃ vināśayaty aligaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2459: 39.09cd/ sasyaṃ nihanti paścād uptaṃ niṣpādayed vyaktam//
GS41brhats_u:2461: 39.10cd/ sasya^vipattiṃ kurutaḥ saumyair dṛṣṭau na sarvatra//
GS41brhats_u:2465: 39.12cd/ vijñeyaḥ sasyānāṃ nāśāya śivāya vā tajjñaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2466: 39.13ab/ triṣu meṣa^ādiṣu sūryaḥ saumyayuto vīkṣito +api vā vicaran/
GS41brhats_u:2472: 40.01ab/ ye yeṣāṃ dravyāṇām adhipatayo rāśayaḥ samuddiṣṭāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2483: 40.06ab/ aṣṭamarāśāv ikṣuḥ saikyaṃ lohāny aja^āvikaṃ ca^api/
GS41brhats_u:2488: 40.08cd/ snehāś ca naikarūpā vyākhyātā matsyajātaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:2491: 40.10ab/ ṣaṭ^saptamago hāniṃ vṛddhiṃ śukraḥ karoti śeṣeṣu/
GS41brhats_u:2493: 40.11ab/ rāśer yasya krūrāḥ pīḍāsthāneṣu saṃsthitā balinaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2495: 40.12ab/ iṣṭasthāne saumyā balino yeṣāṃ bhavanti rāśīnām/
GS41brhats_u:2498: 40.13ab/ gocara^pīḍāyām api rāśir balibhiḥ śubhagrahair dṛṣṭaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2499: 40.13cd/ pīḍāṃ na karoti tathā krūrair evaṃ viparyāsaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2503: 41.02ab/ brūyād arghaviśeṣān pratimāsaṃ rāśiṣu kramāt sūrye/
GS41brhats_u:2504: 41.02cd/ anyatithāv utpātā ye te ḍamarārtaye rājñām//
GS41brhats_u:2507: 41.04ab/ mithunasthe sarvarasān dhānyāni ca saṃgrahaṃ samupanīya/
GS41brhats_u:2514: 41.07cd/ ṣaṣṭhe māse dviguṇaṃ lābham avāpnoti vikrīṇan//
GS41brhats_u:2520: 41.10cd/ muktāphalāni ca tato varṣārdhād dviguṇatāṃ yānti//
GS41brhats_u:2523: 41.11cd/ sthitvā māsaṃ dadyāl lābhārthī dviguṇam āpnoti//
GS41brhats_u:2526: 41.13ab/ rāśau rāśau yasmin śiśiramayūkhaḥ sahasrakiraṇo vā/
GS41brhats_u:2530: 41.14c aśubhasahitaḥ sandṛṣṭo vā hinasty atha vā raviḥ
GS41brhats_u:2533: 42.01ab/ brahmāṇam ūcur amarā bhagavan śaktāḥ sma nāsurān samare/
GS41brhats_u:2535: 42.02ab/ devān uvāca bhagavān kṣīrode keśavaḥ sa vaḥ ketum/
GS41brhats_u:2536: 42.02cd/ yaṃ dāsyati taṃ dṛṣṭvā na^ājau sthāsyanti vo daityāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2537: 42.03ab/ labdhavarāḥ kṣīrodaṃ gatvā te tuṣṭuvuḥ surāḥ sa^indrāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2542: 42.05ab/ taiḥ saṃstutaḥ sa devas tutoṣa nārāyaṇo dadau caiṣām/
GS41brhats_u:2544: 42.06ab/ taṃ viṣṇu^tejo^bhavam aṣṭacakre rathe sthitaṃ bhāsvati
GS41brhats_u:2546: 42.06cd/ dedīpyamānaṃ śaradi^iva sūryaṃ dhvajaṃ samāsādya mumoda śakraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2552: 42.08cd/ yaṣṭiṃ tāṃ sa narendro vidhivat sampūjayām āsa//
GS41brhats_u:2553: 42.09ab/ prīto mahena *maghavā[K.maghavān] prāha^evaṃ ye nṛpāḥ kariṣyanti/
GS41brhats_u:2555: 42.10ab/ muditāḥ prajāś ca teṣāṃ bhayaroga^vivarjitāḥ prabhūtānnāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2556: 42.10cd/ dhvaja^eva ca^abhidhāsyati jagati nimittaiḥ phalaṃ sadasat//
GS41brhats_u:2557: 42.11ab/ pūjā tasya narendrair bala^vṛddhi^jaya^arthibhir yathā pūrvam/
GS41brhats_u:2560: 42.12cd/ prāsthānikair vanam iyād daivajñaḥ sūtradhāraś ca//
GS41brhats_u:2564: 42.14cd/ ye ca syuḥ strīsaṃjñā na te śubhāḥ śakraketvarthe//
GS41brhats_u:2569: 42.16cd/ vijane sametya rātrau spṛṣṭvā brūyād imaṃ mantram//
GS41brhats_u:2570: 42.17ab/ yānīha vṛkṣe bhūtāni tebhyaḥ svasti namo +astu vaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2572: 42.18ab/ pārthivas tvāṃ varayate svasti te +astu nagottama/
GS41brhats_u:2574: 42.19ab/ chindyāt prabhātasamaye vṛkṣam udak prāṅmukho +api vā bhūtvā/
GS41brhats_u:2575: 42.19cd/ paraśor jarjaraśabdo na^iṣṭaḥ snigdho ghanaś ca hitaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2576: 42.20ab/ nṛpa^jayadam avidhvaṃstaṃ patanam anākuñcitaṃ ca pūrvodak/
GS41brhats_u:2577: 42.20cd/ avilagnaṃ ca^anyatarau viparītam atas tyajet patitam//
GS41brhats_u:2578: 42.21ab/ chittvāgre catur^aṅgulam aṣṭau mūle jale kṣiped yaṣṭim/
GS41brhats_u:2579: 42.21cd/ uddhṛtya puradvāraṃ śakaṭena nayen manuṣyair vā//
GS41brhats_u:2580: 42.22ab/ arabhaṅge balabhedo nemyā nāśo balasya vijñeyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2595: 42.29ab/ santakṣya punas takṣā vidhivad yaṣṭiṃ praropayed yantre/
GS41brhats_u:2618: 42.37ab/ uktaṃ yad uttiṣṭhati śakraketau śubha^aśubhaṃ saptamarīcirūpaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2622: 42.39ab/ śakra^kumāryaḥ kāryāḥ prāha manuḥ sapta pañca vā tajjñaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2627: 42.41ab/ prītaiḥ kṛtāni vibudhair yāni purā bhūṣaṇāni suraketoḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2633: 42.43ab/ aṣṭāśri nīlaraktaṃ tṛtīyam indreṇa bhūṣaṇaṃ dattam/
GS41brhats_u:2634: 42.43cd/ asitaṃ yamaś caturthaṃ masūrakaṃ kāntimad ayacchat//
GS41brhats_u:2637: 42.45ab/ skandhaḥ svaṃ keyūraṃ saptamam adadad dhvajāya bahucitram/
GS41brhats_u:2644: 42.48ab/ kiñ cid adhaūrdhva^*nirmitam[K.nirnatam] upari viśālaṃ trayodaśaṃ
GS41brhats_u:2652: 42.51ab/ kuryād ahani caturthe pūraṇam indradhvajasya śāstrajñaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2653: 42.51cd/ manunā ca^āgamagītān mantrān etān paṭhen niyataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2658: 42.53ab/ yathā tvam ūrjaskaraṇa^ekarūpaiḥ samarcitas tv ābharaṇair
GS41brhats_u:2660: 42.53cd/ tatheha tāny ābharaṇāni *yāge[K.deva] śubhāni samprītamanā gṛhāṇa//
GS41brhats_u:2661: 42.54ab/ ajo +avyayaḥ śāśvata ekarūpo viṣṇur varāhaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2666: 42.55cd/ hvayāmi śakraṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ suṣeṇam asmākaṃ vīrā *uttarā[K.uttare]
GS41brhats_u:2668: 42.56ab/ prapūraṇe ca^ucchrayaṇe praveśe snāne tathā mālyavidhau visarge/
GS41brhats_u:2669: 42.56cd/ paṭhed imān nṛpatiḥ sopavāso mantrān śubhān puruhūtasya ketoḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2672: 42.57cd/ savyāla^siṃhaiḥ piṭakair gavākṣair alaṅkṛtaṃ dikṣu ca lokapālaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2688: 42.61c utthānam iṣṭam aśubhaṃ yad ato +anyathā syāt
GS41brhats_u:2703: 42.65b vyālaiś ca bhagna^patitair na bhavaty amātyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2709: 42.66d tattat tādṛg bhāvi pāpaṃ śubhaṃ vā//
GS41brhats_u:2715: 42.68cd/ vidhim imam anumanya pārthivo na ripukṛtaṃ bhayam āpnuyād iti//
GS41brhats_u:2730: 43.07ab/ abhyarcitā na paruṣaṃ vaktavyā nāpi tāḍanīyās te/
GS41brhats_u:2732: 43.08ab/ prāpte aṣṭame +ahni kuryād udaṅmukhaṃ toraṇasya dakṣiṇataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2733: 43.08cd/ kuśa^cīra^āvṛtam āśramam agniṃ purato +asya vedyāṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:2743: 43.12cd/ sruk kanakād rajatād vā kartavyā bhūtikāmena//
GS41brhats_u:2744: 43.13ab/ pūrva^abhimukhaḥ śrīmān vaiyāghre carmaṇi sthito rājā/
GS41brhats_u:2746: 43.14ab/ yātrāyāṃ yad abhihitaṃ grahayajña^vidhau mahendraketau ca/
GS41brhats_u:2748: 43.15ab/ lakṣaṇayuktaṃ turagaṃ dviradavaraṃ ca^eva dīkṣitaṃ snātam/
GS41brhats_u:2753: 43.17ab/ yady ānītas tiṣṭhed dakṣiṇacaraṇaṃ hayaḥ samutkṣipya/
GS41brhats_u:2754: 43.17cd/ sa jayati tadā narendraḥ śatrūn *nacirād[K.acirād] vinā yatnāt//
GS41brhats_u:2755: 43.18ab/ trasyan na^iṣṭo rājñaḥ pariśeṣaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ dvipa^hayānām/
GS41brhats_u:2756: 43.18cd/ yātrāyāṃ vyākhyātaṃ tad iha vicintyaṃ yathāyukti//
GS41brhats_u:2757: 43.19ab/ piṇḍam abhimantrya dadyāt purohito vājine sa yadi jighret/
GS41brhats_u:2763: 43.22ab/ khalinaṃ hayāya dadyād abhimantrya purohitas tato rājā/
GS41brhats_u:2768: 43.24ab/ haṃsa^paṅktibhir itas tato +adrirāṭ sampatadbhir iva śuklacāmaraiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2773: 43.26ab/ utpatadbhir iva khaṃ turaṅgamair dārayadbhir iva dantibhir
GS41brhats_u:2775: 43.26cd/ nirjita^aribhir iva^amarair naraiḥ śakravat parivṛto vrajen
GS41brhats_u:2782: 43.28cd/ nirvikāram ari^pakṣa^bhīṣaṇaṃ yasya sainyam acirāt sa gāṃ jayet//
GS41brhats_u:2784: 44.01ab/ khañjanako nāma^ayaṃ yo vihagas tasya darśane prathame/
GS41brhats_u:2785: 44.01cd/ proktāni yāni munibhiḥ phalāni tāni pravakṣyāmi//
GS41brhats_u:2788: 44.03ab/ kṛṣṇo gale +asya binduḥ sita^karaṭāntaḥ sa riktakṛd riktaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2789: 44.03cd/ pīto gopīta iti kleśakaraḥ khañjano dṛṣṭaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2800: 44.08cd/ pṛṣṭhe tv aja^āvikānāṃ priya^saṅgamam āvahaty āśu//
GS41brhats_u:2803: 44.10ab/ pakṣau dhunvan na śubhaḥ śubhaḥ piban vāri nimnagā^saṃsthaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2806: 44.11ab/ nīrājane nivṛtte yayā diśā khañjanaṃ nṛpo yāntam/
GS41brhats_u:2807: 44.11cd/ paśyet tayā gatasya kṣipram arātir vaśam upaiti//
GS41brhats_u:2808: 44.12a tasmin nidhir bhavati maithunam eti yasmin
GS41brhats_u:2809: 44.12b yasmiṃs tu chardayati tatra tale +asti kācam/
GS41brhats_u:2814: 44.14ab/ nṛpatir api śubhaṃ śubhapradeśe khagam avalokya mahītale
GS41brhats_u:2817: 44.15ab/ aśubham api vilokya khañjanaṃ dvija^guru^sādhu^sura^arcane rataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2818: 44.15cd/ na nṛpatir aśubhaṃ *samāpnuyāt[K.samāpnuyān] na yadi dināni ca sapta māṃsabhuk//
GS41brhats_u:2819: 44.16ab/ āvarṣāt prathame darśane phalaṃ pratidinaṃ tu
GS41brhats_u:2823: 45.01ab/ yān atrer utpātān gargaḥ provāca tān ahaṃ vakṣye/
GS41brhats_u:2827: 45.03ab/ manujānām apacārād aparaktā devatāḥ sṛjanty etān/
GS41brhats_u:2831: 45.05ab/ bhaumaṃ cara^sthira^bhavaṃ tat^śāntibhir āhataṃ śamam upaiti/
GS41brhats_u:2832: 45.05cd/ nābhasam upaiti mṛdutāṃ śāmyati no divyam ity eke//
GS41brhats_u:2836: 45.07cd/ pākam upayāti daivaṃ parikalpitam aṣṭadhā nṛpateḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2851: 45.14cd/ māsaiś ca^apy aṣṭābhiḥ sarveṣām eva phalapākaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2852: 45.15ab/ buddhvā devavikāraṃ śuciḥ purodhās tryaha^uṣitaḥ snātaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2856: 45.16cd/ sthālīpākaṃ juhuyād vidhivan mantraiś ca tal^liṅgaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2859: 45.17c vidhivad avani^pālair yaiḥ prayuktā na teṣāṃ
GS41brhats_u:2861: 45.18ab/ rāṣṭre yasya^anagniḥ pradīpyate dīpyate ca na^indhanavān/
GS41brhats_u:2864: 45.19cd/ sainya^grāma^pureṣu ca nāśo vahner bhayaṃ kurute//
GS41brhats_u:2868: 45.21cd/ vyabhre niśy uḍunāśo darśanam api ca^ahni doṣakaram//
GS41brhats_u:2880: 45.26ab/ rāṣṭra^vibhedas tv anṛtau bālavadho +atīva kusumite bāle/
GS41brhats_u:2882: 45.27ab/ madye vāhana^nāśaḥ saṃgrāmaḥ śoṇite madhuni rogaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2885: 45.28cd/ patitānām utthāne svayaṃ bhayaṃ daivajanitaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:2886: 45.29ab/ pūjitavṛkṣe hy anṛtau kusumaphalaṃ nṛpa^vadhāya nirdiṣṭam/
GS41brhats_u:2887: 45.29cd/ dhūmas tasmin jvālā +atha vā bhaven nṛpa^vadhāya^eva//
GS41brhats_u:2888: 45.30ab/ sarpatsu taruṣu jalpatsu vā^api jana^saṃkṣayo vinirdiṣṭaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2892: 45.31cd/ kṛtvā śivaṃ rudrajapo +atra kāryo rudrebhya ity atra *ṣaḍ eva
GS41brhats_u:2896: 45.32cd/ medinī nigaditā^atra dakṣiṇā vaikṛte tarukṛte hitārthibhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2898: 45.33cd/ kathayati tadadhipatīnāṃ yamalaṃ jātaṃ ca kusumaphalam//
GS41brhats_u:2900: 45.34cd/ bhavati hi yady ekasmin paracakrasya^āgamo niyamāt//
GS41brhats_u:2901: 45.35ab/ ardhena yadā tailaṃ bhavati tilānām atailatā vā syāt/
GS41brhats_u:2902: 45.35cd/ annasya ca vairasyaṃ tadā tu vindyād bhayaṃ sumahat//
GS41brhats_u:2903: 45.36ab/ vikṛta^kusumaṃ phalam vā grāmād atha vā purād vahiḥ[K.ū.bahiḥ]
GS41brhats_u:2905: 45.36cd/ saumyo +atra caruḥ kāryo nirvāpyo vā paśuḥ śāntyai//
GS41brhats_u:2921: 45.42ab/ upalā vinā jaladharair vikṛtā vā prāṇino yadā vṛṣṭāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2926: K. 46.43cd/ deśavināśo jñeyo +asṛgvarṣe ca api nṛpa^yuddham//]
GS41brhats_u:2927: 45.43ab/ yady amale +arke chāyā na dṛśyate pratīpā vā/
GS41brhats_u:2929: 45.44ab/ vyabhre nabhasi^indradhanur divā yadā dṛśyate +atha vā rātrau/
GS41brhats_u:2930: 45.44cd/ prācyām aparasyāṃ vā tadā bhavet kṣudbhyaṃ sumahat//
GS41brhats_u:2933: 45.45cd/ dhānya^anna^go^kāñcana^dakṣiṇāś ca deyās tataḥ śāntim upaiti pāpam//
GS41brhats_u:2934: 45.46ab/ apasarpaṇaṃ nadīnām nagarād acireṇa śūnyatāṃ kurute/
GS41brhats_u:2942: 45.50ab/ salila^vikāre kuryāt pūjāṃ varuṇasya vāruṇair mantraiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2943: 45.50cd/ tair eva ca japa^homaṃ śamam evaṃ pāpam upayāti//
GS41brhats_u:2948: 45.52cd/ ṣaṇmāsāt sūtiphalaṃ śāntau ślokau ca garga^uktau//
GS41brhats_u:2949: 45.53ab/ nāryaḥ parasya viṣaye tyaktavyās tā hita^arthinā/
GS41brhats_u:2950: 45.53cd/ tarpayec ca dvijān kāmaiḥ śāntiṃ ca^eva^atra kārayet//
GS41brhats_u:2952: 45.54cd/ nagaraṃ svāminaṃ yūtham anyathā tu vināśayet//
GS41brhats_u:2953: 45.55ab/ parayonāv abhigamanaṃ bhavati tiraścām asādhu dhenūnām/
GS41brhats_u:2954: 45.55cd/ ukṣāṇo vā^anyonyaṃ pibati śvā vā surabhi^putram//
GS41brhats_u:2957: 45.57ab/ tyāgo vivāsanaṃ dānaṃ tat tasya^āśu śubhaṃ bhavet/
GS41brhats_u:2958: 45.57cd/ tarpayed brāhmaṇāṃś ca^atra japa^homāṃś ca kārayet//
GS41brhats_u:2961: 45.59ab/ yānaṃ vāha^viyuktaṃ yadi gacchen na vrajec ca vāha^yutam/
GS41brhats_u:2962: 45.59cd/ rāṣṭra^bhayaṃ bhavati tadā cakrāṇāṃ sāda^bhaṅge ca//
GS41brhats_u:2967: 45.61ab[K.46.62ab]/ anabhihata^tūrya^nādaḥ śabdo vā tāḍiteṣu yadi na syāt/
GS41brhats_u:2968: 45.61cd[K.46.62cd]/ vyutpattau vā teṣāṃ para^āgamo nṛpati^maraṇaṃ vā//
GS41brhats_u:2970: 45.62cd/ kroṣṭuka^nāde ca tathā śastra^bhayaṃ munivacaś ca^idam//
GS41brhats_u:2971: 45.63ab/ vāyavyeṣv eṣu nṛpatir vāyuṃ śaktubhir arcayet/
GS41brhats_u:2972: 45.63cd/ āvāyor iti pañcarco *japtavyāḥ[K.jāpyāś ca] prayatair dvijaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2975: 45.65ab/ pura^pakṣiṇo vanacarā vanyā vā nirbhayā viśanti puram/
GS41brhats_u:2976: 45.65cd/ naktaṃ vā divasa^carāḥ kṣapā^carā vā caranty ahani//
GS41brhats_u:2977: 45.66ab/ sandhyā^dvaye +api maṇḍalam ābadhnanto mṛgā vihaṅgā vā/
GS41brhats_u:2978: 45.66cd/ dīptāyāṃ diśy atha vā krośantaḥ saṃhatā bhayadāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2979: 45.67ab/ *śyenāḥ[K.śvānaḥ] prarudanta iva dvāre krośanti jambukā dīptāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:2980: 45.67cd/ praviśen narendra^bhavane kapotakaḥ kauśiko yadi vā//
GS41brhats_u:2989: 45.71cd/ devāḥ kapota iti ca japtavyāḥ pañcabhir dvijaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:2990: 45.72ab/ sudevā iti ca^ekena deyā gāvaḥ *sadakṣiṇāḥ[K.ca dakṣiṇā]/
GS41brhats_u:2995: 45.74cd/ chidra^abhāve bhūmer daraṇaṃ kampaś ca bhayakārī//
GS41brhats_u:3000: 45.76ab/ prahara hara chindhi bhindhi^ity āyudha^kāṣṭha^aśma^pāṇayo bālāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3001: 45.76cd/ nigadantaḥ praharante tatra^api bhayaṃ bhavaty āśu//
GS41brhats_u:3003: 45.77cd/ nāyaka^citritam atha vā kṣaye kṣayaṃ yāti na cireṇa//
GS41brhats_u:3005: 45.78cd/ nitya^ucchiṣṭa^strīkaṃ ca yad gṛhaṃ tat kṣayaṃ yāti//
GS41brhats_u:3006: 45.79ab/ dṛṣṭeṣu yātudhāneṣu nirdiśen marakam āśu samprāptam/
GS41brhats_u:3012: 45.82ab/ ye ca na doṣān janayanty utpātās tān ṛtu^svabhāva^kṛtān/
GS41brhats_u:3022: 45.86cd/ saritāṃ ca^ambu^saṃśoṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā grīṣme śubhaṃ vadet//
GS41brhats_u:3030: 45.90cd/ sasya^vṛddhir apāṃ hānir apāpāḥ śaradi smṛtāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3034: 45.92cd/ uccaiḥ sūrya^udaya^astau ca hemante śobhanāḥ smṛtāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3039: 45.95ab/ ṛtu^svabhāva^jā hy ete dṛṣṭāḥ sva^ṛtau śubha^pradāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3041: 45.96ab/ unmattānāṃ ca yā gāthāḥ śiśūnāṃ *yac ca bhāṣitam[K.bhāṣitaṃ ca
GS41brhats_u:3043: 45.96cd/ striyo yac ca prabhāṣante tasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3045: 45.97cd/ na^acoditā vāg vadati satyā hy eṣā sarasvatī//
GS41brhats_u:3051: 46.01ab/ divya^āntarikṣa^āśrayam uktam ādau mayā phalaṃ śastam aśobhanaṃ
GS41brhats_u:3053: 46.01cd/ prāyeṇa cāreṣu samāgameṣu yuddheṣu mārga^ādiṣu vistareṇa//
GS41brhats_u:3055: 46.02b kartuṃ samāsakṛd asav iti tasya doṣaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3059: 46.03cd/ bravīmy ahaṃ na ced idaṃ tathā +api me +atra vācyatā//
GS41brhats_u:3063: 46.05ab/ koṣṭhāgāra^gate bhṛgu^putre puṣyasthe ca girām prabhaviṣṇau/
GS41brhats_u:3064: 46.05cd/ nirvairāḥ kṣitipāḥ sukhabhājaḥ saṃhṛṣṭāś ca janā gatarogāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3065: 46.06ab/ pīḍayanti yadi kṛttikāṃ maghāṃ rohiṇīṃ śravam aindram eva vā/
GS41brhats_u:3066: 46.06cd/ projjhya sūryam apare grahās tadā paścimā dig anayena pīḍyate//
GS41brhats_u:3071: 46.08ab/ dakṣiṇāṃ kakubham *āśritas[K.āśritais] tu tair dakṣiṇāpathapayomucāṃ kṣayaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3074: 46.09ab/ uttaramārge spaṣṭa^mayūkhāḥ śāntikarās te tan nṛpatīnām/
GS41brhats_u:3084: 46.12a munīn abhijitaṃ dhruvaṃ maghavataś ca bhaṃ saṃspṛśan
GS41brhats_u:3087: 46.12d kṣayaṃ vrajati vidruto janapadaś ca bālākulaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3088: 46.13ab/ prāgdvāreṣu caran raviputro nakṣatreṣu karoti ca vakram/
GS41brhats_u:3089: 46.13cd/ durbhikṣaṃ kurute *mahadugraṃ[K.bhayam ugraṃ] mitrāṇāṃ ca virodham avṛṣṭim//
GS41brhats_u:3090: 46.14ab/ rohiṇīśakaṭam arkanandano yadi bhinatti rudhiro +atha vā śikhī/
GS41brhats_u:3091: 46.14cd/ kiṃ vadāmi yad aniṣṭasāgare jagad aśeṣam upayāti saṃkṣayam//
GS41brhats_u:3092: 46.15ab/ udayati satataṃ yadā śikhī carati bhacakram aśeṣam eva vā/
GS41brhats_u:3093: 46.15cd/ anubhavati purākṛtaṃ tadā phalam aśubhaṃ sacara^acaraṃ jagat//
GS41brhats_u:3095: 46.16b balodyogaṃ *candraḥ[K.cenduḥ] kathayati jayaṃ jyā +asya ca yataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3096: 46.16c gavāṃ{avāk] śṛṅgo goghno nidhanam api sasyasya kurute
GS41brhats_u:3098: 46.17ab/ snigdhaḥ sthūlaḥ samaśṛṅgo viśālas tuṅgaś ca^udagvicaran
GS41brhats_u:3100: 46.17cd/ dṛṣṭaḥ saumyair aśubhair viprayukto lokānandaṃ kurute +atīva
GS41brhats_u:3103: 46.18cd/ dakṣiṇena na *śubhaḥ śubhakṛt[K.śubho hitakṛt] syād yady udak
GS41brhats_u:3105: 46.19ab/ parigha iti megharekhā yā tiryagbhāskarodaye +aste vā/
GS41brhats_u:3106: 46.19cd/ paridhis tu pratisūryo daṇḍas tv ṛjur indracāpanibhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3107: 46.20ab/ udaye +aste vā bhānor ye dīrghā raśmayas tv amoghās te/
GS41brhats_u:3108: 46.20cd/ suracāpakhaṇḍam ṛju yad rohitam airāvataṃ dīrgham//
GS41brhats_u:3109: 46.21ab/ ardha^astamayāt sandhyā vyaktībhūtā na tārakā yāvat/
GS41brhats_u:3111: 46.22ab/ tasmin sandhyā^kāle cihnair etaiḥ śubha^aśubhaṃ vācyam/
GS41brhats_u:3112: 46.22cd/ sarvair etaiḥ snigdhaiḥ sadyo varṣaṃ bhayaṃ rūkṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3113: 46.23a acchinnaḥ parigho viyac ca vimalaṃ śyāmā mayūkhā raveḥ
GS41brhats_u:3115: 46.23c snigdho meghatarur divākarakarair āliṅgato vā yadā
GS41brhats_u:3116: 46.23d vṛṣṭiḥ syād yadi vā +arkam astasamaye megho mahān chādayet//
GS41brhats_u:3117: 46.24ab/ khaṇḍo vakraḥ kṛṣṇo hrasvaḥ kāka^ādyair vā cihnair viddhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3118: 46.24cd/ yasmin deśe rūkṣaś cārkas tatrābhāvaḥ prāyo rājñaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3119: 46.25ab/ vāhinīṃ samupayāti pṛṣṭhato māṃsabhuk khagagaṇo yuyutsataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3120: 46.25cd/ yasya tasya balavidravo mahān agrais tu vijayo vihaṅgamaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3121: 46.26ab/ bhānor udaye yadi vāstamaye gandharvapurapratimā dhvajanī/
GS41brhats_u:3122: 46.26cd/ vimbaṃ niruṇaddhi tadā nṛpateḥ prāptaṃ samaraṃ sabhayaṃ
GS41brhats_u:3124: 46.27ab/ śastā śāntidvijamṛgaghuṣṭā sandhyā snigdhā mṛdupavanā ca/
GS41brhats_u:3125: 46.27cd/ pāṃśudhvastā janapadanāśaṃ dhatte rūkṣā rudhiranibhā vā//
GS41brhats_u:3129: 46.28d yat^tat svabhāvakṛtam asya pikaṃ na jetum//
GS41brhats_u:3132: 47.01cd/ aśubhaṃ śubhaṃ ca loke bhavati yato +ato nṛpati^cintā//
GS41brhats_u:3133: 47.02ab/ yā vyākhyātā śāntiḥ svayambhuvā suraguror mahendra^arthe/
GS41brhats_u:3134: 47.02cd/ tāṃ prāpya vṛddhagargaḥ prāha yathā bhāgureḥ śṛṇuta//
GS41brhats_u:3144: 47.07cd/ virute vanopakaṇṭhe kṣetra^āgāre śucāv atha vā//
GS41brhats_u:3158: 47.13ab/ kṣamayā krodha iva jitaḥ siṃho mṛgya^abhibhūyate *yeṣu[K.yatra]/
GS41brhats_u:3166: 47.17ab/ dhātrī ghanā sugandhā snigdhā madhurā samā ca vijayāya/
GS41brhats_u:3169: 47.18cd/ kauberyāṃ vā kṛtvā baliṃ diśīśādhipāyāṃ vā//
GS41brhats_u:3171: 47.19cd/ āvāhanam atha mantras tasmin munibhiḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3173: 47.20cd/ diśo nāgā dvijāś ca^eva ye *ca^apy anye[K.cāney apy]
GS41brhats_u:3175: 47.21ab/ āvāhya^evam tataḥ sarvān evaṃ brūyāt purohitaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3176: 47.21cd/ śvaḥ pūjāṃ prāpya yāsyanti dattvā śāntiṃ mahīpateḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3177: 47.22ab/ āvāhiteṣu kṛtvā pūjāṃ tāṃ śarvarīṃ vaseyus te/
GS41brhats_u:3181: 47.24ab/ tasmin maṇḍalam ālikhya kalpayet tatra medinīm/
GS41brhats_u:3183: 47.25ab/ purohito yathāsthānaṃ nāgān yakṣān surān pitṝn/
GS41brhats_u:3184: 47.25cd/ gandharva^apsarasaś ca^eva munīn siddhāṃś ca vinyaset//
GS41brhats_u:3185: 47.26ab/ grahāṃś ca *sarva[K.saha]nakṣatrai rudrāṃś ca saha mātṛbhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3186: 47.26cd/ skandaṃ viṣṇuṃ viśākhaṃ ca lokapālān surastriyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3189: 47.28ab/ bhakṣyair annaiś ca vividhaiḥ phala^mūla^āmiṣais tathā/
GS41brhats_u:3191: 47.29ab/ kathayāmy ataḥ param ahaṃ pūjām asmin yathābhilikhitānām/
GS41brhats_u:3192: 47.29cd/ grahayajñe yaḥ prokto vidhir grahāṇāṃ sa kartavyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3195: 47.31ab/ sāma^yajurbhir munayas tv ṛgbhir gandhaiś ca dhūpa^mālya^yutaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3199: 47.32cd/ gandharvān apsaraso gandhair mālyaiś ca susugandhaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3200: 47.33ab/ śeṣāṃs tu sārvavarṇika^balibhiḥ pūjāṃ nyasec ca sarveṣām/
GS41brhats_u:3203: 47.34cd/ ādadyāt sambhārān darbhān dīrghān agarbhāṃś ca//
GS41brhats_u:3207: 47.36ab/ saghṛtasya pāyasasya ca tatra śarāvāṇi taiś ca sambhāraiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3214: 47.39cd/ jīvāṃ viśveśvarīṃ pāṭhāṃ samaṅgāṃ vijayāṃ tathā//
GS41brhats_u:3215: 47.40ab/ sahāṃ ca sahadevīṃ ca pūrṇakośāṃ śatāvarīm/
GS41brhats_u:3216: 47.40cd/ ariṣṭikāṃ śivāṃ bhadrāṃ teṣu kumbheṣu vinyaset//
GS41brhats_u:3223: 47.44ab/ tato vṛṣasya yodhasya carma rohitam akṣatam/
GS41brhats_u:3224: 47.44cd/ simhasyātha tṛtīyaṃ syād vyāghrasya ca tataḥ param//
GS41brhats_u:3225: 47.45ab/ catvāry etāni carmāṇi tasyāṃ vedyām upāstaret/
GS41brhats_u:3239: 47.51cd/ adhike +adhike guṇottaram ayaṃ ca mantro +atra munigītaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3240: 47.52ab/ ājyaṃ tejaḥ samuddiṣṭam ājyaṃ pāpaharaṃ param/
GS41brhats_u:3241: 47.52cd/ ājyaṃ surāṇām āhāra ājye lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3242: 47.53ab/ bhauma^āntarikṣaṃ divyaṃ vā yat te *kalmaṣam[K.kalviṣaṃ] āgatam/
GS41brhats_u:3246: 47.55ab/ surās tvām abhiṣiñcantu ye ca siddhāḥ purātanāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3247: 47.55cd/ brahmā viṣṇuś ca *rudraś[K.śambhuś] ca sādhyāś ca samarudgaṇāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3248: 47.56ab/ ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca bhiṣagvarau/
GS41brhats_u:3249: 47.56cd/ aditir devamātā ca svāhā siddhiḥ sarasvatī//
GS41brhats_u:3250: 47.57ab/ kīrtir lakṣmīr dhṛtiḥ śrīś ca sinīvālī kuhūs tathā/
GS41brhats_u:3251: 47.57cd/ danuś ca surasā ca^eva vinatā kadrur eva ca//
GS41brhats_u:3252: 47.58ab/ devapatnyaś ca yā noktā devamātara eva ca/
GS41brhats_u:3253: 47.58cd/ sarvās tvām abhiṣiñcantu divyāś ca^apsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3255: 47.59cd/ saṃvatsarā dineśāś ca kalāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ kṣaṇā lavā/
GS41brhats_u:3260: 47.62ab/ saritaś ca mahābhāgā nāgāḥ kiṃpuruṣāś tathā/
GS41brhats_u:3261: 47.62cd/ vaikhānasā mahābhāgā dvijā vaihāyasāś ca ye//
GS41brhats_u:3262: 47.63ab/ saptarṣayaḥ sadārāś ca dhruvasthānāni yāni ca/
GS41brhats_u:3263: 47.63cd/ marīcir atriḥ pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ kratur aṅgirāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3265: 47.64cd/ sanātanaś ca dakṣaś ca jaigīṣavyo bhagandaraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3266: 47.65ab/ ekataś ca dvitaś ca^eva trito jābālikaśyapau/
GS41brhats_u:3267: 47.65cd/ durvāsā durvinītaś ca kaṇvaḥ kātyāyanas tathā//
GS41brhats_u:3271: 47.67cd/ parvatās taravo vallyaḥ puṇyāny āyatanāni ca//
GS41brhats_u:3272: 47.68ab/ prajāpatir ditiś ca^eva gāvo viśvasya mātaraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3274: 47.69ab/ agnayaḥ pitaras tārā jīmūtāḥ khaṃ diśo jalam/
GS41brhats_u:3277: 47.70cd/ *yathābhiṣikto maghavān etair mudita^manasaiḥ[K.kalyāṇam te prakurvantu āyurārogyam eva ca]//
GS41brhats_u:3287: 47.75ab/ gatvā dvitīyavedīṃ samupaviśec carmaṇāṃ upari rājā/
GS41brhats_u:3288: 47.75cd/ deyāni ca^eva carmāṇy uparyupary evam etāni//
GS41brhats_u:3289: 47.76ab/ vṛṣasya vṛṣadaṃśasya ruroś ca pṛṣatasya ca/
GS41brhats_u:3290: 47.76cd/ teṣām upari siṃhasya vyāghrasya ca tataḥ param//
GS41brhats_u:3295: 47.79ab/ yāntu devagaṇāḥ sarve pūjām ādāya pārthivāt/
GS41brhats_u:3297: 47.80ab/ nṛpatir ato daivajñaṃ purohitaṃ ca^arcayed dhanair bahubhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3307: 47.84ab/ nāsti loke sa utpāto yo hy anena na śāmyati/
GS41brhats_u:3308: 47.84cd/ maṅgalaṃ cāparaṃ nāsti yad asmād atiricyate//
GS41brhats_u:3310: 47.85cd/ tatpūrvam abhiṣeke ca vidhir eṣa praśasyate//
GS41brhats_u:3316: 48.01ab/ vistaraśo nirdiṣṭaṃ paṭṭāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yad ācāryaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3318: 48.02ab/ paṭṭaḥ śubhado rājṇāṃ madhye +aṣṭāv aṅgulāni vistīrṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3321: 48.03cd/ dve ca prasādapaṭṭaḥ pañcaite kīrtitāḥ paṭṭāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3326: 48.06ab/ kriyamāṇaṃ yadi patraṃ sukhena vistāram eti paṭṭasya/
GS41brhats_u:3327: 48.06cd/ vṛddhijayau bhūmipates tathā prajānāṃ ca sukhasampat//
GS41brhats_u:3329: 48.07cd/ madhye sphuṭitas tyājyo vighnakaraḥ pārśvayoḥ sphuṭitaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3339: 49.03cd/ khaḍge vraṇā na śubhadā vaṃśānugatāḥ prabhūtāś ca//
GS41brhats_u:3340: 49.04ab/ sphuṭito hrasvaḥ kuṇṭho vaṃśacchinno na dṛg^mano +anugataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3343: 49.05cd/ svayam udgīrṇe yuddhaṃ jvalite vijayo bhavati khaḍge//
GS41brhats_u:3345: 49.06b paśyen na tatra vadanaṃ na vadec ca mūlyam/
GS41brhats_u:3346: 49.06c deśaṃ na cāsya kathayet pratimānayen na
GS41brhats_u:3350: 49.08ab/ niṣpanno na chedyo nikaṣaiḥ kāryaḥ pramāṇayuktaḥ saḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3351: 49.08cd/ mūle mriyate svāmī jananī tasyāgrataś chinne//
GS41brhats_u:3352: 49.09ab/ yasmin tsarupradeśe vraṇo bhavet tadvad eva khaḍgasya/
GS41brhats_u:3353: 49.09cd/ vanitānām iva tilako guhye vācyo mukhe dṛṣṭvā//
GS41brhats_u:3354: 49.10ab/ atha vā spṛśati yadaṅgaṃ praṣṭā nistriṃśabhṛt tadavadhārya/
GS41brhats_u:3357: 49.11cd/ bhrūmadhye ca tṛtīye netre spṛṣṭe catruthe ca//
GS41brhats_u:3363: 49.14ab/ ūrvor dvāviṃśe syād ūrvor madhye vraṇas trayoviṃśe/
GS41brhats_u:3364: 49.14cd/ jānuni ca caturviṃśe jaṅghāyāṃ pañcaviṃśe ca//
GS41brhats_u:3365: 49.15ab/ jaṅghāmadhye gulphe pārṣṇyāṃ pāde tadaṅgulīṣv api ca/
GS41brhats_u:3366: 49.15cd/ ṣaḍviṃśatikād yāvat triṃśad iti matena gargasya//
GS41brhats_u:3367: 49.16ab/ putramaraṇaṃ dhanāptir dhanahāniḥ sampadaś ca bandhaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3375: 49.19cd/ aiśvarya^mṛtyu^rājyāni ca kramāt triṃśad iti yāvat//
GS41brhats_u:3376: 49.20ab/ parato na viśeṣaphalaṃ viṣamasamasthās tu pāpaśubhaphaladāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3377: 49.20cd/ kaiś cid aphalāḥ pradiṣṭās triṃśatparato +agram iti yāvat//
GS41brhats_u:3427: 50.08b bhujau hastau gaṇḍau kaca^gala^nakha^aṅguṣṭham api yat/
GS41brhats_u:3435: 50.10ab/ napuṃsaka^ākhyaṃ ca śiro lalāṭam āśv ādya^saṃjñair aparaiś
GS41brhats_u:3437: 50.10cd/ siddhir bhavej jātu napuṃsakair no rūkṣa^kṣatair bhagna^kṛśaiś ca
GS41brhats_u:3439: 50.11ab/ spṛṣṭe vā cālite vā^api pāda^aṅguṣṭhe +akṣi^rug bhavet/
GS41brhats_u:3440: 50.11cd/ aṅgulyāṃ duhituḥ śokaṃ śiroghāte nṛpād bhayam//
GS41brhats_u:3441: 50.12ab/ viprayogam urasi svagātrataḥ karpaṭāhṛtir anarthadā bhavet/
GS41brhats_u:3442: 50.12cd/ syāt priyāptir abhigṛhya karpaṭaṃ pṛcchataś caraṇapādayojituḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3444: 50.13cd/ hastena pādau kaṇḍūyet tasya *dāsīmayī[K.dāsīmayā] ca sā//
GS41brhats_u:3447: 50.14cd/ vyādhir āśrayati rajju^jālakaṃ valkalaṃ ca samavekṣya bandhanam//
GS41brhats_u:3466: 50.23ab/ icchāmi praṣṭuṃ bhaṇa paśyatv āryaḥ samādiśa^ity ukte//
GS41brhats_u:3474: 50.25c jaṅghe preṣyo bhavati bhaginī nābhito hṛtsvabhāryā
GS41brhats_u:3477: 50.26cd/ bāhū bhrātā^atha tatpatnī spṛṣṭvā^evaṃ cauram ādiśet//
GS41brhats_u:3478: 50.27ab/ antar^aṅgam avamucya bāhya^ga^sparśanaṃ yadi karoti pṛcchakaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3487: 50.29c avayavam api spṛṣṭvā^antaḥsthaṃ dṛḍhaṃ marud āhared
GS41brhats_u:3488: 50.29d atibahu tadā bhuktvā^annaṃ saṃsthitaḥ suhito vadet//
GS41brhats_u:3497: 50.33b śrutvā kravyādaṃ vā prekṣya vā māṃsamiśram/
GS41brhats_u:3503: 50.35ab/ dṛṣṭe śrute +apy aśakune godhā^matsya^āmiṣaṃ vaded bhuktam/
GS41brhats_u:3504: 50.35cd/ garbhiṇyā garbhasya ca nipatanam evaṃ prakalpayet praśne//
GS41brhats_u:3515: 50.39ab/ ghrāṇāyā dakṣiṇe dvāre spṛṣṭe māsottaraṃ vadet/
GS41brhats_u:3516: 50.39cd/ vāme *+abdau[K.dvau] karṇa evaṃ mā dvicaturghnaḥ śrutistane//
GS41brhats_u:3518: 50.40b karṇe putrān pañca haste trayaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:3531: 50.44c vipulamatir udāro vetti yaḥ sarvam etan
GS41brhats_u:3536: 51.02a susnigdha^vyakta^śobhāḥ śirasi dhanacayaṃ mūrdhni saubhāgyam ārād
GS41brhats_u:3537: 51.02b daurbhāgyaṃ bhrūyugotthāḥ priyajana^ghaṭanām āśu duḥśīlatāṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:3538: 51.02c tanmadhyotthāś ca śokaṃ nayanapuṭagatā netrayor iṣṭadṛṣṭiṃ
GS41brhats_u:3542: 51.03b kuryus tadvac cibukatalagā bhūri vittaṃ lalāṭe/
GS41brhats_u:3547: 51.04c priyaprāptiṃ skandhe +apy aṭanam atha bhikṣārtham asakṛd
GS41brhats_u:3553: 51.06b supānānnaṃ nābhau tadadha iha caurair dhanahṛtim/
GS41brhats_u:3554: 51.06c dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ bastau yuvatim atha meḍhre sutanayān
GS41brhats_u:3569: 52.02ab/ kim api kila bhūtam abhavad rundhānaṃ rodasī śarīreṇa/
GS41brhats_u:3571: 52.03ab/ yatra ca yena gṛhītaṃ vibudhena^adhiṣṭhitaḥ sa tatra^eva/
GS41brhats_u:3572: 52.03cd/ tad amaramayaṃ vidhātā vāstunaraṃ kalpayām āsa//
GS41brhats_u:3581: 52.07cd/ tryaṃśānvitā ca dairghyaṃ pañca tadardhais tadanujanānām//
GS41brhats_u:3586: 52.10ab/ catvāriṃśad^ dhīnā catuścaturbhis tu pañca yāvad iti/
GS41brhats_u:3588: 52.11ab/ vāstuni yo vistāraḥ sa eva ca^ucchrāya^niścayaḥ śubhadaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3589: 52.11cd/ śālā^ekeṣu gṛheṣv api vistārād dviguṇitaṃ dairghyam//
GS41brhats_u:3591: 52.12cd/ āṣoḍaśād iti paraṃ nyūnataram atīva hīnānām//
GS41brhats_u:3606: 52.19cd/ vyekā viṃśatir aṣṭau viṃśatir aṣṭādaśa tritayam//
GS41brhats_u:3608: 52.20cd/ yady agrato bhavati sā soṣṇīṣaṃ nāma tadvāstu//
GS41brhats_u:3609: 52.21ab/ sāyāśrayam iti paścāt sāvaṣṭambhaṃ tu pārśvasaṃsthitayā/
GS41brhats_u:3610: 52.21cd/ susthitam iti ca samantāt^śāstrajñaiḥ pūjitāḥ sarvāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3613: 52.23ab/ vyāsāt ṣoḍaśabhāgaḥ sarveṣāṃ sadmanāṃ bhavati bhittiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3621: 52.26cd/ śākhādvaye +api kāryaṃ sārdhaṃ tat syād udumbarayoḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3625: 52.28cd/ dvātriṃśatā tu madhye pralīnako vṛtta iti vṛttaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3626: 52.29ab/ stambhaṃ vibhajya navadhā vahanaṃ bhāgo ghaṭo +asya bhāgo +anyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3628: 52.30ab/ stambhasamaṃ bāhulyaṃ bhāratulānām upary upary āsām/
GS41brhats_u:3633: 52.32cd/ dvāraṃ paścimam asmin vihāya śeṣāṇi kāryāṇi//
GS41brhats_u:3635: 52.33cd/ *tasmiṃś[K.tadvad] ca vardhamāne dvāraṃ tu na dakṣiṇaṃ kāryam//
GS41brhats_u:3637: 52.34cd/ tadavadhi^*vidhṛtaś[K.vivṛtaś, K's tr. vidhṛta] cānyaḥ prāgdvāraṃ svastike *śubhadam[K.+aśubhadam, K's tr. śubham]//
GS41brhats_u:3639: 52.35cd/ rucake dvāraṃ na śubhadam uttarato +anyāni śastāni//
GS41brhats_u:3648: 52.40ab/ pūrvāpare tu śāle gṛhacullī dakṣiṇottare kācam/
GS41brhats_u:3658: 52.45ab/ śoṣo +atha pāpayakṣmā rogaḥ koṇe tato +ahi^mukhyau ca/
GS41brhats_u:3661: 52.46cd/ ekāntarāt pradakṣiṇam asmāt savitā vivasvāṃś ca//
GS41brhats_u:3664: 52.48ab/ āpo nāma^aiśāne koṇe hautāśane ca sāvitraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3665: 52.48cd/ jaya iti ca nairṛte rudra ānile +abhyantarapadeṣu//
GS41brhats_u:3666: 52.49ab/ āpas tathā^apavatsaḥ parjanyo +agnir ditiś ca vargo +ayam/
GS41brhats_u:3667: 52.49cd/ evaṃ koṇe koṇe padikāḥ syuḥ pañca pañca surāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3668: 52.50ab/ bāhyā dvipadāḥ śeṣās te vibudhā viṃśati samākhyātāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3669: 52.50cd/ śeṣāś catvāro +anye tripadā dikṣv aryamādyās te//
GS41brhats_u:3671: 52.51cd/ āpo mukhe stane +asyāryamā hy urasy āpavatsaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:3673: 52.52cd/ satyādyāḥ pañca bhuje haste savitā *ca sāvitraḥ[K.sasāvitraḥ]//
GS41brhats_u:3674: 52.53ab/ vitatho bṛhatkṣatayutaḥ pārśve jaṭhare sthito vivasvāṃś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3675: 52.53cd/ ūrū jānu ca jaṅghe sphig iti yamādyaiḥ parigṛhītāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3676: 52.54ab/ ete dakṣiṇapārśve sthāneṣv evaṃ ca vāmapārśvasthāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3678: 52.55ab/ aṣṭa^aṣṭakapadam atha vā kṛtvā rekhāś ca koṇagās tiryak/
GS41brhats_u:3680: 52.56ab/ aṣṭau ca bahiṣkoṇeṣv ardhapadās tad^ubhaya^sthitāḥ sa^ardhāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3681: 52.56cd/ uktebhyo ye śeṣās te dvipadā viṃśatis te *hi[K.ca]//
GS41brhats_u:3682: 52.57ab/ sampātā vaṃśānāṃ madhyāni samāni yāni ca padānām/
GS41brhats_u:3689: 52.59cd/ aśubhaṃ bhaven nimittaṃ vikṛter vā agneḥ saśalyaṃ tat//
GS41brhats_u:3692: K. 53.60cd/ lohamaye śastra^bhayaṃ kapālakeśeṣu mṛtyuḥ syāt//
GS41brhats_u:3693: K. 53.61ab/ aṅgāre stenabhayaṃ bhasmani ca vinirdiśet sadāgnibhayam/
GS41brhats_u:3695: K. 53.62ab/ marmaṇyamarmago vā ruṇaddhy arthāgamaṃ tuṣasamūhaḥ]/
GS41brhats_u:3697: 52.61ab/ rogād vāyuṃ pitṛto hutāśanaṃ śoṣasūtram api vitathāt/
GS41brhats_u:3698: 52.61cd/ mukhyād bhṛśaṃ jayantāc ca bhṛṅgam aditeś ca sugrīvam//
GS41brhats_u:3699: 52.62ab/ tatsampātā nava ye tāny atimarmāṇi sampradiṣṭāni/
GS41brhats_u:3700: 52.62cd/ yaś ca padasya^aṣṭāṃśas tat proktaṃ marma^parimāṇam//
GS41brhats_u:3703: 52.64ab/ sukham icchan brahmāṇaṃ yatnād rakṣed gṛhī
GS41brhats_u:3712: 52.67cd/ teṣu ca yatha^anurūpaṃ varṇā viprādayo vāsyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3714: 52.68cd/ viśatāṃ ca yathā bhavanaṃ bhavanti tāny eva dakṣiṇataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3721: 52.71cd/ raudraṃ kṛtaghnam adhanaṃ suta^vīrya^ghnaṃ ca yāmyena//
GS41brhats_u:3724: 52.72cd/ dhanasampan nṛpati^bhayaṃ dhana^kṣayo roga ity apare//
GS41brhats_u:3727: 52.73cd/ putradhanāptir vairaṃ sutena doṣāḥ striyā naiḥsvam//
GS41brhats_u:3729: 52.74cd/ ucchrāyād dviguṇamitāṃ tyaktvā bhūmiṃ na doṣāya//
GS41brhats_u:3735: 52.77ab/ unmādaḥ svayam udghāṭite +atha pihite svayaṃ kulavināśaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3736: 52.77cd/ mānādhike nṛpa^bhayaṃ dasyubhayaṃ *vyasanam eva nīce ca[K.vyasanadaṃ nīcam]//
GS41brhats_u:3737: 52.78ab/ dvāraṃ dvārasya^upari yat tan na śivāya saṅkaṭaṃ yac ca/
GS41brhats_u:3745: 52.82ab/ purabhavanagrāmāṇāṃ ye koṇās teṣu nivasatāṃ doṣāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3750: 52.84cd/ phalinaḥ prajākṣayakarā dārūṇy api varjayed eṣām//
GS41brhats_u:3751: 52.85ab/ chindyād yadi na tarūṃś tān tadantare pūjitān vaped anyat[K.anyān]/
GS41brhats_u:3754: 52.86b snigdhā samā na suṣirā ca mahī narāṇām/
GS41brhats_u:3762: 52.89cd/ vipraḥ sarvatra vased anuvarṇam atha^iṣṭam anyeṣām//
GS41brhats_u:3763: 52.90ab/ gṛhamadhye hastamitaṃ khātvā paripūritaṃ punaḥ śvabhram/
GS41brhats_u:3764: 52.90cd/ yady ūnam aniṣṭaṃ tat same samaṃ dhanyam adhikaṃ yat//
GS41brhats_u:3765: 52.91ab/ śvabhram atha vā^ambupūrṇaṃ padaśatam itvā^āgatasya yadi na^ūnam/
GS41brhats_u:3766: 52.91cd/ tad dhanyaṃ yac ca bhavet palāny apām āḍhakaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3767: 52.92ab/ āme vā mṛtpātre śvabhrasthe dīpavartir abhyadhikam/
GS41brhats_u:3768: 52.92cd/ jvalati diśi yasya śastā sā bhūmis tasya varṇasya//
GS41brhats_u:3771: 52.93cd/ tattasya bhavati śubhadaṃ yasya ca yasmin mano ramate//
GS41brhats_u:3777: 52.96ab/ kṛṣṭāṃ prarūḍhabījāṃ go +adhyuṣitāṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ praśastāṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:3780: 52.97cd/ daivatapūjāṃ kṛtvā sthapatīn abhyarcya viprāṃś ca//
GS41brhats_u:3781: 52.98ab/ vipraḥ spṛṣṭvā śīrṣaṃ vakṣaś ca kṣatriyo viśāś ca^ūrū/
GS41brhats_u:3782: 52.98cd/ śūdraḥ pādau spṛṣṭvā kuryād rekhāṃ gṛhārambhe//
GS41brhats_u:3786: 52.100cd/ taskara^bhayaṃ tṛṇena ca kāṣṭha^ullikhitā ca rājabhayam//
GS41brhats_u:3790: 52.102cd/ vācaḥ paruṣā niṣṭhīvitaṃ kṣutaṃ cāśubhaṃ kathitam//
GS41brhats_u:3791: 52.103ab/ ardhanicitaṃ kṛtaṃ vā praviśan sthapatir gṛhe nimittāni/
GS41brhats_u:3792: 52.103cd/ avalokayed gṛhapatiḥ kva saṃsthitaḥ spṛśati kiṃ cāṅgam//
GS41brhats_u:3793: 52.104ab/ ravidīpte yadi śakunis tasmin kāle virauti
GS41brhats_u:3800: 52.107ab/ diśi śāntāyāṃ śakunir[K.śakuno] madhuravirāvī yadā tadā vācyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3802: 52.108ab/ sūtracchede mṛtyuḥ kīle ca^avāṅmukhe mahagaḥ[K.mahān rogaḥ]/
GS41brhats_u:3805: 52.109cd/ bhagne +api ca karmivadhaś cyute karād gṛhapater mṛtyuḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3806: 52.110ab/ dakṣiṇapūrve koṇe kṛtvā pūjāṃ śilāṃ nyaset
GS41brhats_u:3814: 52.112cd/ śakradhvaja^*sadṛśaphalaṃ tad eva tasmin[K.sadṛśaṃ tasmiṃś ca śubhaṃ] vinirdiṣṭam//
GS41brhats_u:3816: 52.113cd/ vakre bandhuvināśo na santi garbhāś ca din^mūḍhe//
GS41brhats_u:3817: 52.114ab/ icched yadi gṛha^vṛddhiṃ tataḥ samantād vivardhayet tulyam/
GS41brhats_u:3818: 52.114cd/ eka^uddeśe doṣaḥ prāg atha vā +apy uttare kuryāt//
GS41brhats_u:3819: 52.115ab/ prāg bhavati mitravairaṃ mṛtyubhayaṃ dakṣiṇena yadi vṛddhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3822: 52.116ab/ aiśānyāṃ devagṛhaṃ mahānasaṃ yadi ca^api kāryam āgneyyām/
GS41brhats_u:3824: 52.117ab/ prācyādisthe salile sutahāniḥ śikhi^bhayaṃ ripubhayaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:3829: 52.119ab/ rātrau kṛtabalipūjaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ chedayed divā vṛkṣam/
GS41brhats_u:3831: 52.120ab/ chedo yady avikārī tataḥ śubhaṃ dāru tad^gṛhaupayikam/
GS41brhats_u:3832: 52.120cd/ pīte tu maṇḍale nirdiśet taror madhyagāṃ godhām//
GS41brhats_u:3833: 52.121ab/ mañjiṣṭhābhe bheko nīle sarpas tathā+aruṇe saraṭaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3834: 52.121cd/ mudgābhe +aśmā kapile tu mūṣako +ambhaś ca khaḍgābhe//
GS41brhats_u:3835: 52.122ab/ dhānya^go^guru^hutāśa^surāṇāṃ na svaped upari nāpy anuvaṃśam/
GS41brhats_u:3836: 52.122cd/ na^uttarāparaśirā na ca nagno naiva cārdracaraṇaḥ śriyam
GS41brhats_u:3842: 53.01ab/ dharmyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca vadāmy ato +ahaṃ dakārgalaṃ[K.dagārgalaṃ]
GS41brhats_u:3844: 53.01cd/ puṃsāṃ yathā^aṅgeṣu śirās tatha^eva kṣitāv api pronnata^nimna^saṃsthāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3845: 53.02ab/ ekena varṇena rasena ca^ambhaś cyutaṃ nabhasto vasudhā^viśeṣāt/
GS41brhats_u:3846: 53.02cd/ nānārasatvaṃ bahuvarṇatāṃ ca gataṃ parīkṣyaṃ kṣiti^tulyam eva//
GS41brhats_u:3849: 53.04ab/ dikpatisaṃjñā ca śirā navamī madhye mahāśirānāmnī/
GS41brhats_u:3851: 53.05ab/ pātālād *ūrdhvaśirā śubhā[K.ūrdhvaśirāḥ śubhāś] caturdikṣu saṃsthitā yāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3852: 53.05cd/ koṇadigutthā na śubhāḥ śirānimittāny ato vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:3853: 53.06ab/ yadi vetaso +amburahite deśe hastais tribhis tataḥ paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3854: 53.06cd/ sārdhe puruṣe toyaṃ vahati śirā paścimā tatra//
GS41brhats_u:3855: 53.07ab/ cihnam api ca^ardhapuruṣe maṇḍūkaḥ pāṇḍuro +atha mṛt pītā/
GS41brhats_u:3856: 53.07cd/ puṭabhedakaś ca tasmin pāṣāṇo bhavati toyam adhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3857: 53.08ab/ jambvāś ca^udag dhastais tribhiḥ śirā^adho naradvaye pūrvā/
GS41brhats_u:3859: 53.09ab/ jambūvṛkṣasya prāg valmīko yadi bhavet samīpasthaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3861: 53.10ab/ ardhapuruṣe ca matsyaḥ pārāvata^sannibhaś ca pāṣāṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3862: 53.10cd/ mṛd bhavati ca^atra nīlā dīrghaṃ kālaṃ ca bahu toyam//
GS41brhats_u:3863: 53.11ab/ paścād udumbarasya tribhir eva karair naradvaye sārdhe/
GS41brhats_u:3865: 53.12ab/ udag arjunasya dṛśyo valmīko yadi tato +arjunād dhastaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3866: 53.12cd/ tribhir ambu bhavati puruṣais tribhir ardha^samanvitaiḥ paścāt//
GS41brhats_u:3867: 53.13ab/ śvetā godhā^ardhanare puruṣe mṛd dhūsarā tataḥ kṛṣṇā/
GS41brhats_u:3868: 53.13cd/ pītā sitā sasikatā tato jalaṃ nirdiśed amitam//
GS41brhats_u:3870: 53.14cd/ puruṣadvaye sapāde svādu jalaṃ bhavati ca^aśoṣyam//
GS41brhats_u:3871: 53.15ab/ rohita^matsyo +ardhanare mṛt kapilā pāṇḍurā tataḥ parataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3872: 53.15cd/ sikatā saśarkarā +atha krameṇa parato bhavaty ambhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3873: 53.16ab/ pūrveṇa yadi badaryā valmīko dṛśyate jalaṃ paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3875: 53.17ab/ sapalāśā badarī ced diśy aparasyāṃ tato jalaṃ bhavati/
GS41brhats_u:3879: 53.18cd/ puruṣais tribhir ambu bhavet kṛṣṇo +ardhanare ca maṇḍūkaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3881: 53.19cd/ puruṣatraye sapāde paścimadiksthā vahati sā ca//
GS41brhats_u:3882: 53.20ab/ āpāṇḍupītikā mṛd gorasavarṇaś ca bhavati pāṣāṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3884: 53.21ab/ jalaparihīne deśe vṛkṣaḥ kampillako yadā dṛśyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3885: 53.21cd/ prācyāṃ hastatritaye vahati śirā dakṣiṇā prathamam//
GS41brhats_u:3890: 53.23ab/ śoṇākataror aparottare śirā dvau karāv atikramya/
GS41brhats_u:3891: 53.23cd/ kumudā nāma śirā sā puruṣatrayavāhinī bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:3893: 53.24cd/ adhyardhe bhavati[K.tasya] śirā puruṣe jñeyā diśi prācyām//
GS41brhats_u:3894: 53.25ab/ tasya^eva paścimāyāṃ diśi valmīko yadā bhaved dhaste/
GS41brhats_u:3895: 53.25cd/ tatra^udag bhavati śirā caturbhir ardhādhikaiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3896: 53.26ab/ śveto viśvambharakaḥ prathame puruṣe tu kuṅkumābho +aśmā/
GS41brhats_u:3897: 53.26cd/ aparasyāṃ diśi ca śirā naśyati varṣatraye +atīte//
GS41brhats_u:3899: 53.27cd/ madhye tayor narair ardhapañcamais toyam akṣobhyam//
GS41brhats_u:3900: 53.28ab/ prathame puruṣe bhujagaḥ kamalodarasannibho mahī raktā/
GS41brhats_u:3902: 53.29ab/ yadi bhavati saptaparṇo valmīkavṛtas taduttare toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3903: 53.29cd/ vācyaṃ puruṣaiḥ pañcabhir atrāpi bhavanti cihnāni//
GS41brhats_u:3904: 53.30ab/ puruṣa^ardhe maṇḍūko harito haritāla^sannibhā bhūś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3906: 53.31ab/ sarveṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇām adhaḥ sthito darduro yadā dṛśyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3907: 53.31cd/ tasmād dhaste toyaṃ caturbhir ardha^adhikaiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3908: 53.32ab/ puruṣe tu bhavati nakulo nīlo mṛt pītikā tataḥ śvetā/
GS41brhats_u:3910: 53.33ab/ yady ahinilayo dṛśyo dakṣiṇataḥ saṃsthitaḥ karañjasya/
GS41brhats_u:3911: 53.33cd/ hastadvaye tu yāmye puruṣatritaye śirā sārdhe//
GS41brhats_u:3912: 53.34ab/ kacchapakaḥ puruṣa^ardhe prathamaṃ ca^udbhidyate śirā pūrvā/
GS41brhats_u:3913: 53.34cd/ udag anyā svādujalā harito +aśmādhas tatas toyam//
GS41brhats_u:3914: 53.35ab/ uttarataś ca madhūkād ahinilayaḥ paścime taros toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3919: 53.36cd/ māhendrī bhavati śirā vahati saphenaṃ sadā toyam//
GS41brhats_u:3920: 53.37ab/ valmīkaḥ snigdho dakṣiṇena tilakasya sakuśa^dūrvaś cet/
GS41brhats_u:3921: 53.37cd/ puruṣaiḥ pañcabhir ambho diśi vāruṇyāṃ śirā pūrvā//
GS41brhats_u:3922: 53.38ab/ sarpa^āvāsaḥ paścād yadā kadambasya dakṣiṇena jalam/
GS41brhats_u:3924: 53.39ab/ kauberī ca^atra śirā vahati jalaṃ lohagandhi ca^akṣobhyam/
GS41brhats_u:3926: 53.40ab/ valmīkasaṃvṛto yadi tālo vā bhavati nālikero vā/
GS41brhats_u:3927: 53.40cd/ paścāt ṣaḍbhir hastair naraiś caturbhiḥ śirā yāmyā//
GS41brhats_u:3928: 53.41ab/ yāmyena kapitthasya^ahisaṃśrayaś ced udag jalaṃ vācyam/
GS41brhats_u:3929: 53.41cd/ sapta parityajya karān khātvā puruṣān jalaṃ pañca//
GS41brhats_u:3930: 53.42ab/ karburako +ahiḥ puruṣe kṛṣṇā mṛt puṭabhid api ca pāṣāṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3931: 53.42cd/ śvetā mṛt paścimataḥ śirā tataś ca^uttarā bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:3932: 53.43ab/ aśmantakasya vāme badarī vā dṛśyate +ahinilayo vā/
GS41brhats_u:3933: 53.43cd/ ṣaḍbhir udak tasya karaiḥ sārdhe puruṣatraye toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3934: 53.44ab/ kūrmaḥ prathame puruṣe pāṣāṇo dhūsaraḥ sasikatā mṛt/
GS41brhats_u:3935: 53.44cd/ ādau *ca śirā[K.śirā ca] yāmyā pūrvottarato dvitīyā ca//
GS41brhats_u:3936: 53.45ab/ vāmena haridrataror valmīkaś *cej jalaṃ bhavati pūrve[K.cet tato
GS41brhats_u:3940: 53.46ab/ nīlo bhujagaḥ puruṣe mṛt pītā marakata^upamaś ca^aśmā/
GS41brhats_u:3941: 53.46cd/ kṛṣṇā bhūḥ prathamaṃ vāruṇī śirā dakṣiṇena^anyā//
GS41brhats_u:3943: 53.47cd/ vīraṇa^dūrvā mṛdavaś ca yatra tasmin jalaṃ puruṣe//
GS41brhats_u:3944: 53.48ab/ bhārṅgī trivṛtā dantī sūkarapādī ca lakṣmaṇā ca^eva/
GS41brhats_u:3945: 53.48cd/ navamālikā ca hastadvaye +ambu yāmye tribhiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3947: 53.49cd/ suṣirā jarjara^patrā rūkṣāś ca jalena santyaktāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3951: 53.51ab/ ete yadi susnigdhā valmīkaiḥ parivṛtās tatas toyam/
GS41brhats_u:3952: 53.51cd/ hastais tribhir uttarataś caturbhir ardhena ca
GS41brhats_u:3954: 53.52ab/ atṛṇe satṛṇā yasmin satṛṇe tṛṇavarjitā mahī yatra/
GS41brhats_u:3955: 53.52cd/ tasmin śirā pradiṣṭā vaktavyaṃ vā dhanaṃ ca^asmin//
GS41brhats_u:3956: 53.53ab/ kaṇṭaky akaṇṭakānāṃ vyatyāse +ambhas tribhiḥ karaiḥ paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3957: 53.53cd/ khātvā puruṣatritayaṃ tribhāgayuktaṃ dhanaṃ vā syāt//
GS41brhats_u:3958: 53.54ab/ nadati mahī gambhīraṃ yasmiṃś caraṇāhatā jalaṃ tasmin/
GS41brhats_u:3959: 53.54cd/ sārdhais tribhir manuṣyaiḥ kauberī tatra ca śirā syāt//
GS41brhats_u:3960: 53.55ab/ vṛkṣasya^ekā śākhā yadi vinatā bhavati pāṇḍurā vā syāt/
GS41brhats_u:3962: 53.56ab/ phala^kusuma^vikāro yasya tasya pūrve śirā tribhir hastaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3963: 53.56cd/ bhavati puruṣaiś caturbhiḥ pāṣāṇo +adhaḥ kṣitiḥ pītā//
GS41brhats_u:3964: 53.57ab/ yadi kaṇṭakārikā kaṇṭakair vinā dṛśyate sitaiḥ kusumaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:3965: 53.57cd/ tasyās tale +ambu vācyaṃ tribhir narair ardhapuruṣe ca//
GS41brhats_u:3966: 53.58ab/ kharjūrī dviśiraskā yatra bhavej jalavivarjite deśe/
GS41brhats_u:3968: 53.59ab/ yadi bhavati karṇikāraḥ sitakusumaḥ syāt palāśavṛkṣo vā/
GS41brhats_u:3971: 53.60ab/ *yasyām ūṣmā[K.ūṣmā yasyām] dhātryāṃ dhūmo vā tatra vāri narayugale[K.narayugme]/
GS41brhats_u:3973: 53.61ab/ yasmin kṣetroddeśe jātaṃ sasyaṃ vināśam upayāti/
GS41brhats_u:3974: 53.61cd/ snigdham atipāṇḍuraṃ vā mahāśirā narayuge tatra//
GS41brhats_u:3975: 53.62ab/ marudeśe bhavati śirā yathā tathā^ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi/
GS41brhats_u:3976: 53.62cd/ grīvā karabhāṇām iva bhūtala^saṃsthāḥ śirā yānti//
GS41brhats_u:3977: 53.63ab/ pūrvottareṇa pīlor yadi valmīko jalaṃ bhavati paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:3978: 53.63cd/ uttaragamanā ca śirā vijñeyā pañcabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3979: 53.64ab/ cihnaṃ dardura ādau *mṛt kapilā tatparaṃ[K.mṛtkapilātaḥ paraṃ]
GS41brhats_u:3981: 53.64cd/ bhavati ca puruṣe adho +aśmā tasya tale *+ambho
GS41brhats_u:3984: 53.65cd/ diśi yāmyāyāṃ toyaṃ vaktavyaṃ saptabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3985: 53.66ab/ prathame puruṣe bhujagaḥ sitāsito hastamātramūrtiś ca/
GS41brhats_u:3986: 53.66cd/ dakṣiṇato vahati śirā sakṣāraṃ bhūri pānīyam//
GS41brhats_u:3987: 53.67ab/ uttarataś ca karīrasya^ahigṛhaṃ[K.karīrād ahinilaye] dakṣiṇe jalaṃ svādu/
GS41brhats_u:3988: 53.67cd/ daśabhiḥ puruṣair jñeyam purṣe pīto +atra maṇḍūkaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:3989: 53.68ab/ rohītakasya paścād ahivāsaś cet tribhiḥ karair yāmye/
GS41brhats_u:3990: 53.68cd/ dvādaśa puruṣān khātvā sakṣārā paścimena śirā//
GS41brhats_u:3991: 53.69ab/ indrataror valmīkaḥ prāg dṛśyaḥ paścime śirā haste/
GS41brhats_u:3992: 53.69cd/ khātvā caturdaśa narān kapilā godhā nare prathame//
GS41brhats_u:3993: 53.70ab/ yadi vā suvarṇa^nāmnas taror bhaved vāmato bhujaṅga^gṛham/
GS41brhats_u:3996: 53.71cd/ raktā ca bhavati vasudhā vahati śirā dakṣiṇā tatra//
GS41brhats_u:3999: 53.73ab/ surasaṃ jalam ādau dakṣiṇā śirā vahati ca^uttaneṇa^anyā/
GS41brhats_u:4001: 53.74ab/ sakarīrā ced vadarī tribhiḥ karaiḥ paścimena tatra^ambhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4002: 53.74cd/ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ puruṣair aiśānī bahu^jalā ca śirā//
GS41brhats_u:4008: 53.77ab/ valmīka^mūrdhani yadā dūrvā ca kuśāś ca pāṇḍurāḥ santi/
GS41brhats_u:4009: 53.77cd/ kūpo madhye deyo jalam atra nara^ekaviṃśatyā//
GS41brhats_u:4010: 53.78ab/ bhūmiḥ kadambaka[K.bhūmī kadambaka, K's tr. bhūmīkadambaka]^yutā
GS41brhats_u:4014: 53.79cd/ nānā^vṛkṣaiḥ sahitas tribhir jalaṃ tatra vaktavyam//
GS41brhats_u:4015: 53.80ab/ hasta^catuṣke madhyāt ṣoḍaśabhiś ca^aṅgulair udag vāri/
GS41brhats_u:4018: 53.81ab/ granthi^pracurā yasmin śamī bhaved uttareṇa valmīkaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4020: 53.82ab/ ekasthāḥ pañca yadā valmīkā madhyamo bhavet^śvetaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4022: 53.83ab/ sa^palāśā yatra śamī paścimabhāge +ambu mānavaiḥ ṣaṣṭyā/
GS41brhats_u:4024: 53.84ab/ valmīkena parivṛtaḥ śveto rohītako bhaved yasmin/
GS41brhats_u:4026: 53.85ab/ śvetā kaṇṭaka^bahulā yatra śamī dakṣiṇena tatra payaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4028: 53.86ab/ marudeśe yac cihnaṃ na jāṅgale tair jalaṃ vinirdeśyam/
GS41brhats_u:4029: 53.86cd/ jambū^vetasa^*pūrvair[K.pūrve] ye puruṣās te marau dviguṇāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4030: 53.87ab/ jambūs trivṛtā maurvī[K.mūrvā] śiśumārī sārivā śivā śyāmā/
GS41brhats_u:4033: 53.88cd/ valmīkād uttaratas tribhiḥ karais tri^puruṣe toyam//
GS41brhats_u:4034: 53.89ab/ etad anūpe vācyaṃ jāṅgala^bhūmau tu pañcabhiḥ puruṣaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4035: 53.89cd/ etair eva nimittair marudeśe saptabhiḥ kathayet//
GS41brhats_u:4037: 53.90cd/ tasyāṃ yatra vikāro bhavati dharitryāṃ jalaṃ tatra//
GS41brhats_u:4038: 53.91ab/ yatra snigdhā nimnā savālukā sa^anunādinī vā syāt/
GS41brhats_u:4041: 53.92ab/ snigdha^tarūṇāṃ yāmye naraiś caturbhir jalaṃ prabhūtaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:4042: 53.92cd/ taru^gahane +api hi vikṛto yas tasmāt tadvad eva vadet//
GS41brhats_u:4043: 53.93ab/ namate yatra dharitrī sa^ardhe puruṣe +ambu jāṅgala^anūpe/
GS41brhats_u:4044: 53.93cd/ kīṭā vā yatra vinā^ālayena bahavo +ambu tatra^api//
GS41brhats_u:4045: 53.94ab/ uṣṇā śītā ca mahī śīta^uṣṇa^ambhas tribhir naraiḥ sa^ardhaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4046: 53.94cd/ indradhanur matsyo vā valmīko vā catur^hastāt//
GS41brhats_u:4047: 53.95ab/ valmīkānāṃ paṅktyāṃ yady eko +abhyucchritaḥ śirā tad^adhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4048: 53.95cd/ śuṣyati na rohate vā sasyaṃ yasyāṃ ca tatra^ambhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4051: 53.97ab/ āgneye yadi koṇe grāmasya purasya vā bhavet[K.bhavati] kūpaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4052: 53.97cd/ nityaṃ sa karoti bhayaṃ dāhaṃ ca samānuṣaṃ prāyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4055: 53.98cd/ dik^trayam etat tyaktvā śeṣāsu śubha^āvahāḥ kūpāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4056: 53.99ab/ sārasvatena muninā dakārgalaṃ[K.dagārgalaṃ] yat krtaṃ tad
GS41brhats_u:4058: 53.99cd/ āryābhiḥ kṛtam etad vṛttair api mānavaṃ vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:4062: 53.100d kāśāḥ kuśā vā nalikā nalo vā//
GS41brhats_u:4072: 53.103b nīlā ca mṛd yatra saśarkarā ca/
GS41brhats_u:4074: 53.103d kṛṣṇa^atha vā yatra ca raktamṛd vā//
GS41brhats_u:4102: 53.110d tāḥ śobhanā munivaco +atra ca vṛttam etat//
GS41brhats_u:4103: 53.111a etā hy abhedyāś ca śilāḥ śivāś ca
GS41brhats_u:4106: 53.111d teṣām avṛṣṭir na bhavet kadā cit//
GS41brhats_u:4119: 53.115a naimbaṃ patraṃ tvak ca nālaṃ tilānāṃ
GS41brhats_u:4131: 53.118a pālī prāg^apara^āyatā^ambu suciraṃ dhatte na yāmyottarā
GS41brhats_u:4132: 53.118b kallolair avadāram eti marutā sā prāyaśaḥ preritaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4133: 53.118c tāṃ ced icchati sāra^dārubhir apāṃ sampātam āvārayet
GS41brhats_u:4151: 53.123cd/ śatabhiṣag ity ārambhe kūpānāṃ śasyate bhagaṇaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4153: 53.124cd/ kusumair gandhair dhūpaiḥ sampūjya nidhāpayet prathamam//
GS41brhats_u:4154: [K.54.125ab/ meghodbhavaṃ prathamam eva mayā pradiṣṭaṃ jyeṣṭhām atītya baladevamatādi dṛṣṭvā/
GS41brhats_u:4155: K.54.125cd/ bhaumaṃ dagārgalam idaṃ kathitaṃ dvitīyaṃ samyag
GS41brhats_u:4160: 54.02ab/ mṛdvī bhūḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ hitā tasyām tilān vapet/
GS41brhats_u:4161: 54.02cd/ puṣpitāṃs tāṃś ca mṛdnīyāt[K.gṛhṇīyāt] karma^etat prathamaṃ
GS41brhats_u:4164: 54.03cd/ maṅgalyāḥ pūrvam ārāme ropaṇīyā gṛheṣu vā//
GS41brhats_u:4175: 54.08ab/ śucir bhūtvā taroḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā snāna^anulepanaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4176: 54.08cd/ ropayed ropitaś ca^eva patrais tair eva jāyate//
GS41brhats_u:4177: 54.09ab/ sāyaṃ prātaś ca gharma^ṛtau[K.gharmānte] śītakāle dina^antare/
GS41brhats_u:4178: 54.09cd/ varṣāsu ca bhuvaḥ śoṣe sektavyā ropitā drumāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4181: 54.11ab/ vañjulo naktamālaś ca tilakaḥ panasas tathā/
GS41brhats_u:4186: 54.13cd/ miśrair mūlaiś ca na phalaṃ samyag yacchanti pīḍitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4191: 54.16ab/ phala^nāśe kulatthaiś ca māṣair mudgais tilair yavaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4204: 54.21cd/ pūtimāṃsa^sahitaiś ca secitā dhūpitā ca satataṃ haridrayā//
GS41brhats_u:4226: 54.27cd/ etat tailena vā bījaṃ ślaiṣmātaka[K.ū.śleṣmātaka]^phalena vā//
GS41brhats_u:4232: 54.30ab/ māhiṣa^gomaya^ghṛṣṭāny asya karīṣe ca tāni nikṣipya/
GS41brhats_u:4238: 55.01ab/ kṛtvā prabhūtaṃ salilam ārāmān viniveśya ca/
GS41brhats_u:4240: 55.02ab/ iṣṭā^pūrtena labhyante ye lokās tān bubhūṣatā/
GS41brhats_u:4241: 55.02cd/ devānām ālayaḥ kāryo dvayam api atra dṛśyate//
GS41brhats_u:4256: 55.09cd/ tā eva teṣāṃ śasyante devatā^āyataneṣv api//
GS41brhats_u:4258: 55.10cd/ dvāraṃ ca madhyamaṃ tasmin[K.tatra] samadiksthaṃ praśasyate//
GS41brhats_u:4259: 55.11ab/ yo vistāro bhaved yasya dviguṇā tatsamunnatiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4260: 55.11cd/ ucchrāyād yas tṛtīyāṃśas tena tulyā *kaṭiḥ smṛtā[K.kaṭir
GS41brhats_u:4272: 55.16cd/ dvau bhāgau pratimā tatra tṛtīyāṃśaś ca piṇḍikā//
GS41brhats_u:4277: 55.19ab/ ity ete viṃśatiḥ proktāḥ prāsādāḥ saṃjñayā mayā/
GS41brhats_u:4279: 55.20ab/ tatra ṣaḍaśrir merur dvādaśa^bhaumo vicitra^kuharaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4285: 55.23ab/ vṛttaḥ samudga^nāmā padmaḥ padma^ākṛtiḥ śayā aṣṭau[K.śayānāṣṭau]/
GS41brhats_u:4286: 55.23cd/ śṛṅgeṇa^ekena bhaved eka^eva ca bhūmikā tasya//
GS41brhats_u:4287: 55.24ab/ garuḍa^ākṛtiś ca garuḍo nandī^iti ca ṣaṭcatuṣka^vistīrṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4290: 55.25ab/ kuñjara iti gaja^pṛṣṭhaḥ ṣoḍaśahastaḥ samantato mūlāt/
GS41brhats_u:4294: 55.27ab/ dvārair yutaś caturbhir bahu^śikharo bhavati sarvatobhadraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4301: 55.30ab/ prāhuḥ sthapatayaś ca^atra matam ekaṃ vipaścitaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4304: 55.31b gargeṇa yad viracitaṃ tad iha^asti sarvam/
GS41brhats_u:4308: 56.01ab/ āmaṃ tindukam āmaṃ kapitthakaṃ puṣpam api ca śālmalyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4311: 56.02cd/ avatāryo +asya ca kalko dravyair etaiḥ samanuyojyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4319: 56.06cd/ vajrākhyaḥ prathamaguṇair ayam api teṣv eva kāryeṣu//
GS41brhats_u:4322: 56.08ab/ aṣṭau sīsaka^bhāgāḥ kāṃsasya dvau tu rītikā^bhāgaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4325: 57.01ab/ jāla^antarage bhānau yad aṇutaraṃ darśanaṃ rajo yāti/
GS41brhats_u:4326: 57.01cd/ tad vindyāt paramāṇuṃ prathamaṃ taddhi pramāṇānām//
GS41brhats_u:4329: 57.02cd/ aṣṭaguṇāni yathottaram aṅgulam ekaṃ bhavati saṃkhyā[K.mātrā]//
GS41brhats_u:4332: 57.04ab/ svair aṅgula^pramāṇair dvādaśa vīstīrṇam[U.vistīrṇam] āyataṃ ca mukham/
GS41brhats_u:4333: 57.04cd/ nagnajitā tu caturdaśa dairghyeṇa drāviḍaṃ kathitam//
GS41brhats_u:4335: 57.05cd/ dve aṅgule ca hanunī[K.hanuke] cibukaṃ ca dvyaṅgulaṃ
GS41brhats_u:4337: 57.06ab/ aṣṭa^aṅgulaṃ lalāṭaṃ vistārād dvy^aṅgulāt pare śaṅkhau/
GS41brhats_u:4338: 57.06cd/ catur^aṅgulau tu śaṅkhau karṇau tu dvy^aṅgulau[K.dvyaṅgulaṃ]
GS41brhats_u:4344: 57.09ab/ ardha^aṅgulā tu gocchā vaktraṃ catur^aṅgula^āyataṃ kāryam/
GS41brhats_u:4347: 57.10ab/ dvy^aṅgula^tulyau nāsāpuṭau ca nāsā puṭā^agrato jñeyā/
GS41brhats_u:4348: 57.10cd/ syād dvy^aṅgulam ucchrāyaś catur^aṅgulam antaraṃ ca^akṣṇoḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4351: 57.12ab/ paryantāt paryantaṃ daśa bhruvo +ardha^aṅgulaṃ bhruvor lekhā/
GS41brhats_u:4357: 57.14cd/ dvādaśa tu citra^karmaṇi dṛśyante viṃśatir adṛśyāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4359: 57.15cd/ grīvā daśa vistīrṇā pariṇāhād viṃśatiḥ sa^ekā//
GS41brhats_u:4360: 57.16ab/ kaṇṭhād dvādaśa hṛdayaṃ hṛdayān nābhī[K.nābhiś] ca tat^pramāṇena/
GS41brhats_u:4362: 57.17ab/ ūrū ca^aṅgula^mānaiś catur^yutā viṃśatis tathā jaṅghe/
GS41brhats_u:4363: 57.17cd/ jānukapicche catur^aṅgule ca pādau ca tat^tulyau//
GS41brhats_u:4364: 57.18ab/ dvādaśa^dīrghau ṣaṭ pṛthutayā ca pādau trika^āyata^aṅguṣṭhau/
GS41brhats_u:4373: 57.21cd/ madhye tu sapta vipulā pariṇāhāt triguṇitāḥ sapta//
GS41brhats_u:4374: 57.22ab/ aṣṭau tu jānumadhye vaipulyaṃ try^aṣṭakaṃ tu pariṇāhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4375: 57.22cd/ vipulau caturdaśa^ūrū madhye dviguṇaś ca tat^paridhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4376: 57.23ab/ kaṭir aṣṭādaśa vipulā catvāriṃśac catur^yutā paridhau/
GS41brhats_u:4377: 57.23cd/ aṅgulam ekaṃ nābhī[K.nābhir] vedhena tathā pramāṇena//
GS41brhats_u:4379: 57.24cd/ stanayoḥ ṣoḍaśa ca^antaram ūrdhvaṃ kakṣye[K.kakṣe] ṣaḍ^aṅgulike//
GS41brhats_u:4380: 57.25ab/ *aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū kāryau[K.kāryāv aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa
GS41brhats_u:4383: 57.26ab/ ṣoḍaśa bāhū mūle pariṇāhād dvādaśa^agra^haste ca/
GS41brhats_u:4386: 57.27cd/ anayā tulyā ca^anāmikā kaniṣṭhā tu parva^ūnā//
GS41brhats_u:4387: 57.28ab/ parva^dvayam aṅguṣṭhaḥ śeṣa^aṅgulyas[K.śeṣāṅgulayas] tribhis tribhiḥ kāryāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4391: 57.30ab/ daśaratha^tanayo rāmo baliś ca vairocaniḥ śataṃ viṃśam/
GS41brhats_u:4393: 57.31ab/ kāryo +aṣṭabhujo bhagavāṃś catur^bhujo dvibhuja eva vā viṣṇuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4399: 57.34ab/ atha ca caturbhujam icchati śāntida eko gadā^dharaś ca^anyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4400: 57.34cd/ dakṣiṇa^pārśve tv[K.hy] evaṃ vāme śaṅkhaś ca cakraṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:4401: 57.35ab/ dvibhujasya tu śānti^karo dakṣiṇa^hasto +aparaś ca śaṅkha^dharaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4402: 57.35cd/ evaṃ viṣṇoḥ pratimā kartavyā bhūtim icchadbhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4407: 57.38ab/ kāryā caturbhujā yā vāma^karābhyāṃ sa^pustakaṃ kamalam/
GS41brhats_u:4408: 57.38cd/ dvābhyāṃ dakṣiṇa^pārśve varam arthiṣv akṣa^sūtraṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:4409: 57.39ab/ *vāmo +atha vā^aṣṭa^bhujāyāḥ[K.vāmeṣv aṣṭabhujāyāḥ] kamaṇḍaluś cāpam ambujaṃ śāstram/
GS41brhats_u:4411: 57.40ab/ śāmbaś ca gadā^hastaḥ pradyumnaś cāpa^bhṛt surūpaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4416: 57.42cd/ tiryag lalāṭa^saṃsthaṃ tṛtīyam api locanaṃ cihnam//
GS41brhats_u:4417: 57.43ab/ śambhoḥ śirasi^indukalā vṛṣa^dhvajo +akṣi ca tṛtīyam api
GS41brhats_u:4419: 57.43cd/ śūlaṃ dhanuḥ pinākaṃ vāma^ardhe vā girisutā^ardham//
GS41brhats_u:4423: 57.45cd/ dig^vāsās taruṇo rūpavāṃś ca kāryo +arhatāṃ devaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4425: 57.46cd/ kuryād udīcya^veṣaṃ gūḍhaṃ pādād uro yāvat//
GS41brhats_u:4432: 57.49ab/ saumyā tu hasta^mātrā vasudā hasta^dvaya^ucchritā pratimā/
GS41brhats_u:4437: 57.51ab/ maraṇaṃ tu sa^kṣatāyāṃ śastra^nipātena nirdiśet kartuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4439: 57.52ab/ andhatvam ūrdhva^dṛṣṭyā karoti cintām adhomukhī dṛṣṭiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4441: 57.53ab/ liṅgasya vṛtta^paradhiṃ dairghyeṇa^āsūtrya tat tridhā vibhajet/
GS41brhats_u:4442: 57.53cd/ mūle tac caturasraṃ[K.caturaśraṃ] madhye tv aṣṭāśriṃ vṛttam
GS41brhats_u:4448: 57.55cd/ yasya kṣataṃ bhaved mastake vināśāya tal^liṅgam//
GS41brhats_u:4451: 57.57ab/ daṇḍī yamo mahiṣago haṃsa^ārūḍhaś ca pāśabhṛd varuṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4469: 58.07ab/ liṅgaṃ vā pratimā vā drumavat sthāpyā yathā diśaṃ yasmāt/
GS41brhats_u:4470: 58.07cd/ tasmāc cihnayitavyā diśo drumasya^ūrdhvam atha vā^adhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4472: 58.08cd/ madyaiḥ kusumair dhūpair gandhaiś ca taruṃ samabhyarcya//
GS41brhats_u:4474: 58.09cd/ kṛtvā rātrau pūjāṃ vṛkṣaṃ saṃspṛśya ca brūyāt//
GS41brhats_u:4476: 58.10cd/ namas te vṛkṣa pūjeyaṃ vidhivat sampragṛhyatām//
GS41brhats_u:4494: 59.01ab/ diśi yāmyāyāṃ[K.saumyāyāṃ] kuryād adhivāsana^maṇḍapaṃ budhaḥ prāg vā/
GS41brhats_u:4496: 59.02ab/ pūrve bhāge citrāḥ srajaḥ patākāś ca maṇḍapasya^uktāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4497: 59.02cd/ āgneyyāṃ diśi raktāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ syur yāmya^nairṛtyoḥ[K.nairṛtayoḥ]//
GS41brhats_u:4498: 59.03ab/ śvetā diśy aparasyām vāyavyāyāṃ tu pāṇḍurā eva/
GS41brhats_u:4503: 59.05cd/ bhū^lābhaṃ tu mahāntaṃ śailī pratimā^atha vā liṅgam//
GS41brhats_u:4504: 59.06ab/ śaṅkhu^upahatā pratimā pradhāna^puruṣaṃ kulaṃ ca ghātayati/
GS41brhats_u:4505: 59.06cd/ śvabhra^upahatā rogān upadravāṃś ca kṣayam[K.akṣayān] kurute//
GS41brhats_u:4511: 59.09cd/ padma^saraḥsu ca mṛdbhiḥ sa^pañcagavyaiś ca tīrtha^jalaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4515: 59.11cd/ vaktavyā[K.japtavyā] dvija^mukhyaiḥ pūjyās te dakṣiṇābhiś ca//
GS41brhats_u:4516: 59.12ab/ yo devaḥ saṃsthāpyas tan^mantraiś ca^analaṃ dvijo juhuyāt/
GS41brhats_u:4518: 59.13ab/ dhūma^ākulo +apasavyo muhur muhur viphuliṅga^kṛn na śubhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4519: 59.13cd/ hotuḥ smṛti^lopo vā prasarpaṇaṃ ca^aśubhaṃ proktam//
GS41brhats_u:4527: 59.17ab/ kṛtvā baliṃ prabhūtaṃ sampūjya brāhmaṇāṃś ca sabhyāṃś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4530: 59.18cd/ kalyāṇānāṃ bhāgī bhavati^iha paratra ca svargī//
GS41brhats_u:4531: 59.19a viṣṇor bhāgavatān magāṃś ca savituḥ śambhoḥ sa^bhasma^dvijān
GS41brhats_u:4532: 59.19b mātṝṇām api maṇḍala^krama^vido[K.mātṛmaṇḍalavido] viprān vidur brahmaṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4533: 59.19c śākyān sarva^hitasya śānta^manaso nagnān jinānāṃ vidur
GS41brhats_u:4534: 59.19d ye yaṃ devam upāśritāḥ sva^vidhinā tais tasya kāryā kriyā//
GS41brhats_u:4539: 59.22ab/ sāmānyam idaṃ samāsato lokānāṃ hitadaṃ mayā kṛtam/
GS41brhats_u:4556: 60.06ab/ mārjāra^akṣaḥ kapilaḥ karaṭo vā na śubhado dvijasya^eva[K.dvijasyeṣṭaḥ]/
GS41brhats_u:4561: 60.08cd/ viprāṇām api na śubhaṃ karoti vṛṣabhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4562: 60.09ab/ ye ca^uddharanti pādān paṅkād iva yojitāḥ kṛśa^grīvāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4563: 60.09cd/ kātara^nayanā hīnāś ca pṛṣṭhatas te na bhārasahāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4575: 60.14cd/ pārṣṇibhir asphuṭita^ābhiḥ śastāḥ sarve ca[K.api] bhārasahāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4576: 60.15ab/ ghrāṇoddeśe savalir mārjāra^mukhaḥ sitaś ca dakṣiṇataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4582: 60.17cd/ haṃso nāma śubhaphalo yūthasya vivardhanaḥ proktaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4585: 60.18cd/ kalmāṣaś ca svāminam acirāt kurute patiṃ lakṣmyāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4586: 60.19ab/ yo vā sitaikacaraṇair[K.sitaikacaraṇo] yatheṣṭavarṇaś ca so +api
GS41brhats_u:4590: 61.01a pādāḥ pañca^nakhās trayo +agra^caraṇaḥ ṣaḍbhir nakhair dakṣiṇas
GS41brhats_u:4591: 61.01b tāmra^oṣṭha^agranaso mṛgeśvara^gatir jighran bhuvaṃ yāti ca/
GS41brhats_u:4592: 61.01c lāṅgūlaṃ sasaṭaṃ dṛg^ṛkṣa^sadṛśī karṇau ca lambau mṛdū
GS41brhats_u:4593: 61.01d yasya syāt sa karoti poṣṭur acirāt puṣṭāṃ śriyaṃ śvā gṛhe//
GS41brhats_u:4597: 61.02d yā sā rāṣṭraṃ kukkurī pāti puṣṭā[K.poṣṭuḥ]//
GS41brhats_u:4601: 62.01cd/ rauti susvaram uṣātyaye ca yo vṛddhidaḥ sa nṛpa^rāṣṭra^vājinām//
GS41brhats_u:4602: 62.02a yavagrīvo yo vā badara^sadṛśo vā^api vihago
GS41brhats_u:4603: 62.02b bṛhan^mūrdhā varṇair bhavati bahubhiś ca ruciraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4604: 62.02c sa śastaḥ saṃgrāme madhu^madhupa^varṇaś ca jayakṛd
GS41brhats_u:4614: 63.02cd/ sarpa^śirā vā sthūlagalo yaḥ so +api nṛpāṇāṃ rāṣṭra^vivṛddhyai//
GS41brhats_u:4621: 64.01cd/ dhanyāḥ sthāpyā veśmani santyājyāḥ sapta^dantā ye//
GS41brhats_u:4622: 64.02ab/ dakṣiṇa^pārśve maṇḍalam asitaṃ śuklasya śubhaphalaṃ bhavati/
GS41brhats_u:4624: 64.03ab/ stanavad avalambate yaḥ kaṇṭhe +ajānāṃ maṇiḥ sa vijñeyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4627: 64.04ab/ muṇḍāḥ sarve śubhadāḥ sarva^sitāḥ sarva^kṛṣṇa^dehāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4630: 64.05cd/ sa śubhaḥ sita^mūrdhā vā mūrdhani vā kṛttikā[K.ṭikkikā] yasya//
GS41brhats_u:4631: 64.06ab/ sa^pṛṣata^kaṇṭha^śirā vā tila^piṣṭa^nibhaś ca tāmradṛk śastaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4632: 64.06cd/ kṛṣṇa^caraṇaḥ sito vā kṛṣṇo vā śveta^caraṇo yaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4633: 64.07ab/ yaḥ kṛṣṇa^aṇḍaḥ śveto madhye kṛṣṇena bhavati paṭṭena/
GS41brhats_u:4634: 64.07cd/ yo vā carati saśabdaṃ mandaṃ ca sa śobhanaś chāgaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4635: 64.08ab/ ṛṣya^śiroruha^pādo yo vā prāk pāṇḍuro +apare nīlaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4636: 64.08cd/ sa bhavati śubhakṛc chāgaḥ ślokaś ca^apy atra garga^uktaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4637: 64.09ab/ kuṭṭakaḥ kuṭilaś ca^eva jaṭilo vāmanas tathā/
GS41brhats_u:4638: 64.09cd/ te catvāraḥ śriyaḥ putrā na^alakṣmīke vasanti te//
GS41brhats_u:4652: 65.01d vājī sarva^aṅga^śuddho bhavati narapateḥ śatru^nāśāya nityam//
GS41brhats_u:4660: 65.04ab/ teṣāṃ prapāṇa eko lalāṭa^keśeṣu ca dhruva^āvartāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4661: 65.04cd/ randhra^uparandhra^mūrdhani vakṣasi ca^iti smṛtau dvau dvau//
GS41brhats_u:4662: 65.05a ṣaṣbhir dantaiḥ sita^ābhair bhavati haya^śiśus taiḥ kaśāyair dvivarṣaiḥ
GS41brhats_u:4670: 66.01b na ca^*upadigdhā na[K.digdhāś ca] kṛśāḥ kṣamāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4737: 67.07c dāridryaṃ vinate tv adho +alpa^tanayo liṅge śirā^santate
GS41brhats_u:4738: 67.07d sthūla^granthi^yute sukhī mṛdu karoty antaṃ prameha^ādibhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4739: 67.08ab/ kośa^nigūḍhair bhūpā dīrghair bhagnaiś ca vitta^parihīnāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4741: 67.09ab/ jala^mṛtyur eka^vṛṣaṇo viṣamaiḥ strī^cañcalaḥ samaiḥ kṣitipaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4743: 67.10ab/ raktair āḍhyā maṇibhir nirdravyāḥ pāṇḍuraiś ca malinaiś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4750: 67.13ab/ maṇibhiś ca madhya^nimnaiḥ kanyā^pitaro bhavanti niḥsvāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4756: 67.16ab/ madirā^gandhe yajvā kṣāra^sagandhe ca retasi daridraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4762: 67.19ab/ avikala^pārśvā dhanino nimnair vakraiś ca bhoga^santyaktāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4764: 67.20ab/ unnata^kukṣāḥ kṣitipāḥ kuṭilāḥ syur mānavā viṣama^kukṣāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4767: 67.21cd/ alpā[K.svalpā] tv adṛśya^nimnā nābhiḥ kleśa^āvahā bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:4771: 67.23ab/ pārśva^āyatā cira^āyuṣam upariṣṭāc ca^īśvaraṃ gava^āḍhyam adhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4774: 67.24cd/ eka^dvi^tri^caturbhir valibhir vindyād nṛpaṃ tv avalim//
GS41brhats_u:4782: 67.28ab/ hṛdayaṃ samunnataṃ pṛthu na vepanaṃ māṃsalaṃ ca nṛpatīnām/
GS41brhats_u:4786: 67.29cd/ viṣamaṃ vakṣo yeṣāṃ te niḥsvāḥ śastra^nidhanāś ca//
GS41brhats_u:4790: 67.31ab/ cipiṭa^grīvo niḥsvaḥ śuṣkā saśirā ca yasya vā grīvā/
GS41brhats_u:4793: 67.32cd/ pṛṣṭham abhagnam aromaśam arthavatām aśubhadam ato +anyat//
GS41brhats_u:4797: 67.34ab/ nirmāṃsau romacitau bhagnāv alpau ca nirdhanasya^aṃsau/
GS41brhats_u:4801: 67.36ab/ hasta^aṅgulayo dīrghāś cira^āyuṣām avalitāś ca subhagānām/
GS41brhats_u:4805: 67.38ab/ maṇi^bandhanair nigūḍhair dṛḍhaiś ca su^śliṣṭa^sandhibhir bhūpāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4806: 67.38cd/ hīnair hasta^cchedaḥ ślathaiḥ saśabdaiś ca nirdravyāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4807: 67.39ab/ pitṛ^vittena vihīnā bhavanti nimnena karatalena narāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4809: 67.40ab/ viṣamair viṣamā niḥsvāś ca karatalair īśvarāś[K.īśvarās] tu
GS41brhats_u:4818: 67.43ab/ snigdhā nimnā rekhā dhanināṃ tad^vyatyayena niḥsvānām/
GS41brhats_u:4835: 67.51cd/ vimba[K.bimba]^upamair avakrair adharair bhūpās tanubhir asvāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4837: 67.52cd/ snigdhā ghanāś ca daśanāḥ sutīkṣṇa^daṃṣṭrāḥ samāś ca śubhāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4838: 67.53ab/ jihvā raktā dīrghā ślakṣṇā susamā ca bhogino[K.bhogināṃ] jñeyā/
GS41brhats_u:4839: 67.53cd/ śvetā kṛṣṇā paruṣā nirdravyāṇāṃ tathā tālu//
GS41brhats_u:4840: 67.54ab/ vaktraṃ saumyaṃ saṃvṛtam amalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ ca bhūpānām/
GS41brhats_u:4847: 67.57ab/ asphuṭita^agraṃ snigdhaṃ śmaśru śubhaṃ mṛdu ca sannataṃ ca^eva/
GS41brhats_u:4848: 67.57cd/ raktaiḥ paruṣaiś caurāḥ śmaśrubhir alpaiś ca vijñeyāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4854: 67.60ab/ bhogī tv animna^gaṇḍo mantrī sampūrṇa^māṃsa^gaṇḍo yaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4861: 67.63ab/ dhanināṃ kṣutaṃ sakṛd dvi^tri^piṇḍitaṃ hlādi sa^anunādaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:4866: 67.65ab/ hariṇa^akṣā maṇḍala^locanāś ca jihmaiś ca locanaiś caurāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4877: 67.69cd/ madhya^vinata^bhruvo ye te saktāḥ strīṣv agamyāsu//
GS41brhats_u:4885: 67.73ab/ ruditam adīnam anaśru snigdhaṃ ca śubha^āvahaṃ manuṣyāṇām/
GS41brhats_u:4886: 67.73cd/ rūkṣaṃ dīnaṃ pracura^aśru ca^eva na śubha^pradaṃ puṃsām//
GS41brhats_u:4887: 67.74ab/ hasitaṃ śubhadam akampaṃ sa^nimīlita^locanaṃ tu pāpasya/
GS41brhats_u:4889: 67.75ab/ tisro rekhāḥ śata^jīvināṃ lalāṭa^āyatāḥ sthitā yadi tāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4893: 67.77ab/ pañcabhir āyuḥ saptatir eka^agra^avasthitābhir api ṣaṣṭiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4901: 67.80cd/ nimnaṃ tu śiro mahatāṃ bahu^nimnam an^arthadaṃ bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:4903: 67.81cd/ mṛdubhir na ca^atibahubhiḥ keśaiḥ sukha^bhāg narendro vā//
GS41brhats_u:4906: 67.83ab/ yad yad gātraṃ rūkṣaṃ māṃsa^vihīnaṃ śira^avanaddhaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:4907: 67.83cd/ tat tad aniṣṭaṃ proktaṃ viparītam ataḥ śubhaṃ sarvam//
GS41brhats_u:4908: 67.84ab/ triṣu vipulo gambhīras triṣv eva ṣaḍ^unnataś catur^hrasvaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4909: 67.84cd/ saptasu rakto rājā pañcasu dīrghaś ca sūkṣmaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:4919: 67.87b raktā nakhāś ca khalu sapta sukha^āvahāni/
GS41brhats_u:4921: 67.87d sākaṃ tvacā *kararuhā na ca[K.kararuhāś ca na] duḥkhitānām//
GS41brhats_u:4923: 67.88cd/ iti dīrgham idaṃ tu pañcakaṃ na bhavaty eva nṛṇām abhūbhṛtām//
GS41brhats_u:4945: 67.94b ke cid vadanti daśa tāś ca yathā^anupūrvyā/
GS41brhats_u:4947: 67.94d tulyās tu lakṣaṇa^phalair iti tat samāsaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4952: 67.96cd/ rudhiraṃ māṃsaṃ ca^iti prāṇa^bhṛtāṃ tat samāsa^phalam//
GS41brhats_u:4956: 67.98ab/ snigdha^tvakkā dhanino mṛdubhiḥ subhagā vicakṣaṇās tanubhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4958: 67.99ab/ sthūla^asthir asthi^sāro balavān vidyā^antagaḥ surūpaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:4960: 67.100ab/ upacita^deho vidvān dhanī surūpaś ca māṃsa^sāro yaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4961: 67.100cd/ saṅghātā iti ca suśliṣṭa^sandhitā sukha^bhujo jñeyā//
GS41brhats_u:4964: 67.102ab/ dyutimān varṇa^snigdhaḥ[K.varṇaḥ snigdhaḥ] kṣitipānām madhyamaḥ suta^arthavatām/
GS41brhats_u:4965: 67.102cd/ rūkṣo dhana^hīnānāṃ śuddhaḥ śubhado na saṅkīrṇaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:4977: 67.107ab/ viṃśati^varṣā nārī puruṣaḥ khalu pañca^viṃśatibhir abdaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:4980: 67.108cd/ sattvena bhavati puruṣo lakṣaṇam etad bhavati teṣām[K.eṣām]//
GS41brhats_u:4999: 67.114a bhīruḥ kṣudhā^ālur bahu^bhuk ca yaḥ syād
GS41brhats_u:5004: 67.115b tulyā bhavanti gatibhiḥ śikhināṃ ca bhūpāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5005: 67.115c yeṣāṃ ca śabda^rahitaṃ stimitaṃ ca yātaṃ
GS41brhats_u:5011: [K.68.117ab/ puruṣa^lakṣaṇam uktam idaṃ mayā muni^matāny avalokya
GS41brhats_u:5013: K.68.117cd/ idam adhītya naro nṛpa^sammato bhavati sarva^janasya ca
GS41brhats_u:5017: 68.01cd/ pañca puruṣāḥ praśastā jāyante tān ahaṃ vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:5018: 68.02ab/ jīvena bhavati haṃsaḥ saureṇa śaśaḥ kujena rucakaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:5020: 68.03ab/ sattvam ahīnaṃ sūryāt^śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca candra^balāt/
GS41brhats_u:5021: 68.03cd/ yad rāśi^bheda^yuktāv etau tal lakṣaṇaḥ sa pumān//
GS41brhats_u:5024: 68.05ab/ bhaumāt sattvaṃ gurutā budhāt surejyāt svaraḥ sitāt snehaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5026: 68.06ab/ saṅkīrṇāḥ syur na nṛpā daśāsu teṣāṃ bhavanti sukha^bhājaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5028: 68.07ab/ ṣaṇ^ṇavatir aṅgulānāṃ vyāyāmo dīrghatā ca haṃsasya/
GS41brhats_u:5037: 68.09d miśrās tu te sapta saha prabhedaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5040: 68.10b māṃsaiḥ pūrṇa^aṅga^sandhiḥ sama^rucira^tanur madhya^bhāge kṛśaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:5041: 68.10c pañca^aṣṭau ca^ūrdhvam āsyaṃ śruti^vivaram api try^aṅgula^ūnaṃ ca tiryag
GS41brhats_u:5047: 68.12ab/ saptati^varṣo mālavyo +ayaṃ tyakṣyati samyak prāṇāṃs tīrthe/
GS41brhats_u:5048: 68.12cd/ lakṣaṇam etat samyak proktaṃ śeṣa^narāṇāṃ ca^ato vakṣye//
GS41brhats_u:5074: 68.19cd/ tīrthe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā bhadro deva^ālayaṃ yāti//
GS41brhats_u:5092: 68.24b vṛttaṃ ca^asya śiro +akṣiṇī madhu^nibhe sarve ca raktā nakhāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5095: 68.25ab/ ratir ambhasi śukra^sāratā dvi^guṇā ca^aṣṭa^śataiḥ palair mitiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5096: 68.25cd/ parimāṇam atha^asya ṣaḍ^yutā navatiḥ samparikīrtitā budhaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5098: 68.26cd/ śataṃ daśa^ūnaṃ śaradāṃ nṛpatvaṃ kṛtvā vana^ante samupaiti
GS41brhats_u:5101: 68.27cd/ śūraḥ krūraḥ śreṣṭho mantrī caura^svāmī vyāyāmī ca//
GS41brhats_u:5130: 68.35a kubjo nāmnā yaḥ sa śuddho hy adhastāt
GS41brhats_u:5131: 68.35b kṣīṇaḥ kiñ cit pūrva^kāye nataś ca/
GS41brhats_u:5164: 69.03d gūḍho maṇiś ca vipulāṃ śriyam ādadhāti//
GS41brhats_u:5181: 69.08ab/ no saṅgate na^atipṛthū na lambe śaste bhruvau bāla^śaśāṅka^vakre/
GS41brhats_u:5182: 69.08cd/ ardhendu^saṃsthānam aromaśaṃ ca śastaṃ lalāṭaṃ na nataṃ na
GS41brhats_u:5191: 69.10d pāde pāṇi^tale +atha vā[K.api vā] yuvatayo gacchanti rājñī^padam//
GS41brhats_u:5194: 69.11c na nimnam ati na^unnataṃ kara^talaṃ su^rekhā^anvitaṃ
GS41brhats_u:5203: 69.13d pramāṇam ūnā tu tad ūnam āyuḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5213: 69.16b mahīṃ na yasyāḥ śpṛśati striyāḥ syāt/
GS41brhats_u:5227: 69.20b śvaśuraṃ hanty udare sphijoḥ patiṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:5229: 69.20d na śubhā bhartur atīva yā ca dīrghā//
GS41brhats_u:5242: 69.24ab/ pādau sagulphau prathamaṃ pradiṣṭau jaṅghe dvitīyaṃ tu
GS41brhats_u:5244: 69.24cd/ meḍhra^ūru^muṣkaṃ ca tatas tṛtīyaṃ nābhiḥ kaṭiś ca^eva[K.ca iti]
GS41brhats_u:5246: 69.25ab/ udaraṃ kathayanti pañcamaṃ hṛdayaṃ ṣaṣṭham atas stana^anvitam/
GS41brhats_u:5247: 69.25cd/ atha saptamam aṃsajatruṇī kathayanty aṣṭamam oṣṭha^kandhare//
GS41brhats_u:5248: 69.26ab/ navamaṃ nayane ca sa^bhruṇī sa^lalāṭaṃ daśamaṃ śiras tathā/
GS41brhats_u:5249: 69.26cd/ aśubheṣv aśubhaṃ daśāphalaṃ caraṇa^ādyeṣu śubheṣu śobhanam//
GS41brhats_u:5253: 70.02ab[K.71.7ab]/ mṛge tu mūṣakād bhayaṃ vyasutvam eva śāṅkare/
GS41brhats_u:5258: 70.04cd[K.71.9cd]/ śubhaṃ ca bhojyam ānile dvi^daivate jana^priyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5261: 70.06ab[K.71.11ab]/ miṣṭam annam api vaiśva^daivate vaiṣṇave bhavati netra^rogatā/
GS41brhats_u:5268: [K.71.13ab/ vipra^matād atha bhūpati^dattaṃ yac ca vivāha^vidhāv
GS41brhats_u:5270: K.71.13cd/ teṣu guṇai rahiteṣv api bhoktuṃ nūtanam ambaramiṣṭaphalaṃ
GS41brhats_u:5274: 70.09ab[K.71.1ab]/ vastrasya koṇeṣu vasanti devā narāś ca
GS41brhats_u:5278: 70.10ab[K.71.2ab]/ lipte maṣī^gomaya^kardama^ādyaiś chinne pradagdhe sphuṭite ca vindyāt/
GS41brhats_u:5279: 70.10cd[K.71.2cd]/ puṣṭaṃ nave +alpa^alpataraṃ ca bhukte pāpaṃ śubhaṃ
GS41brhats_u:5283: 70.11cd[K.71.3cd]/ bhāge +amarāṇām atha bhoga^vṛddhiḥ prānteṣu sarvatra vadanty aniṣṭam//
GS41brhats_u:5285: 70.12cd[K.71.4cd]/ cheda^ākṛtir daivata^bhāgagā^api puṃsāṃ bhayaṃ mṛtyu^samaṃ karoti//
GS41brhats_u:5314: 72.01ab/ nicitaṃ tu[K's tr. nu] haṃsa^pakṣaiḥ kṛkavāku^mayūra^sārasānāṃ
GS41brhats_u:5316: 72.01cd/ daukūlyena[K.daukūlena] navena tu samantataś chāditaṃ śuklam//
GS41brhats_u:5319: 72.03ab/ daṇḍa^ardha^vistṛtaṃ tat samāvṛtaṃ ratna^bhūṣitam[K.ratnavibhūṣitam, K's tr. ratnabhūṣitam]
GS41brhats_u:5334: 73.02ab/ ratnāni vibhūṣayanti yoṣā bhūṣyante vanitā na ratnakāntyā/
GS41brhats_u:5335: 73.02cd/ ceto vinatā haranty aratnā no ratnāni
GS41brhats_u:5339: 73.03c mantri^prokta^niṣeviṇāṃ[K.niseviṇām, K's tr. niṣevinām] kṣitibhujām āśaṅkināṃ sarvato
GS41brhats_u:5341: 73.04a śrutaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ spṛṣṭaṃ smṛtam api nṛṇāṃ hlāda^jananaṃ
GS41brhats_u:5342: 73.04b na ratnaṃ strībhyo +anyat kva cid api kṛtaṃ lokapatinā/
GS41brhats_u:5344: 73.04d gṛhe lakṣmyo mānyāḥ satatam abalā māna^vibhavaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5353: 73.07ab/ somas tāsām adāt^śaucaṃ gandharvaḥ[K.gandharvāḥ] śikṣitāṃ giram/
GS41brhats_u:5354: 73.07cd/ agniś ca sarvabhakṣitvaṃ tasmān niṣkasamāḥ striyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5355: 73.08ab/ brāhmaṇāḥ pādato medhyā gāvo medhyāś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5356: 73.08cd/ aja^aśvā mukhato medhyāḥ striyo medhyās tu sarvataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5357: 73.09ab/ striyaḥ pavitram atulaṃ naitā duṣyanti karhi cit/
GS41brhats_u:5358: 73.09cd/ māsi māsi rajo hy āsāṃ duṣkṛtāny apakarṣati//
GS41brhats_u:5361: 73.11ab/ jāyā vā syāj janitrī vā sambhavaḥ strīkṛto nṛṇām/
GS41brhats_u:5362: 73.11cd/ he kṛtaghnāś tayor nindāṃ kurvatāṃ vaḥ kutaḥ śubham//
GS41brhats_u:5363: 73.12ab/ dampatyor vyutkrame doṣaḥ samaḥ śāstre pratiṣṭhitaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5365: 73.13ab/ bahir lomnā tu ṣaṇmāsān veṣṭitaḥ khara^carmaṇā/
GS41brhats_u:5368: 73.14cd/ tatra aśaktyā nirvartante narā dhairyeṇa yoṣitaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5369: 73.15ab/ aho dhārṣṭyam asādhūnāṃ nindatām anaghāḥ striyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5370: 73.15cd/ muṣṇatām iva caurāṇāṃ tiṣṭha caureti jalpatām//
GS41brhats_u:5371: 73.16a puruṣaś caṭulāni[K.cātulāni, K's tr. caṭulāni] kāminīnāṃ
GS41brhats_u:5372: 73.16b kurute yāni raho na tāni paścāt/
GS41brhats_u:5399: 74.02c evaṃ hy ātmā jāyate strīṣu bhūyaḥ
GS41brhats_u:5402: 74.03b svārthena ca^indriyam iti krama eṣa śīghraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5403: 74.03c yogo +ayam eva manasaḥ kim agamyam asti

GS41brhats_u:5410: 74.05cd/ mantra^oṣadha^ādyaiḥ kuhaka^prayogair bhavanti doṣā bahavo na
GS41brhats_u:5412: 74.06ab/ vāllabhyam āyāti vihāya mānaṃ daurbhāgyam āpādayate +abhimānaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5413: 74.06cd/ kṛcchreṇa saṃsādhayate +abhimānī kāryāṇy ayatnena vadan priyāṇi//
GS41brhats_u:5414: 74.07ab/ tejo na tad yat priya^sāhasatvaṃ vākyaṃ na ca^aniṣṭam
GS41brhats_u:5416: 74.07cd/ kāryasya gatva?^antam anuddhatā ye tejasvinas te na vikatthanā
GS41brhats_u:5418: 74.08ab/ yaḥ sārvajanyaṃ subhagatvam icched guṇān sa sarvasya vadet parokṣam[K.parokṣe]/
GS41brhats_u:5419: 74.08cd/ prāpnoti doṣān asato +apy anekān parasya yo doṣakathāṃ karoti//
GS41brhats_u:5421: 74.09cd/ kṛtvā^upakāraṃ dviṣatāṃ vipatsu yā kīrtir alpena na sā śubhena//
GS41brhats_u:5422: 74.10ab/ tṛṇair ivāgniḥ sutarāṃ vivṛddhim āchādyamāno +api guṇo
GS41brhats_u:5424: 74.10cd/ sa kevalaṃ durjanabhāvam eti hantuṃ guṇān vāñchati yaḥ parasya//
GS41brhats_u:5426: 75.01ab/ rakte +adhike strī puruṣas tu śukre napuṃsakaṃ śoṇita^śukrasāmye/
GS41brhats_u:5430: 75.02cd/ vallakī smarakathā rahaḥ srajo varga eṣa madanasya vāgurā//
GS41brhats_u:5439: 75.05ab/ vidārikāyāḥ svarasena cūrṇaṃ muhurmuhur bhāvitaśoṣitaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:5440: 75.05cd/ śṛtena dugdhena saśarkareṇa pibet sa yasya pramadāḥ prabhūtāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5449: 75.08ab/ māṣa^sūpa^sahitena sarpiṣā ṣaṣṭikaudanam adanti ye narāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5450: 75.08cd/ kṣīram apy anu pibanti tāsu te śarvarīṣu madanena[K.madane na]
GS41brhats_u:5465: 75.12d vyājān jarann iva yuvā +apy abalām avāpya//
GS41brhats_u:5480: 76.04c hṛdyaiś ca gandhair vividhaiś ca dhūpair

GS41brhats_u:5492: 76.08cd/ malaya^priyaṅgu^*bhāgau[K's tr. bhāgo] gandho dhūpyo guḍa^nakhena//
GS41brhats_u:5513: 76.16ab/ śrī^sarja^guḍa^nakhais te dhūpayitavyāḥ kramān na piṇḍasthaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5524: 76.21cd/ ṣaṇṇanavati^guṇaḥ kāryaḥ sā saṅkhyā bhavati gandhānām//
GS41brhats_u:5551: 76.32cd/ gandhāmbhaḥ kartavyaṃ kiñ cit kālaṃ sthitāny asmin//
