GS41brhats_u:5561: 76.35d tāmbūlam evam aparāṃś ca guṇān karoti//
GS41brhats_u:5566: 76.37a patra^adhikaṃ niśi hitaṃ saphalaṃ divā ca
GS41brhats_u:5571: 77.01ab/ śastrena veṇī^vinigūhitena vidūrathaṃ svā mahiṣī jaghāna/
GS41brhats_u:5572: 77.01cd/ viṣa^pradigdhena ca nūpureṇa devī viraktā kila kāśirājam//
GS41brhats_u:5584: 77.04d dṛkpātaś ca parāṅmukhe guṇakathā karṇasya kaṇḍūyanam//
GS41brhats_u:5601: 77.09ab/ bhikṣuṇikā pravrajitā dāsī dhātrī kumārikā rajikā/
GS41brhats_u:5606: 77.11cd/ vyasana^utsavāś ca saṅketa^hetavas teṣu rakṣyāś ca//
GS41brhats_u:5609: 77.12c bhāvair na^ekavidhaiḥ karoty abhinayaṃ bhūyaś ca yā sādarā
GS41brhats_u:5610: 77.12d buddhvā pumprakṛtiṃ ca yā^anucarati glānetaraiś ceṣṭitaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5621: 77.16ab/ duṣṭa^svabhāvāḥ parivarjanīyā vimarda^kāleṣu ca na kṣamā yāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5622: 77.16cd/ yāsām asṛg^vā^asita^nīla^pītam ātāmravarṇaṃ ca na tāḥ praśastāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5625: 77.17cd/ mahāśanā svedayutāṅgaduṣṭhā yā hrasvakeśī palitānvitā vā[K.ca]//
GS41brhats_u:5631: 77.19cd/ prakṣālitaṃ virajyati yac ca^asṛk tad bhavet^śuddham//
GS41brhats_u:5638: 77.22cd/ snāyāt tathātra mantraḥ sa eva yas tatra nirdiṣṭaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5639: 77.23ab/ yugmāsu kila manuṣyā niśāsu nāryo bhavanti viṣamāsu/
GS41brhats_u:5641: 77.24ab/ dakṣiṇa^pārśve puruṣo vāme nārī yamāv ubhayasaṃsthau//
GS41brhats_u:5649: 77.26c ṛtur api daśa ṣaṭ ca vāsarāṇi
GS41brhats_u:5652: 78.01ab/ sarvasya sarvakālaṃ yasmād upayogam eti śāstram idam/
GS41brhats_u:5658: 78.04ab/ kaṇṭakino *ye ca[K.vā ye] syur mahānadī^saṅgama^udbhavā ye ca/
GS41brhats_u:5659: 78.04cd/ surabhavanajāś ca na śubhā ye ca^apara^yāmya^dik^patitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5663: 78.06ab/ pūrvacchinnaṃ yadi vā dāru bhavet tat parīkṣyam ārambhe/
GS41brhats_u:5664: 78.06cd/ yady ārohet tasmin kumārakaḥ putra^paśu^daṃ tat//
GS41brhats_u:5666: 78.07cd/ maṅgalyāny anyāni ca dṛṣṭvā^ārambhe śubhaṃ jñeyam//
GS41brhats_u:5668: 78.08cd/ aṅgulaśataṃ nṛpāṇāṃ mahatī śayyā jayāya kṛtā//
GS41brhats_u:5669: 78.09ab/ navatiḥ saiva ṣaḍūnā dvādaśahīnā triṣaṭkahīnā ca/
GS41brhats_u:5673: 78.11ab/ yaḥ sarvaḥ śrīparṇyā paryaṅko nirmitaḥ sa dhanadātā/
GS41brhats_u:5675: 78.12ab/ yaḥ kevalaśiṃśapayā vinirmito bahuvidhaṃ sa vṛddhikaraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5677: 78.13ab/ yaḥ padmaka^paryaṅkaḥ sa dīrgham āyuḥ śriyaṃ śrutaṃ vittam/
GS41brhats_u:5678: 78.13cd/ kurute śālena kṛtaḥ kalyāṇaṃ śākaracitaś ca//
GS41brhats_u:5680: 78.14cd/ adhyāsan paryaṅkaṃ vibudhair api pūjyate nṛpatiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5681: 78.15ab/ anyena samāyuktā na tindukī śiṃśapā ca śubhaphaladā/
GS41brhats_u:5682: 78.15cd/ na *śrīparṇena[K.śrīparṇī na] ca devadāruvṛkṣo na ca^apy asanaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5683: 78.16ab/ śubhadau tu śāla^śākau[K.śākaśālau] parasparaṃ saṃyutau pṛthak
GS41brhats_u:5685: 78.16cd/ tadvat pṛthak praśastau sahitau ca haridraka^kadambau//
GS41brhats_u:5686: 78.17ab/ sarvaḥ spandana^racito na śubhaḥ prāṇān hinasti ca^ambakṛtaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5693: 78.20cd/ adhikam anūpacarāṇāṃ nyūnaṃ giricāriṇāṃ kiñ cit//
GS41brhats_u:5697: 78.22cd/ loṣṭhe[K.ū.loṣṭe] tu labdhapūrvasya bhavati deśasya samprāptiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5704: 78.25ab/ pāśe +atha vā kabandhe nṛpa^mṛtyur janavipat srute rakte/
GS41brhats_u:5705: 78.25cd/ kṛṣṇe śyāve rūkṣe durgandhe cāśubhaṃ bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:5706: 78.26ab/ śuklaḥ samaḥ sugandhiḥ snigdhaś ca śubhāvaho bhavec chedaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5707: 78.26cd/ aśubha^śubhacchedā ye śayaneṣv api te tathā phaladāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5713: 78.29ab/ suṣire +atha vā vivarṇe granthau pādasya śīrṣage vyādhiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5714: 78.29cd/ pāde kumbho yaś ca granthau tasminn udararogaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5715: 78.30ab/ kumbha^adhastāj jaṅghā tatra kṛto jaṅghayoḥ karoti bhayam/
GS41brhats_u:5716: 78.30cd/ tasyāś ca^ādharo +adhaḥ kṣayakṛd dravyasya tatra kṛtaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5717: 78.31ab/ khuradeśe yo granthiḥ khuriṇāṃ pīḍākaraḥ sa nirdiṣṭaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5718: 78.31cd/ īṣā^śīrṣaṇyoś ca tribhāga^saṃstho bhaven na śubhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5719: 78.32ab/ niṣkuṭam atha kolākṣaṃ sūkaranayanaṃ ca vatsanābhaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:5720: 78.32cd/ kālakam anyad dhundhukam iti kathitaś chidra^saṃkṣepaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5721: 78.33ab/ ghaṭavat suṣiraṃ madhye saṅkaṭam āsye ca niṣkuṭaṃ chidram/
GS41brhats_u:5725: 78.35ab/ kālakasaṃjñaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhundhukam iti yad bhaved vinirbhinnam/
GS41brhats_u:5726: 78.35cd/ dārusavarṇaṃ chidraṃ na tathā pāpaṃ samuddiṣṭam//
GS41brhats_u:5729: 78.37ab/ kālaka^dhundhuka^saṃjñaṃ kīṭair viddhaṃ ca na śubhadaṃ chidram/
GS41brhats_u:5730: 78.37cd/ sarvaṃ granthipracuraṃ sarvatra na śobhanaṃ dāru//
GS41brhats_u:5734: 78.39ab/ pañca^vanaspati^racite pañcatvaṃ yāti tatra yaḥ śete/
GS41brhats_u:5737: 79.01ab/ ratnena śubhena śubhaṃ bhavati nṛpāṇām aniṣṭam aśubhena/
GS41brhats_u:5738: 79.01cd/ yasmād ataḥ parīkṣyaṃ daivaṃ ratnāśritam tajjñaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5741: 79.03ab/ ratnāni balād daityād dadhīcito +anye vadanti jātāni/
GS41brhats_u:5742: 79.03cd/ ke cid bhuvaḥ svabhāvād vaicitryaṃ prāhur upalānām//
GS41brhats_u:5750: 79.07cd/ āpītaṃ ca kaliṅge śyāmaṃ pauṇḍreṣu sambhūtam//
GS41brhats_u:5751: 79.08ab/ aindraṃ ṣaḍaśri śuklaṃ yāmyaṃ sarpa^āsya^rūpam asitaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:5756: 79.10cd/ srotaḥ khaniḥ prakīrṇakam ity ākara^sambhavas trividhaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5757: 79.11ab/ raktaṃ pītaṃ ca śubham rājanyānām sitam dvijātīnām/
GS41brhats_u:5759: 79.12ab/ sitasarṣapa^aṣṭakaṃ taṇḍulo bhavet taṇḍulais tu viṃśatyā/
GS41brhats_u:5760: 79.12cd/ tulitasya dve lakṣe mūlyaṃ dvidvyūnite caitat//
GS41brhats_u:5762: 79.13cd/ bhāgaś ca pañcaviṃśaḥ śatikas sāhasrikaś ca^iti//
GS41brhats_u:5763: 79.14ab/ sarva^dravya^ābhedyaṃ laghv ambhasi tarati raśmivat snighdam/
GS41brhats_u:5769: 79.17a vajraṃ na kiñ cid api dhārayitavyam eke
GS41brhats_u:5778: 80.01cd/ muktāphalāni teṣāṃ bahusādhu ca śuktijaṃ bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:5783: 80.04ab/ kṛṣṇāḥ śvetāḥ pītāḥ saśarkarāḥ pāralaukikā viṣamāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5784: 80.04cd/ na sthūlā nātyalpā navanīta^nibhāś ca saurāṣṭrāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5788: 80.06ab/ viṣamam kṛṣṇa^śvetaṃ[K.kṛṣṇam śvetam] laghu kauberaṃ pramāṇa^tejovat/
GS41brhats_u:5797: 80.10cd/ aṣṭau ca śatāni śatatrayaṃ tripañcāśatā sahitam//
GS41brhats_u:5798: 80.11ab/ pañcatriṃśaṃ śatam iti catvāraḥ kṛṣṇalā navatimūlyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5799: 80.11cd/ sārdhās tisro guñjāḥ saptatimūlyaṃ dhṛtaṃ rūpam//
GS41brhats_u:5802: 80.13ab/ paladaśabhāgo dharaṇaṃ tad yadi muktās trayodaśa surūpāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5807: 80.15cd/ ṣaṣṭiḥ pañconā vā dharaṇam pañca^aṣṭakaṃ mūlyam//
GS41brhats_u:5819: 80.21ab/ teṣāṃ kila jāyante muktāḥ kumbheṣu saradakośeṣu/
GS41brhats_u:5821: 80.22ab/ naiṣām arghaḥ kāryo na ca vedho +atīva te prabhāyuktāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5824: 80.23cd/ timijaṃ matsya^aākṣi^ibhaṃ bṛhat pavitraṃ bahuguṇaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:5826: 80.24cd/ hriyate kila khād divyais taḍit^prabhaṃ megha^sambhūtam//
GS41brhats_u:5827: 80.25ab/ takṣaka^vāsuki^kulajāḥ kāmagamā ye ca pannagās teṣām/
GS41brhats_u:5829: 80.26ab/ śaste +avanipradeśe rajatamaye bhājane sthite ca yadi/
GS41brhats_u:5831: 80.27ab/ apaharati viṣamalakṣmīṃ kṣapayati śatrūn yaśo vikāśayati/
GS41brhats_u:5832: 80.27cd/ bhaujaṅgaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ dhṛtam akṛtārghaṃ vijayadaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:5833: 80.28ab/ karpūra^sphaṭika^nibhaṃ cipiṭaṃ viṣamaṃ ca veṇujaṃ jñeyam/
GS41brhats_u:5834: 80.28cd/ śaṅkha^udbhavaṃ śaśinibhaṃ vṛttaṃ bhrājiṣṇu ruciraṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:5837: 80.29cd/ amitaguṇatvāc ca^eṣām arghaḥ śāstre na nirdiṣṭaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5844: 80.32ab/ śatam aṣṭayutaṃ hāro devacchando hy aśītir ekayutā/
GS41brhats_u:5860: 81.02ab/ kuruvinda^bhavāḥ śabalā manda^dyutayaś ca dhātubhir viddhāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:5865: 81.04cd/ durviddhā na manojñāḥ saśarkarāś ca^iti maṇidoṣāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5867: 81.05cd/ bhavati maṇiḥ kika mūrdhani yo +anargheyaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5868: 81.06a yas taṃ bibharti manujādhipatir na tasya
GS41brhats_u:5870: 81.06c rāṣṭre ca nityam abhivarṣati tasya devaḥ
GS41brhats_u:5871: 81.06d śatrūṃś ca nāśayati tasya maṇeḥ prabhāvāt//
GS41brhats_u:5889: 83.01c dīpaḥ pāpaṃ kathayati phalaṃ śabdavān vepanaś ca
GS41brhats_u:5893: 83.02c lakṣmīṃ kṣipram abhivyanakti suciraṃ[K.ruciraṃ, K's tr. suciram]
GS41brhats_u:5900: 84.01d mā bhūd ato vacmy atha kāmikāni//
GS41brhats_u:5935: 85.01cd/ matebhyaḥ prāha ṛṣabho bhāgurer devalasya ca//
GS41brhats_u:5938: 85.03ab/ saptarṣīṇāṃ mataṃ yac ca saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca yat/
GS41brhats_u:5939: 85.03cd/ yāni ca^uktāni garga^ādyair yātrākāraiś ca bhūribhiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5943: 85.05cd/ yat tasya śakunaḥ pākaṃ nivedayati gacchatām//
GS41brhats_u:5947: 85.07ab/ pṛthag jāty^anavasthānād eṣāṃ vyaktir na lakṣyate/
GS41brhats_u:5955: 85.11ab/ pathy^ātmānaṃ nṛpaṃ sainye pure ca^uddiśya devatām/
GS41brhats_u:5963: 85.14cd/ sthāna^vṛddhy^upaghātāc ca tadvad brūyāt phalaṃ punaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5971: 85.18cd/ klība^strī^*puruṣā jñeyā[K.puruśāś ca eṣāṃ] balinaḥ syur yathottaram//
GS41brhats_u:5973: 85.19cd/ svabhūmāv anulomāś ca tad^ūnāḥ syur vivarjitāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5975: 85.20cd/ balinaḥ siṃhanādaś ca kūṭapūrī ca pūrvataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:5984: 85.24cd/ divācaro na śarvaryāṃ na ca naktaṃcaro divā//
GS41brhats_u:5986: 85.25cd/ āpaga^antaritā mattā na grāhyāḥ śakunāḥ kva cit//
GS41brhats_u:5993: 85.28cd/ hemante niṣphalā jñeyā bālāḥ sarve vimānuṣāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6001: 85.32cd/ dhanavān īkṣaṇīkaś ca mālākāraḥ paraṃ tataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6002: 85.33ab/ vaiṣṇavaś carakaś ca^eva vājināṃ rakṣaṇe rataḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6005: 85.34ab/ rājā kumāro netā ca dūtaḥ śreṣṭhī caro dvijaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6008: 85.35ab/ gacchatas tiṣṭhato vā^api diśi yasyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6013: 85.37ab/ śivā śyāmā ralā chucchuḥ piṅgalā gṛhagodhikā/
GS41brhats_u:6014: 85.37cd/ sūkarī parapuṣṭā ca punnāmānaś ca vāmataḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6018: 85.39cd/ satūrya^adhyayanāḥ puṃvat strīvad anyā giraḥ śubhāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6019: 85.40ab/ grāmau madhyama^ṣaḍjau tu gāndhāraś ca^iti śobhanāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6028: 85.44ab/ chikkaraḥ kūṭapūrī ca pirilī cāhni dakṣiṇāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6030: 85.45ab/ śreṣṭhe hayasite prācyāṃ śavamāṃse ca dakṣiṇe/
GS41brhats_u:6039: 85.49cd/ sarva eva viparyastā grāhyāḥ sārtheṣu yoṣitām//
GS41brhats_u:6042: 85.51ab/ vāma^dakṣiṇagau śastau yau tu tāv agra^pṛṣṭhagau/
GS41brhats_u:6046: 85.53ab/ ke cit tu śakuna^dvāram icchanty ubhayataḥ sthitaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6048: 85.54ab/ visarjayati yady eka ekaś ca pratiṣedhati/
GS41brhats_u:6049: 85.54cd/ sa virodho +aśubho yātur grāhyo yo[K.ū.vā] balavattaraḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6050: 85.55ab/ pūrvaṃ prāveśiko[K.prāveśeko] bhūtvā punaḥ prāsthāniko bhavet/
GS41brhats_u:6052: 85.56ab/ visarjya śakunaḥ pūrvaṃ sa eva niruṇaddhi cet/
GS41brhats_u:6053: 85.56cd/ prāha yātur arer mṛtyuṃ ḍamaraṃ rogam eva vā//
GS41brhats_u:6063: 85.61cd/ kurvanti śakunā dīptāḥ śāntā yāpya^phalās tu te//
GS41brhats_u:6065: 85.62cd/ sthānād ruvan vrajed yātrāṃ śaṃsate tv anyathāgamam//
GS41brhats_u:6067: 85.63cd/ uccam ādau svaraṃ kṛtvā nīcaṃ paścāc ca doṣakṛt[K.moṣakṛt]//
GS41brhats_u:6078: 85.68cd/ cirakālena[K.cirakālaiś ca] dīptādyāsv āgamo dikṣu tannṛṇām//
GS41brhats_u:6079: 85.69ab/ sadravyo balavāṃś ca syāt sadravyasya^āgamo bhavet/
GS41brhats_u:6105: 85.79c kustrī pradīrghā vidhavā ca tāś ca
GS41brhats_u:6112: 86.01ab/ aindryāṃ diśi śāntāyāṃ viruvan nṛpa^saṃśrita^āgamaṃ vakti/
GS41brhats_u:6121: 86.05cd/ yad vā tad vā phalam api yātrāyāṃ prāpnuyād yātā//
GS41brhats_u:6136: 86.13ab/ vāyavyāc ca tṛtīye mitreṇa samāgamo dhanaprāptiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6138: 86.14ab/ dadhi^taṇḍula^lājānāṃ labdhir udag darśanaṃ ca viprasya/
GS41brhats_u:6144: 86.16cd/ prāk prathame vastrāptiḥ samāgamaś ca^api bandhakyā//
GS41brhats_u:6153: 86.20cd/ labdhiś ca tatkṛtānāṃ dravyāṇām aśva^labdhir vā//
GS41brhats_u:6154: 86.21ab/ nemī^bhāgaṃ buddhvā nābhī^bhāgaṃ ca dakṣiṇe yo +araḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6157: 86.22cd/ vṛṣabhasya ca^atra labdhir māṣa^kulattha^ādyam aśanam ca//
GS41brhats_u:6158: 86.23ab/ aparasyāṃ diśi yo +aras tatra^āsaktiḥ kṛṣīvalair bhavati/
GS41brhats_u:6168: 86.27cd/ saumyena ca dvitīye śeṣeṣv atiśobhanā yātrā//
GS41brhats_u:6169: 86.28ab/ abhyantare tu nābhyāṃ śubhaphaladā bhavati ṣaṭsu ca^areṣu/
GS41brhats_u:6171: 86.29ab/ śāntāsu dikṣu phalam idam uktaṃ dīptāsv ato +abhidhāsyāmi/
GS41brhats_u:6172: 86.29cd/ aindryāṃ bhayaṃ narendrāt samāgamaś ca^eva śātrūṇām//
GS41brhats_u:6175: 86.31ab/ agnibhayaṃ ca caturthe bhayam āgneye ca bhavati caurebhyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6179: 86.33ab/ atha pañcame nṛpa^bhayaṃ mārī^mṛta^darśanaṃ ca vaktavyam/
GS41brhats_u:6180: 86.33cd/ ṣaṣṭhe tu bhayaṃ jñeyaṃ gandharvāṇāṃ saḍombānām//
GS41brhats_u:6189: 86.38ab/ parato vitta^vināśo mitraiḥ saha vigrahaś ca vijñeyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6190: 86.38cd/ tasya^āsanne +aśvavadho bhayam api ca purodhasaḥ proktam//
GS41brhats_u:6194: 86.40cd/ aiśāne tv agni^bhayaṃ dūṣaṇam apy uttama^strīṇām//
GS41brhats_u:6195: 86.41ab/ prāk tasya^eva^āsanne duḥkha^utpattiḥ striyā vināśaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:6196: 86.41cd/ bhayam ūrdhvaṃ rajakānāṃ vijñeyaṃ kācchikānāṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:6198: 86.42cd/ abhyantare tu dīpte patnī^maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ pūrve//
GS41brhats_u:6202: 86.44ab/ apare tu karmiṇāṃ bhayam atha koṇe ca^anile khara^uṣṭra^vadhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6204: 86.45ab/ udag artha^vipra^pīḍā diśy aiśānyāṃ tu citta^santāpaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6219: 87.03d dyuniśam api biḍālaḥ sārasaḥ sūkaraś ca//
GS41brhats_u:6223: 87.05ab/ kapotakī ca śyāmā vañjulakaḥ kīrtyate khadiracañcuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6226: 87.06cd/ bhṛṅgāravac ca viruvati[K.vāśati] niśi bhūmau dvy^aṅgula^śarīrā//
GS41brhats_u:6231: 87.09ab/ divyo dhanvana uktaḥ kroḍaḥ syāt sūkaro +atha gaurusrā/
GS41brhats_u:6232: 87.09cd/ śvā sārameya ukto jātyā caṭikā ca sūkarikā//
GS41brhats_u:6233: 87.10ab/ evaṃ deśe deśe tadvidbhyaḥ samupalabhya nāmāni//
GS41brhats_u:6235: 87.11ab/ vañjulaka^rutaṃ tittiḍ iti dīptam atha kilkili^iti tatpūrṇam/
GS41brhats_u:6241: 87.14ab/ cicid iti śabdaḥ pūrṇaḥ śyāmāyāḥ śūliśūl iti ca dhanyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6242: 87.14cd/ cacca^iti dīptaḥ syāt svapriya^lābhāya[K.yogāya] cikcig iti//
GS41brhats_u:6243: 87.15ab/ hārītasya tu śabdo gugguḥ pūrṇo +apare pradīptāḥ syuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6246: 87.16cd/ kṣamāya[K.ū.kṣemāya] kevalaṃ karakara^iti na tv artha^siddhi^karaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6247: 87.17ab/ koṭukli^iti kṣemyaḥ svaraḥ kaṭukli^iti vṛṣṭaye tasyāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6248: 87.17cd/ aphalaḥ koṭikili^iti ca dīptaḥ khalu guṃ kṛtaḥ śabdaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6256: 87.19d na sa siddhyai kuśalo gamāgame ca//
GS41brhats_u:6271: 87.23c khe svastikaṃ yadi karoty atha vā yiyāsos
GS41brhats_u:6278: 87.25b cāṣaḥ karoti virutaṃ jayakṛt tadā syāt/
GS41brhats_u:6279: 87.25c krekra^iti[K.krakreti] tasya virutaṃ na śivāya dīptaṃ
GS41brhats_u:6291: 87.28c vāmataś ca yadi dakṣiṇaṃ vrajet 87.28d kārya^siddhim acireṇa yacchati//
GS41brhats_u:6296: 87.30ab/ krakra^iti ca sārikā drutaṃ tretre vā^apy^abhayā virauti yā/
GS41brhats_u:6314: 87.35b tasyāḥ śubhāḥ kulukulur na śubhās tu śeṣāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6316: 87.35d gos tu kṣutaṃ maraṇam eva karoti yātuḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6317: 87.36a huṃhuṃguglug iti priyām abhilaṣan krośaty ulūko mudā
GS41brhats_u:6318: 87.36b pūrṇaḥ syād gurulu pradīptam api ca jñeyaṃ sadā kiskisi/
GS41brhats_u:6319: 87.36c vijñeyaḥ kalaho yadā balabalaṃ tasya[K.tasyāḥ] asakṛd vāśitaṃ
GS41brhats_u:6320: 87.36d doṣāya^eva ṭaṭaṭṭaṭa^iti na śubhāḥ śeṣās tu dīpta[K.dīptāḥ]svarāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6321: 87.37ab/ sārasa^kūjitam iṣṭaphalaṃ tad yad yugapad^virutaṃ mithunasya/
GS41brhats_u:6322: 87.37cd/ ekarutaṃ na śubhaṃ yadi vā syād ekarute pravirauti[K.pratirauti]
GS41brhats_u:6324: 87.38ab/ cirilvirilv iti svaraiḥ śubhaṃ karoti piṅgalāḥ[K.piṅgalā]/
GS41brhats_u:6325: 87.38cd/ ato +apare tu ye svarāḥ pradīpta^saṃjñitās tu te//
GS41brhats_u:6338: 87.42ab/ viddhi bhadre mayā yat tvam imam arthaṃ pracoditā/
GS41brhats_u:6340: 87.43ab/ āpṛcche +adya gamiṣyāmi veditaś ca punas tv aham/
GS41brhats_u:6341: 87.43cd/ prātar āgamya pṛcche tvām āgneyīṃ diśam āśritaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6342: 87.44ab/ pracodayāmy ahaṃ yat tvāṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi/
GS41brhats_u:6355: 87.47d pūrṇā tu sā tittiḍ iti svanena//
GS41brhats_u:6358: dhvajaṃ cāmaraṃ śādvalaṃ puṣpitaṃ vā pradeśaṃ yadā śvā^avamūtrya^agrato
GS41brhats_u:6359: yāti yātus tadā kārya^siddhir bhaved ārdrake gomaye miṣṭabhojya^āgamaḥ
GS41brhats_u:6360: śuṣka^sammūtraṇe śuṣkam annaṃ guḍo modaka^avāptir eva^atha vā
GS41brhats_u:6363: bhāṇḍāny abhuktāny abhinnāni vā mūtrayan kanyakā^doṣakṛd bhujyamānāni ced duṣṭatāṃ tad^gṛhiṇyās tathā syād upānat^phalaṃ gos tu sammūtraṇe
GS41brhats_u:6365: 88.01c gamana^mukham upānahaṃ sampragṛhya^upatiṣṭhed yadā syād tadā
GS41brhats_u:6367: sa^agny^alātena śuṣkeṇa ca^asthnā gṛhītena mṛtyuḥ praśānta^ulmukena^abhighāto +atha puṃsaḥ śiro^hasta^pāda^ādi vaktre bhuvo +abhyāgamo[K.hyāgamo] vastra^cīra^ādibhir vyāpadaḥ ke cid āhuḥ savastre śubham
GS41brhats_u:6368: 88.01d praviśati tu gṛhaṃ sa^śuṣka^asthi^vaktre pradhānasya tasmin vadhaḥ
GS41brhats_u:6369: śṛṅkhalā^śīrṇa^vallī^varatrā^ādi vā bandhanaṃ ca^upagṛhya^upatiṣṭhed yadā syāt tadā bandhanaṃ leḍhi pādau vidhunvan svakarṇāv upary ākramaṃś ca^api
GS41brhats_u:6370: vighnāya yātur virodhe virodhas tathā sva^aṅga^kaṇḍūyane syāt svapaṃś ca^ūrdhva^pādaḥ sadā
GS41brhats_u:6400: 88.09ab/ kuḍyam utkirati veśmano yadā tatra khānaka^bhayaṃ bhavet tadā/
GS41brhats_u:6401: 88.09cd/ goṣṭham utkirati go^grahaṃ vaded dhānya^labdhim api
GS41brhats_u:6419: 88.14a grāme bhaṣitvā ca bahiḥ śmaśāne 88.14b bhaṣanti ced uttama^puṃ^vināśaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6455: 89.03ab/ pūrvodīcyoḥ śivā śastā śāntā sarvatra pūjitā/
GS41brhats_u:6457: 89.4ab[K.omitted]/ rājā kumāro netā ca dūtaḥ śreṣṭhī caro dvijaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6461: 89.05cd/ pure sainye +apasavyā ca kaṣṭā sūryonmukhī śivā//
GS41brhats_u:6467: 89.08cd/ vāruṇy anurutā sā^eva śaṃsate salile mṛtam//
GS41brhats_u:6469: 89.09cd/ kṣobhaḥ pradhāna^bhedaś ca vāhanānāṃ ca sampadaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6470: 89.10ab/ phalam ā saptamād etad agrāhyaṃ parato rutam/
GS41brhats_u:6472: 89.11ab/ yā romāñcaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ śakṛn^mūtraṃ ca vājinām/
GS41brhats_u:6473: 89.11cd/ rāvāt trāsaṃ ca janayet sā śivā na śiva^pradā//
GS41brhats_u:6475: 89.12cd/ yā śivā sā śivaṃ sainye pure vā samprayacchati//
GS41brhats_u:6476: 89.13ab/ bhebhā^iti śivā bhayaṅkarī bhobho vyāpadam ādiśec ca sā/
GS41brhats_u:6481: 89.14c ṭeṭe ca pūrvaṃ parataś ca thethe
GS41brhats_u:6485: 89.15c yā sā kṣemaṃ prāha vittasya cāptiṃ
GS41brhats_u:6498: 90.03c sūte mṛtyuḥ syād bhayaṃ saṃsthite ca
GS41brhats_u:6505: 91.02ab/ akāraṇe krośati ced anartho bhayāya rātrau vṛṣabhaḥ śivāya/
GS41brhats_u:6506: 91.02cd/ bhṛśaṃ niruddhā yadi makṣikābhis tadā^āśu vṛṣṭiṃ saramātmajair vā//
GS41brhats_u:6515: 92.01d dve varṣe dahana^kaṇāś ca dhūpanaṃ vā//
GS41brhats_u:6518: 92.02c pāyau ca pucche ca parājayaḥ syād
GS41brhats_u:6528: 92.05a pradveṣo yavasa^ambhasāṃ prapatanaṃ svedo nimittād vinā
GS41brhats_u:6529: 92.05b kampo vā vadanāc ca rakta^patanaṃ dhūmasya vā sambhavaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6530: 92.05c asvapnaś ca virodhināṃ[K.virodhitā] niśi divā nidrā^alasa^dhyānatā/
GS41brhats_u:6531: 92.05d sādo +adho^mukhatā viceṣṭitam idaṃ neṣṭaṃ smṛtaṃ vājinām//
GS41brhats_u:6540: 92.08c dravyam iṣṭam atha vā paraṃ bhaved
GS41brhats_u:6561: 92.13d yo +aśvaḥ sa bhartur acirāt pracinoti lakṣmīm//
GS41brhats_u:6566: 92.15ab/ uktam idaṃ haya^ceṣṭitam ata ūrdhvaṃ dantināṃ pravakṣyāmi/
GS41brhats_u:6569: 93.01ab/ dantasya mūla^paridhiṃ dvir āyataṃ prohya kalpayet^śeṣam/
GS41brhats_u:6570: 93.01cd/ adhikam anūpa^carāṇāṃ nyūnaṃ giri^cāriṇāṃ kiñ cit//
GS41brhats_u:6574: 93.03cd/ loṣṭe tu labdha^pūrvasya bhavati deśasya samprāptiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6581: 93.06ab/ pāśe +atha vā kabandhe nṛpa^mṛtyur jana^vipat srute rakte/
GS41brhats_u:6582: 93.06cd/ kṛṣṇe śyāve rūkṣe durgandhe ca^aśubhaṃ bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:6583: 93.07ab/ śuklaḥ samaḥ sugandhiḥ snigdhaś ca śubha^āvaho bhavec chedaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6604: 93.13b yāyād yātrā^anulomaṃ tvarita^pada^gatir vaktram unnāmya ca^uccaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6605: 93.13c kakṣyā^sannāha^kāle janayati ca muhuḥ śīkaraṃ bṛṃhitaṃ vā
GS41brhats_u:6606: 93.13d tatkāle[K.tatkālaṃ] vā madāptir jayakṛd atha radaṃ veṣṭayan
GS41brhats_u:6613: 94.01ab/ prācyānāṃ dakṣiṇataḥ śubhadāḥ[K.śubhadaḥ] kākāḥ karāyikā vāmāḥ[K.vāmā]/
GS41brhats_u:6617: 94.03ab/ nīḍe prāk śākhāyāṃ śaradi bhavet prathama^vṛṣṭir aparasyām/
GS41brhats_u:6620: 94.04cd/ pariśeṣayoḥ subhikṣaṃ mūṣaka^*sampac ca[K.sampat tu] vāyavye//
GS41brhats_u:6625: 94.07ab/ cauraka^varṇaiś caurāś citrair mṛtyuḥ sitais tu vahni^bhayam/
GS41brhats_u:6630: 94.09ab/ abhayāś ca tuṇḍa^pakṣaiś caraṇa^vighātair janān abhibhavantaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6632: 94.10ab/ savyena khe bhramadbhiḥ svabhayaṃ viparīta^maṇḍalaiś ca parāt/
GS41brhats_u:6641: 94.13cd/ bhayado jana^saṃvāsād yadi bhāṇḍāny apanayet kākaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6644: 94.15ab/ yad dravyam upanayet tasya labdhir apaharati cet praṇāśaḥ syāt/
GS41brhats_u:6648: 94.16cd/ prāvṛṣi vṛṣṭiṃ durdinam anṛtau snātāś ca pāṃśu^jalaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6652: 94.18cd/ rakta^dravyaṃ dagdhaṃ tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhe vidadhat//
GS41brhats_u:6653: 94.19ab/ aindrya^ādi^dig avalokī sūrya^abhimukho ruvan gṛhe gṛhinaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6663: 94.24ab/ aiśānyāṃ samprāptir ghṛta^pūrṇānāṃ bhaved anaḍuhaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:6665: 94.25ab/ gamane karṇasamaś cet kṣemāya na kārya^siddhaye bhavati//
GS41brhats_u:6666: 94.25cd/ abhimukham upaiti yātur viruvan vinivartayed yātrām//
GS41brhats_u:6669: 94.27ab/ yadi vāma eva viruvan[K.viruyāt] muhurmuhur yāyino +anuloma^gatiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6670: 94.27cd/ arthasya bhavati siddhyai prācyānāṃ dakṣiṇaś ca^evam//
GS41brhats_u:6671: 94.28ab/ vāmaḥ pratiloma^gatir viruvan[K.vāśan] gamanasya vighnakṛd bhavati/
GS41brhats_u:6676: 94.30ab/ prativāśya pṛṣṭḥato dakṣiṇena yāyād drutaṃ kṣataja^kārī[K.kṣatajakartā]/
GS41brhats_u:6677: 94.30cd/ ekacaraṇo +arkam īkṣan viruvaṃś ca puro rudhira^hetuḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6678: 94.31ab/ dṛṣṭvā^arkam ekapādas tuṇḍena likhed yadā svapicchāni/
GS41brhats_u:6679: 94.31cd/ purato janasya mahato vadham abhidhatte tadā balibhuk//
GS41brhats_u:6690: 94.35cd/ sadyo jvaro mahiṣage viruvati gulme phalaṃ svalpam//
GS41brhats_u:6694: 94.37ab/ kaṇṭaki^miśre saumye siddhiḥ kāryasya bhavati kalahaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:6697: 94.38cd/ purataś ca pṛṣṭhato vā gomaya^saṃsthe dhana^prāptiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6700: 94.39cd/ bhañjann asthi ca cañcvā yadi viruvaty[K.vāśaty] asthi^bhaṅgāya//
GS41brhats_u:6704: 94.41cd/ *pakṣau dhunvann[K.dhunvan pakṣāv] ūrdhva^ānane ca vighnaṃ muhuḥ
GS41brhats_u:6706: 94.42ab/ yadi śṛṅkhalāṃ varatrāṃ vallīṃ vā^ādāya vāśate bandhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6717: 94.46cd/ aviruddhais taiḥ prītir dviṣatāṃ yuddhaṃ viruddhaiś ca//
GS41brhats_u:6719: 94.47cd/ kṣemaṃ khara^uṣṭra^saṃsthe ke cit prāhur vadhaṃ tu khare//
GS41brhats_u:6722: 94.49ab/ dvātriṃśat pravibhakte digcakre yad yathā samuddiṣṭam/
GS41brhats_u:6724: 94.50ab/ kā iti kākasya rutaṃ sva^nilaya^saṃsthasya niṣphalaṃ proktam/
GS41brhats_u:6725: 94.50cd/ kava iti ca^ātmaprītyai ka^iti rute snigdha^mitra^āptiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6726: 94.51ab/ karā^iti kalahaṃ kurukuru ca harṣam atha kaṭakaṭa^iti
GS41brhats_u:6728: 94.51cd/ keke virutaṃ kuku vā dhana^lābhaṃ yāyinaḥ prāha//
GS41brhats_u:6729: 94.52ab/ kharekhare pathika^āgamam āha kakhākhā^iti yāyino mṛtyum/
GS41brhats_u:6730: 94.52cd/ gamana^pratiṣedhikam ā kakhalā[K.ākhalakhala, K's tr. ā
GS41brhats_u:6733: 94.53cd/ prīty^āspadaṃ kavakava^iti bandham evaṃ kagākur iti//
GS41brhats_u:6734: 94.54ab/ karagau[K.karakau] virute varṣaṃ guḍavat trāsāya vaḍ iti
GS41brhats_u:6736: 94.54cd/ kalaya^iti ca saṃyogaḥ śūdrasya brāhmaṇaiḥ sākam//
GS41brhats_u:6740: 94.55b gaḍ iti gavāṃ puḍ iti puṣpāṇām//
GS41brhats_u:6741: 94.56ab/ yuddhāya ṭākuṭākv iti guhu vahni^bhayaṃ kaṭekaṭe kalahaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:6742: 94.56cd/ ṭākuli ciṇṭici kekeka^iti puraṃ ca^iti doṣāya//

GS41brhats_u:6750: 94.58d maraṇam api *ca nīlā[K.nilīnā] makṣikā mūrdhni līnā//

GS41brhats_u:6756: 94.60b vindyāt phalaṃ niyatam evam ime vicintyāḥ/

GS41brhats_u:6764: 94.62b tatra^aniṣṭe prathama^śakune mānayet pañca ṣaṭ ca/
GS41brhats_u:6766: 94.62d pratyāgacchet svabhavanam ato yady aniṣṭas tṛtīyaḥ//

GS41brhats_u:6928: 95.ṝ28d astaṃ gate chaṃ nabhasi sthite pham//

GS41brhats_u:6963: 96.01cd/ ādarśanāc ca pāko budhasya jīvasya varṣeṇa//

GS41brhats_u:6966: 96.03ab/ tribhir eva dhūmaketor māsaiḥ śvetasya saptarātra^ante/
GS41brhats_u:6975: 96.07cd/ loṣṭasya cāpsu taraṇaṃ tribhir eva vipacyate māsaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6976: 96.08ab/ prasavaḥ śunām araṇye vanyānāṃ grāma^sampraveśaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:6979: 96.09cd/ ākruṣṭaṃ pakṣa^phalaṃ valmīko vidaraṇaṃ ca bhuvaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:6983: 96.11cd/ chatrasya toraṇasya ca kecin māsāt phalaṃ prāhuḥ //
GS41brhats_u:6984: 96.12ab/ atyanta^viruddhānāṃ snehaḥ śabdaś ca viyati bhūtānām/

GS41brhats_u:6992: 96.16ab/ sapta^aṣṭav adhyardhaṃ trayas trayaḥ pañca ca^eva māsāḥ syuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7003: 97.03ab/ nakṣatrajam udvāhe phalam abdais tārakā^mitaiḥ sadasat/
GS41brhats_u:7004: 97.03cd/ divasair jvarasya nāśo vyādher anyasya vā vācyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7007: 97.05ab/ śakro nirṛtis toyaṃ viśve brahmā harir vasur varuṇaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7009: 97.06ab/ trīṇy uttarāṇi tebhyo rohiṇyaś ca dhruvāṇi taiḥ kuryāt/
GS41brhats_u:7024: 97.12c kṣaure tu karmaṇi hitāny udaye kṣaṇe vā
GS41brhats_u:7029: 97.13d kṣauraṃ hitaṃ na navame +ahni na ca^api viṣṭyām//
GS41brhats_u:7030: 97.14ab/ nṛpājñayā brāhmaṇa^sammate ca vivāhakāle mṛtasūtake ca/
GS41brhats_u:7031: 97.14cd/ baddhasya mokṣe kratu^dīkṣaṇāsu sarveṣu śastaṃ kṣurakarma bheṣu//
GS41brhats_u:7033: K.98.15ab/ hasto mūlaṃ śravaṇā punarvasur mṛgaśiras tathā puṣyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7034: K.98.15cd/ puṃsañjñiteṣu kāryeṣv etāni śubhāni dhiṣṇyāni//]
GS41brhats_u:7039: K.98.17ab/ lābhe tṛtīye ca śubhaiḥ samete pāpair vihīne śubharāśilagne/
GS41brhats_u:7040: K.98.17cd/ vedhyau tu karṇau tridaśejyalagne tiṣyenducitrāharirevatīṣu//]
GS41brhats_u:7042: 97.16b lagne kendragate +atha vā suragurau daitya^indrapūjye +api vā/
GS41brhats_u:7043: 97.16c sarva^ārambha^phala^prasiddhir udaye rāśau ca kartuḥ śubhe
GS41brhats_u:7044: 97.16d sagrāmya^sthira^bha^udaye ca bhavanaṃ kāryaṃ praveśo +api vā//
GS41brhats_u:7049: 98.02cd/ nandā bhadrā vijayā riktā pūrṇā ca tās trividhāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7050: 98.03ab/ yat kāryaṃ nakṣatre taddaivatyāsu tithiṣu tat kāryam/
GS41brhats_u:7056: 99.02cd/ kiṃstughnam iti ca teṣāṃ kali^vṛṣa^phaṇi^mārutāḥ patayaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7065: 99.05a kāryaṃ pauṣṭikam auṣadhādi śakunau mūlāni mantrās tathā
GS41brhats_u:7066: 99.05b gokāryāṇi catuṣpade dvijapitṛn uddiśya rājyāni ca/
GS41brhats_u:7069: 99.06ab[K.omitted]/ lābhe tṛtīye ca śubhaiḥ samete pāpair vihīne
GS41brhats_u:7076: 99.07d krūrais tryāyaṣaḍaṣṭagair na tu bhṛgau ṣaṣṭhe kuje ca^aṣṭame//
GS41brhats_u:7079: 99.08c tyaktvā ca vyatipāta^vaidhṛti[K.vaidhṛta]^dinaṃ viṣṭiṃ ca riktāṃ
GS41brhats_u:7090: 100.03ab/ capalaś caturo bhīruḥ paṭur utsāhī dhanī mṛge bhogī/
GS41brhats_u:7092: 100.04ab/ dāntaḥ sukhī suśīlo durmedhā rogabhāk pipāsuś ca/
GS41brhats_u:7093: 100.04cd/ alpena ca santuṣṭaḥ punarvasau jāyate manujaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7094: 100.05ab/ śāntātmā subhagaḥ paṇḍito dhanī dharma^saṃśritaḥ puṣye/
GS41brhats_u:7098: 100.06cd/ priyavāg dātā dyutimān aṭano nṛpa^sevako bhāgye//
GS41brhats_u:7103: 100.08cd/ dānto vaṇik tṛṣāluḥ[K.kṛpāluḥ] priyavāg dharmāśritaḥ svātau//
GS41brhats_u:7107: 100.10ab/ jyeṣṭhāsu na bahumitraḥ santuṣṭo dharmakṛt pracurakopaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7108: 100.10cd/ mūle mānī dhanavān sukhī na hiṃsraḥ sthiro bhogī//
GS41brhats_u:7111: 100.12ab/ śrīmān śravaṇe śrutavān udāra^dāro dhana^anvitaḥ khyātaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7113: 100.13ab/ sphuṭavāg vyasanī ripuhā sāhasikaḥ śatabhiṣaksu durgrāhyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7115: 100.14ab/ vaktā sukhī prajāvān jitaśatrur dhārmiko dvitīyāsu//
GS41brhats_u:7116: 100.14cd/ sampūrṇa^aṅgaḥ subhagaḥ śūraḥ śucir arthavān pauṣṇe//
GS41brhats_u:7118: 101.01ab/ aśvinyo +atha bharaṇyo bahulāpādaś ca kīrtyate meṣaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7124: 101.03ab/ siṃho +atha maghā pūrvā ca phalgunī pāda uttarāyāś ca/
GS41brhats_u:7128: 101.05ab/ mūlam aṣāḍhā pūrvā prathamaś ca^apy uttarāṃśako dhanvī/
GS41brhats_u:7131: 101.06cd/ bhadrapadāyāḥ śeṣaṃ tathottarā revatī ca jhaṣaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7135: 102.01a mūrtau karoti dinakṛd vidhavāṃ kujaś ca
GS41brhats_u:7137: 102.01c śukraḥ śaśāṅka^tanayaś ca guruś ca sādhvīm
GS41brhats_u:7149: 102.04c rāhuḥ sapatnanam[K.sapatnyam ū.sapatnam] api ca kṣitijo
GS41brhats_u:7151: 102.04d dadyād bhṛguḥ suraguruś ca budhaś ca saukhyam//
GS41brhats_u:7157: 102.06b kuryuḥ kujaś ca subhagāṃ śvaśureṣu bhaktām/
GS41brhats_u:7165: 102.08b mṛtyuṃ śaśī bhṛgusutaś ca tatha^eva rāhuḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7169: 102.09b jīvaś ca dharmaniratāṃ śaśijas tv arogām/
GS41brhats_u:7170: 102.09c rāhuś ca sūryatanayaś ca karoti bandhyāṃ[K.vandhyāṃ]
GS41brhats_u:7173: 102.10b pāpe ratāṃ dinakaraś ca śanaiścaraś ca/
GS41brhats_u:7175: 102.10d śeṣā grahā dhanavatīṃ subhagāṃ ca kuryuḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7184: 102.13a gopair yaṣṭy^āhatānāṃ khura^puṭa^dalitā yā tu dhūlir dinānte
GS41brhats_u:7186: 102.13c tasmin kāle na ca^ṛkṣaṃ na ca tithi^karaṇaṃ naiva lagnaṃ na yogaḥ
GS41brhats_u:7187: 102.13d khyātaḥ puṃsāṃ sukhārthaṃ śamayati duritāny utthitaṃ gorajas tu//
GS41brhats_u:7190: 103.01cd/ ratnāni śāstrāṇi ca yojitāni navair guṇair bhūṣayituṃ kṣamāṇi//
GS41brhats_u:7194: 103.03ab/ māṇḍavya^giraṃ śrutvā na madīyā rocate +atha vā naivam/
GS41brhats_u:7195: 103.03cd/ sādhvī tathā na puṃsāṃ priyā yathā syāj jaghanacapalā//
GS41brhats_u:7202: 103.05b vitta^bhraṃśaṃ dvitīye diśati ca na sukhaṃ vañcanāṃ dṛgrujaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:7205: 103.05d rogān datte[K.dhatte] caturthe janayati ca muhuḥ
GS41brhats_u:7207: 103.06a pīḍāḥ syuḥ pañcamasthe savitari bahuśo roga^ari^janitāḥ
GS41brhats_u:7208: 103.06b ṣaṣṭhe +arko hanti rogān kṣapayati ca ripūn śokāṃś ca nudati/
GS41brhats_u:7209: 103.06c adhvānaṃ saptamastho jaṭhara^gada^bhayaṃ dainyaṃ ca kurute/
GS41brhats_u:7210: 103.06d ruk^trāsau[K.rukkāsau] ca^aṣṭamasthe bhavati suvadanā na svāpi
GS41brhats_u:7212: 103.07a ravāv āpaddainyaṃ rug iti navame vitta[K.citta]ceṣṭāvirodho
GS41brhats_u:7213: 103.07b jayaṃ prāpnoty ugraṃ daśama^gṛhage karma^siddhiṃ krameṇa/
GS41brhats_u:7214: 103.07c jaya^sthānaṃ[K.jayaṃ sthānaṃ] mānaṃ vibhavam api ca^ekādaśe
GS41brhats_u:7216: 103.07d suvṛttānāṃ ceṣṭā bhavati saphalā dvādaśe na^itareṣām//
GS41brhats_u:7218: 103.08b dvitīye mānārthān[K.mānārthau] glapayati savighnaś ca bhavati/
GS41brhats_u:7221: 103.09a dainyaṃ vyādhiṃ śucam api śaśī pañcame mārgavighnaṃ
GS41brhats_u:7222: 103.09b ṣaṣṭhe vittaṃ janayati sukhaṃ śatrurogakṣayaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:7223: 103.09c yānaṃ mānaṃ śayanam aśanaṃ saptame vittalābhaṃ
GS41brhats_u:7224: 103.09d mandākrānte phaṇini himagau ca aṣṭame bhīr na kasya//
GS41brhats_u:7228: 103.10d vṛṣabha^caritān doṣān antye[K.ante] karoti ca[K.hi] savyayān//
GS41brhats_u:7237: 103.13cd/ kupuruṣa^janitāc ca saṅgamāt prasabham api karoti ca aśubham//
GS41brhats_u:7240: 103.14c dyutir api na asya ciraṃ bhavet sthirā
GS41brhats_u:7249: 103.17ab/ daśama^gṛhagate samaṃ mahīje vividha^dhana^āptir upāntyage jayaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:7250: 103.17cd/ janapadam upari sthitaś ca bhuṅkte vanam iva ṣaṭcaraṇaḥ supuṣpita^agram//
GS41brhats_u:7257: 103.19cd/ janmage śaśisute pathi gacchan svāgate +api kuśalaṃ na śṛṇoti//
GS41brhats_u:7258: 103.20ab/ paribhavo dhanagate dhanalabdhiḥ sahajage śaśisute hṛdaya^āptiḥ[K.ū.suhṛdāptiḥ]/
GS41brhats_u:7263: 103.21d niṣevate na ca rucirām api striyam//
GS41brhats_u:7264: 103.22a saubhāgyaṃ vijayam atha unnatiṃ ca ṣaṣṭhe
GS41brhats_u:7268: 103.23ab/ vighnakaro navamaḥ śaśiputraḥ karmagato ripuhā dhanadaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:7269: 103.23cd/ sapramadaṃ śayanaṃ ca vidhatte tadgṛhado +atha *kathāṃ staraṇaṃ
GS41brhats_u:7281: 103.26c jīve śāntiṃ pīḍitacittaś ca sa vinded[K.vinden]
GS41brhats_u:7327: 103.39ab/ prathame ravije viṣa^vahni^hataḥ svajanair viyutaḥ kṛta^bandhu^vadhaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7332: 103.40c anyaguṇaiḥ kṛtaṃ vasucayam tad api khalu bhavaty
GS41brhats_u:7333: 103.40d ambv iva vaṃśapatrapatitaṃ na bahu na ca ciram//
GS41brhats_u:7337: 103.41d bhīrur api praśāsty adhiripūṃś ca vīra^lalitaiḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7346: 103.44a gacchaty adhvānaṃ saptame ca aṣṭame ca
GS41brhats_u:7354: 103.46ab/ api kālam apekṣya ca pātraṃ śubhakṛd vidadhāty anurūpam/
GS41brhats_u:7355: 103.46cd/ na madhau bahu kaṃ kuḍave vā[K.ca] visṛjaty api meghavitānaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7358: 103.47b bhaktyā pūjyāv indur dhenvā sitakusuma^rajata^madhuraiḥ sitaś ca madapradaiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7359: 103.47c kṛṣṇadravyaiḥ sauriḥ saumyo maṇi^rajata^tilaka^kusumair guruḥ paripītakaiḥ
GS41brhats_u:7360: 103.47d prītaiḥ pīḍā na syād uccād yadi patati viśati yadi vā
GS41brhats_u:7367: 103.50ab/ ādau yādṛk saumyaḥ paścād api tādṛśo bhavati/
GS41brhats_u:7369: 103.51ab/ āryāṇām api kurute vināśam antargurur viṣamasaṃsthaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7370: 103.51cd/ gaṇa iva ṣaṣṭhe dṛṣṭaḥ sa[K.ca] sarvalaghutāṃ janaṃ[K.gato]
GS41brhats_u:7375: 103.52d idam api gītakaṃ ca khalu narkuṭakaṃ ca yathā//
GS41brhats_u:7376: 103.53ab/ nīce +aribhe +aste *ca aridṛṣṭasya[K's tr. aridṛṣṭasya] sarvaṃ vṛthā yat[K's tr. yathā] parikīrtitam/
GS41brhats_u:7380: 103.54cd/ skandhakam āryāgītir vaitālīyaṃ ca māgadhī gāthā^āryām//
GS41brhats_u:7383: 103.55cd/ pittavad ācarati nṛṇāṃ pathyakṛtāṃ na tu tathā^āryāṇām//
GS41brhats_u:7384: 103.56ab/ yādṛśena graheṇa^indur yuktas tādṛg bhavet so +api/
GS41brhats_u:7388: 103.58ab/ prakṛtyā^api laghur yaś ca vṛttabāhye vyavasthitaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7389: 103.58cd/ sa yāti gurutāṃ loke yadā syuḥ susthitā grahāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7392: 103.59cd/ vinihanti tad eva karma tān vaitālīyam iva ayathākṛtam//
GS41brhats_u:7393: 103.60ab/ sausthityam avekṣya yo grahebhyaḥ kāle prakramaṇaṃ karoti rājā/
GS41brhats_u:7394: 103.60cd/ aṇunā api sa pauruṣeṇa vṛttasya^aupacchandasikasya yāti pāram//
GS41brhats_u:7398: 103.61b śiśirakiraṇa^vāsare tasya va apy udgame kendrasaṃsthe +atha vā bhūṣaṇaṃ śaṅkha^muktā^abja^rūpya^ambu^yajña^ikṣu^bhojya^aṅganā^kṣīra^susnigdhavṛkṣa^kṣupa^anūpa^dhānya^dravadravya^*vipra^adhva^gīta[K.viprāśvaśīta]kriyā^śṛṅgi^kṛṣyādi^senādhipa^ākranda^bhūpāla^saubhāgya^naktañcara^ślaiṣmika^dravya^mātulya[K.mātuṅga]puṣpa^ambara^ārambha^siddhir
GS41brhats_u:7402: tathā rakta^puṣpa^drumā raktam anyac ca tiktaṃ
GS41brhats_u:7406: 103.61d harati[U.harita, K.harita]maṇi^mahī^sugandhīni vastrāṇi sādhāraṇaṃ nāṭakaṃ śāstra^vijñāna^kāvyāni sarvāḥ kalā^yuktayo
GS41brhats_u:7411: 103.62a suraguru^divase kanakaṃ rajataṃ turagāḥ kariṇo vṛṣabhā bhiṣag^auṣadhayaḥ[K.oṣadhayaḥ]
GS41brhats_u:7414: 103.62d vrata^havana^dhanāni ca siddhikarāṇi tathā rucirāṇi ca varṇaka^daṇḍakavat//
GS41brhats_u:7420: 103.63d cyutavinaya^viśīrṇabhāṇḍa^hasty^apekṣa^vighnakāraṇāni ca anyathā na sādhayet samudrago +apy apāṃ kaṇam//
GS41brhats_u:7421: 103.64ab/ vipulām api buddhvā chandovicitiṃ bhavati kāryam etāvat/
GS41brhats_u:7424: 104.01ab/ pādau mūlaṃ jaṅghe ca rohiṇī jānunī[K.omitted] tathāśvinyaḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7425: 104.01cd/ ūrū ca āṣāḍhadvayam atha guhyaṃ phalgunī^*dvitayam[K.yugmam]//
GS41brhats_u:7426: 104.02ab/ kaṭir api ca kṛttikā pārśvayoś ca yamalā bhavanti bhadrapadāḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7430: 104.03cd/ aṅgulyaś ca punarvasur āśleṣāsaṃjñitāś ca nakhāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7431: 104.04ab/ grīvā jyeṣṭhā *śravaṇaṃ śravaṇau[K.śravaṇau śravanaḥ] puṣyo mukhaṃ dvijāḥ svātiḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7432: 104.04cd/ hasitaṃ śatabhiṣag atha nāsikā maghā mṛgaśiro netre//
GS41brhats_u:7433: 104.05ab/ citrā lalāṭasaṃsthā śiro bharaṇyaḥ śiroruhāś ca^ārdrā/
GS41brhats_u:7435: 104.06ab/ caitrasya bahula^pakṣe hy aṣṭamyāṃ mūlasaṃyute candre/
GS41brhats_u:7436: 104.06cd/ hy[K.omitted] upavāsaḥ kartavyo viṣṇuṃ sampūjya dhiṣṇyaṃ ca//
GS41brhats_u:7437: 104.07ab/ dadyād vrate samāpte ghṛtapūrṇaṃ bhājanaṃ suvarṇayutam/
GS41brhats_u:7439: 104.08a annaiḥ kṣīraghṛta^utkaṭaiḥ saha guḍair viprān samabhyarcayed
GS41brhats_u:7440: 104.08b dadyāt teṣu suvarṇa[K.tatha^eva]vastrarajataṃ lāvaṇyam icchan naraḥ/
GS41brhats_u:7441: 104.08c pāda^ṛkṣāt prabhṛti kramād upavasann aṅga^ṛkṣanāmasv api
GS41brhats_u:7442: 104.08d kuryāt keśava^pūjanaṃ svavidhinā dhiṣṇyasya pūjāṃ tathā//
GS41brhats_u:7456: 104.13a yāvan nakṣatramālā vicarati gagane bhūṣayantī iha bhāsā
GS41brhats_u:7457: 104.13b tāvan nakṣatrabhūto vicarati saha tair brahmaṇo +ahno +avaśeṣam/
GS41brhats_u:7458: 104.13c kalpādau cakravartī bhavati hi matimāṃs tatkṣayāc ca^api bhūyaḥ
GS41brhats_u:7459: 104.13d saṃsāre jāyamāno bhavati narapatir brāhmaṇo vā dhanāḍhyaḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7462: 104.15ab/ śrīdhara^nāmā tasmāt sahṛṣīkeśaś ca padmanābhaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:7463: 104.15cd dāmodara ity ete māsāḥ proktā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ//
GS41brhats_u:7464: 104.16ab/ māsa^nāma samupoṣito naro dvādaśīṣu vidhivat prakīrtayan/
GS41brhats_u:7465: 104.16cd/ keśavam samabhipūjya tatpadaṃ yāti yatra nahi janmajaṃ bhayam//
GS41brhats_u:7470: 105.02cd/ tān avalokya^idaṃ ca prayatadhvaṃ kāmataḥ sujanāḥ//
GS41brhats_u:7471: 105.03ab/ atha vā kṛśam[K.bhṛśam] api sujanaḥ prathayati doṣārṇavād guṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā/
GS41brhats_u:7477: 105.05c yadvā mayā kukṛtam alpam iha^ākṛtaṃ vā
GS41brhats_u:7478: 105.05d kāryaṃ tad atra viduṣā parihṛtya rāgam//
GS41brhats_u:7484: 106.02ab/ cāraś ca^agastyamuneḥ saptarṣīṇāṃ ca kūrma^yogaś ca/
GS41brhats_u:7496: 106.08ab/ cihnaṃ gavām atha śunām kukkuṭa^kūrma^aja^puruṣa^cihnaṃ ca/
GS41brhats_u:7502: 106.11ab/ antaracakraṃ virutaṃ śvaceṣṭitaṃ virutam atha śivāyāś ca//
GS41brhats_u:7510: 106.14cd[K.omitted]/ bahvāścaryaṃ jātakam uktaṃ karaṇaṃ ca bahucodyam//
